story:
全球第一台 130W 整合型充電站

擁有雙USB-C、雙USB-A及無線充電功能
整合Apple(PD)及Android(QC)兩大陣營 一台滿足您所有需求#

同時為所有USB裝置充電，獨家智能電源分配技術可根據所連接之裝置數量及類型提供最佳充電功率
不論是旅行、出差、辦公室或家庭使用都能提供您最佳的充電品質及使用便利性

 

The world's first 130W power station

Dual USB-C, dual USB-A and wireless charging with Apple (PD) and Android (QC) All in One all your needs#

At the same time charging all USB devices, the exclusive intelligent power distribution technology provides the best charging power depending on the number and type of devices connected. Provides you with the best charging quality and ease of use for travel, business trips, office or home use

支援15Ｗ 3倍充電效率 Qi無線快充

最佳智能晶片，具有廣泛兼容#

支援Apple與Android全系列無線充電機種，感應距離5mm以內，無須卸下保護殼

 

Support 15W 3 times charging efficiency Qi wireless fast charge

Best Smart Wafer with Wide Compatibility#

 

Support Apple and Android full range of wireless charging models, sensing distance within 5mm, no need to remove the protective case

迷你精巧的體積 搭載更強大的瓦數

性能極致發揮  充分滿足您的理想需求 #

同時連接4種裝置充電傳輸，筆電、平板或手機都能自動匹配合適電流輸出
無論日常辦公還是外出旅遊，高效功率一個設備就已足夠

 

Mini compact size with more powerful watts

Performance is perfect to meet your ideal needs #

At the same time, 4 kinds of devices are connected for charging transmission, and the notebook, tablet or mobile phone can automatically match the appropriate current output. Whether it's daily work or traveling, high-efficiency power is enough for one device.

我們擁有最大的瓦數 最完整性的結構支援

價格親民讓您輕鬆入手，專業的讓您值得擁有

 

We have the largest watts, the most complete structural support

The price is easy for you to get started, professionally worthy of your own

單孔實際測試 

100W輸出輕而易舉 完全達到蘋果筆電充電效率#

實測具備100W的輸出能力，電壓最大輸出為20.13V/5.2A

 

Single hole actual test

100W output is easy to achieve. Fully reach Apple's notebook charging efficiency#

The measured output has a 100W output capability, and the maximum voltage output is 20.13V/5.2A.

 

 

智能充電技術 四孔獨立輸出

每孔都是獨立電流，快速充電不打結#

完全不用擔心充電時會發生不過電及斷斷續續的問題，不僅提升您的充電品質更提升您工作效率

 

 

Intelligent charging technology Four-hole independent output

Each hole is independent current, fast charging does not tie knot #

Don't worry about the problem of power and disconnection when charging, not only improve your charging quality, but also improve your work efficiency.

BLUEGOLD五大安全保護機制

精細的控制能力與快速的防護機制#

效率更高 且不損壞裝置設備 保障使用安全
充電時能保護您的裝置避免過電流、短路、過熱、過載與過電壓的傷害，提供您更穩定與安心的電源

 

BLUEGOLD five security protection

mechanisms Fine control and fast protection mechanism#

More efficient and does not damage the device and equipment Protect your device from overcurrent, short circuit, overheating, overload and overvoltage when charging, providing a more stable and secure power supply

BLUEGOLD五大安全認證機制

我們堅持高品質，不僅要求五大迴路安全保護#

還要通過BSMI、PSE、CE、CCC、FCC國際安規認證
提供安全與高品質的產品保障，讓您使用安全無虞。

 

 

BLUEGOLD five security certifications

We insist on high quality, not only require five major loop safety protection#

Also pass BSMI, PSE, CE, CCC, FCC international safety certification Provide safety and high quality product protection to keep you safe and secure.

秉持著創新研發、品質控管

通過層層驗證，提供絕佳效能及相容穩定性#

筆電、手機及平板測試兼容列表
     華為系列、小米系列、Nintendo Switch、Dell Laptop
     Samsung Galaxy S9 Plus / S9及更多符合此規格之裝置
     APPLE:  2015-17 MacBook
                     2018 MacBook Air
                     2016-18 MacBook Pro
                     2018 iPad Pro
                     iPad Air/Mini
                     iPhone 8 
                     iPhone 8 Plus
                     iPhone X
                     iPhone XS
                     iPhone XS Max
                     iPhone XR

 

 

Adhering to innovative research and development, quality control

Provides superior performance and compatibility stability through layer verification#

Notebook, mobile phone and tablet test compatibility list Huawei Series, Xiaomi Series, Nintendo Switch, Dell Laptop Samsung Galaxy S9 Plus / S9 and more devices that meet this specification

 APPLE:  2015-17 MacBook
                     2018 MacBook Air
                     2016-18 MacBook Pro
                     2018 iPad Pro
                     iPad Air/Mini
                     iPhone 8 
                     iPhone 8 Plus
                     iPhone X
                     iPhone XS
                     iPhone XS Max
                     iPhone XR

包裝內容物

1M電源線 *1 
充電器主體 *1 
說明書 *1

 

Package contents

1M power cord *1

Charger body *1

Instruction manual *1

產品規格

Product specifications

5折加購商品

1.2M及2M MFI認證 Type-C to Lightning 快速充電尼龍線#

◆通過APPLE MFi認證(已申請,查詢網站還未更新)
◆支援蘋果快速充電、充電提速60% 
◆適用於iPhone、iPad 等Lightning裝置 

 

50% off purchase

 

1.2M and 2M MFI certification Type-C to Lightning Fast charging nylon cable#

◆Approved by APPLE MFi (applied, the website has not been updated yet)

◆Support Apple fast charging, charging speed up 60%

◆Applicable to Lightning devices such as iPhone and iPad

關於BLUEGOLD

我們憑藉著對產品無限創新的執著以及對科技技術的熱衷，創造了一個引領科技時尚又經濟實惠的新品牌_BLUEGOLD_，我們相信科技是無限的，為求適應現代生活所需任何科技產品都可以不受限的創新再創新。我們提供產品更進一步的解決方案，使日常生活中使用時更加便利。我們在追求產品功能提升效率的同時，仍保持生活時尚的設計理念，符合現代使用者的需求。我們所有的產品都採用堅固耐用的材料精心打造，並且不斷永續以適應現代生活方式發展。

 

我們所有的產品都是以解決現代生活所需方案為基礎而研發的，通常這些想法來自於客戶與我們的互動。我們非常樂意與客戶建立聯繫，隨時都可以將產品問題及需求反饋給我們，以便我們可以更專注的研發專業又實用的產品。

 

聯繫方式

有關我們的最新消息或優惠資訊，請務必在 facebook.com/bluegoldofficial 上加入我們
或上我們官網 www.bluegold.tech 歡迎您隨時與我們聯繫

 

ABOUT BLUEGOLD

With our dedication to product innovation and our passion for technology, we have created a new brand that leads the way in technology and economy. _BLUEGOLD_, we believe that technology is unlimited, and any technology products that are suitable for modern life can be Unrestricted innovation and innovation. We offer products with further solutions that make it easier to use in everyday life. While pursuing the efficiency of product functions, we still maintain the design concept of lifestyle and meet the needs of modern users.

All of our products are crafted from rugged materials and are constantly being adapted to modern lifestyles. All of our products are developed on the basis of solutions needed to solve modern life. Usually these ideas come from the interaction of our customers with us. We are very happy to connect with our customers and feedback our product issues and needs to us at any time so that we can focus on developing professional and practical products.

 

Contact information

For our latest news or offers, please be sure to join us at facebook.com/bluegoldofficial Or on our official website www.bluegold.tech  welcome to contact us at any time...

story:
SunPack solar backpack live on Kickstarter!

 

Dear Backers,

SunPack: A backpack with removeable solar charger is live on Kickstarter. The Super Early Bird Rewards are available now. so Be sure to snag a SUPER early backer spot while they last !!

Amazing features of SunPack solar backpack:     

  1. 3-in-1 removeable solar panel, power bank and backpack are integrated in one gear, off-grid power supply for camping or emergency backup. 
  2.  Built-in ultra thin 3500mAh li-polymer battery, can be charged by solar panel; About 3~5 hours to fully charge under 70000lux light condition. An hour charging can support 1.5-2.5 hours talk time. 
  3.  High Process: 5.3W solar panel uses ETFE coating instead of PET, be free from maintenance, the age of ETFE laminated membrane is up to 25 years 
  4.  Details: RFID safe pocket--- Keep personal data safe , Quick access key ring---Ensure your keys safely stored, Road safety reflectors to never worry about driving a bike during night.... 
  5. High Quality: Made from durable and water resistant oxford cloth , which is light-weight carrying; Exquisite workmanship and humanized zipper and straps make the user more comfortable.
 

 The project link is https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/flexsolar/sunpack-a-backpack-with-removeable-solar-charger  

We appreciate your support ! :)  

Flextech solar gadgets

 

.....................................................................................

Meet the Powerleaf+,

 

These days, when so many of us have portable devices, and we move around so much, having a portable solar charger isn’t just nice, it’s a necessity. Powerleaf+ is an upgraded version of previous Powerleaf solar charger. You can use this solar charger to run electrical devices such as tablets ,mobile phones, your GPS, other 5V gadgets or charge your 12V batteries directly. It`s essential for outdoor activities, such as hiking, camping, and outdoors military training. So that even in absence of power support, there is electricity as long as there are sunshine and solar charger.

Where can you use Powerleaf+ ?  

 The Powerleaf+ solar charger is useful in  many different scenarios. The solar cells can be collecting sunlight while you are on the move or staying still. Consider using the Powerleaf+ solar charger for any of these activities and more~ 

  •  Camping 
  •  Hiking
  •  Backpacking 
  •  Skiing
  •  Fishing
  • RV Travel 
  • Field Photography
  • Road Trips
  •  Electronic use away from home


Features 

 What is different of Powerleaf+ ?

  •   Adjustable integrated stand to get optimal solar angle

 

 When the angle between sunlight and solar panle is vertical, the power is maximum. When the angle between sunlight and solar panel is inclined, the power are diminished. When the angle between sunlight and solar panel is horizontal or negative, the power is zero

  • Charging indicator

This current level indicator offers 3 colors of LED that light up progressively as the current increases:

1. NOT light : less than 350mAh output

2. Purple : Greater than  350mAh output

3. Blue: Greater than 550mAh output

4. Green : Greater than 800mAh output

With the help of LEDs, you will clearly know how many current the solar panel generates , also you can adjust the stand to get the best angle as well as choose the most suitable devices to charge.

  • Dual ports

1. USB port  5v , to charge cell phones, power banks, digital cameras, MP3/MP4s, Kindle’s, portable DVD players, Bluetooth headsets, PDAs, and, a host of any USB- chargerd  devices.

 

 

2. DC5521  14.8V, to charge 12V battery, jump starter and external battery packs for laptop

 

3. We will provide  DC5521 male to DC5521 male cable, DC5521 male to alligator clips cable with voltage stabilizing function, USB male to android, ios,type C 3 connectors charging cable

  • ETFE film coating+ integrated laminating+ dimple technology.

1. Capture more sunlight and increase the solar absorption rate by 5%

2. Non-adhesive surface , stain-resistant .easily get cleaned by rain or damp cloth

3. Lightweight, UV resistant, durable, long lifespan

  • Hollowed design+ insert magnet+cutting edges

Compared with our first version of phototype, we cut off all the unnecessary parts in the second version to make product design more compact and lightweight , it `ll be more suitable for backpackers, hikers. 

  •  Auto Restart Technology ---ensure stable charging performance.

When shadow leaves, it will automatically restart in few seconds and come back to charging function. When sunlight gets stronger in the process of charging a cellphone, Powerleaf+ will disconnect and auto restart at a higher current to charge the cellphone.

  • Large capacity zipper bag

There is a zipper bag at the back of the charger to hold your phone, cable, carabiner and any other small accessories safely and organize them well.

Prototypes

Specification

Why we need your support?

To perfect the previous version of Powerleaf solar charger ,make it faster charging, more complete function
To bring you conveniency for outdoor activities. With Powerleaf+ you don’t have to worry about running out of power when you are in the outdoor.
To lower purchasing cost and make it cost-effective. Materials including solar cells and others components are cheaper when purchased in bulk .
To do a little bit for green environment. Using renewable energy like solar power is clearly a way to diminish our dependency to fossil fuels, and is a good way to mitigate global warming by lowering the emission of greenhouse gases.

 

Risks and challenges

Through previous campaigns, we understand that backers bear risk with us and make a pledge, we know how hard to successfully handle with every part- including product design, manufacture , package, delivery, service.....even every piece of material we choose... Now Powerleaf+ product design is in the final stage, our current prototype is with function, but we need to make new molds and final moldfication, such as imporove the material quality of the stand and do more tests of the charging indicator, also bring Powerleaf+ to massive production. 
Some ricks and challenges are:

1. Shipping date: We have built in extra time for the manufacturing process and are confident we will ship by the projected dates, but there is always a chance that things will take longer than planned. 
2. Product changes: Slight changes may be made based on more product testing and Indiegogo community feedback. We'll only make changes that enhance the product experience. 
3. Small components unexpected shortage can happen. In that case, we will inform you and do our best to solve the problem.

Please also feel free to let us know your concerns, we look forward to hearing from the indiegogo community.Thank you for your support!

High Quality: Made from durable and water resistant oxford cloth , which is light-weight carrying; Exquisite workmanship and humanized zipper and straps make the user more comfortable.

Powerleaf+ is an upgraded version of previous Powerleaf solar charger. You can use this solar charger to run electrical devices such as tablets ,mobile phones, your GPS, other 5V gadgets or charge your 12V batteries directly. It`s essential for outdoor activities, such as hiking, camping, and outdoors military training. So that even in absence of power support, there is electricity as long as there are sunshine and solar charger.Where can you use Powerleaf+ ?   The Powerleaf+ solar charger is useful in  many different scenarios. The solar cells can be collecting sunlight while you are on the move or staying still. Consider using the Powerleaf+ solar charger for any of these activities and more~ 
 Camping 
 Hiking
 Backpacking 
 Skiing
 Fishing
RV Travel 
Field Photography
Road Trips
 Electronic use away from home
Features  What is different of Powerleaf+ ?  Adjustable integrated stand to get optimal solar angle  When the angle between sunlight and solar panle is vertical, the power is maximum. When the angle between sunlight and solar panel is inclined, the power are diminished. When the angle between sunlight and solar panel is horizontal or negative, the power is zeroCharging indicatorThis current level indicator offers 3 colors of LED that light up progressively as the current increases:1. NOT light : less than 350mAh output2. Purple : Greater than  350mAh output3. Blue: Greater than 550mAh output4. Green : Greater than 800mAh outputWith the help of LEDs, you will clearly know how many current the solar panel generates , also you can adjust the stand to get the best angle as well as choose the most suitable devices to charge.Dual ports1. USB port  5v , to charge cell phones, power banks, digital cameras, MP3/MP4s, Kindle’s, portable DVD players, Bluetooth headsets, PDAs, and, a host of any USB- chargerd  devices.


 
 2. DC5521  14.8V, to charge 12V battery, jump starter and external battery packs for laptop

 
3. We will provide  DC5521 male to DC5521 male cable, DC5521 male to alligator clips cable with voltage stabilizing function, USB male to android, ios,type C 3 connectors charging cableETFE film coating+ integrated laminating+ dimple technology.1. Capture more sunlight and increase the solar absorption rate by 5%2. Non-adhesive surface , stain-resistant .easily get cleaned by rain or damp cloth3. Lightweight, UV resistant, durable, long lifespanHollowed design+ insert magnet+cutting edgesCompared with our first version of phototype, we cut off all the unnecessary parts in the second version to make product design more compact and lightweight , it `ll be more suitable for backpackers, hikers.  Auto Restart Technology ---ensure stable charging performance.When shadow leaves, it will automatically restart in few seconds and come back to charging function. When sunlight gets stronger in the process of charging a cellphone, Powerleaf+ will disconnect and auto restart at a higher current to charge the cellphone.Large capacity zipper bagThere is a zipper bag at the back of the charger to hold your phone, cable, carabiner and any other small accessories safely and organize them well.PrototypesSpecificationWhy we need your support?To perfect the previous version of Powerleaf solar charger ,make it faster charging, more complete functionTo bring you conveniency for outdoor activities. With Powerleaf+ you don’t have to worry about running out of power when you are in the outdoor.To lower purchasing cost and make it cost-effective. Materials including solar cells and others components are cheaper when purchased in bulk .To do a little bit for green environment. Using renewable energy like solar power is clearly a way to diminish our dependency to fossil fuels, and is a good way to mitigate global warming by lowering the emission of greenhouse gases. Risks and challengesThrough previous campaigns, we understand that backers bear risk with us and make a pledge, we know how hard to successfully handle with every part- including product design, manufacture , package, delivery, service.....even every piece of material we choose... Now Powerleaf+ product design is in the final stage, our current prototype is with function, but we need to make new molds and final moldfication, such as imporove the material quality of the stand and do more tests of the charging indicator, also bring Powerleaf+ to massive production. Some ricks and challenges are:1. Shipping date: We have built in extra time for the manufacturing process and are confident we will ship by the projected dates, but there is always a chance that things will take longer than planned. 2. Product changes: Slight changes may be made based on more product testing and Indiegogo community feedback. We'll only make changes that enhance the product experience. 3. Small components unexpected shortage can happen. In that case, we will inform you and do our best to solve the problem.Please also feel free to let us know your concerns, we look forward to hearing from the indiegogo community.Thank you for your support!

story:
Dansk tekst i bunden.

  Crestwing goes new waterways

In the film, it is described how wave energy does not currently contribute to the world power supply. There are several ongoing attempts but none of them have been successful. The Crestwing Concept is a completely new way of approaching wave energy research. It challenges the established methods, and brings to light some of the uncharted territory of wave energy extraction.

Crestwing’s core concept is to utilize the atmospheric pressure. The atmospheric pressure is created by the weight of all the air above us, and it creates a pressure of 10 ton per m² on the surface of the earth. These 10 tons act as a pull, if a vacuum is created. When Crestwing floats on the sea, there is no air between the bottom of Crestwing and the sea. When the wave starts falling, it pulls Crestwing with it, as if they were glued together. This process is comparable to the old wind turbines which used to be pushed by the wind. The new aerodynamic wind turbines use low pressure on the backside of the wing, just like an airplanewing. This method is far more effective than the old wind turbines. Wave energy also in general works through a push from the wave while Crestwing works by a vacuum under the hull. Crestwing's principle is hydrodynamic, which is due to the atmospheric pressure and is far more efficient than the plants that are solely due to the push from the wave, that is, Archimedes principle

A short film descriping how Crestwing works, and showing how it looks.

This is a complete revolution of the established method of wave energy extraction. We can not wait to show Crestwing´s effectivity and how  it works, and  bring it in as a co-player in the human effort to switch to fossil-free energy supply. Although Crestwing has been tested in many smaller models, Tordenskiold, as this prototype is named, is the first one close to full scale.

Tordenskiold has multiple purposes. The first one is to show that the anchorage and mechanical parts of Crestwing can survive the rough seas. The second purpose is to show the effectivity of Crestwing’s energy conversion.

A grid connection costs around 540.000 EURO, which is currently too high a cost for Crestwing to pay. This means Tordenskiold will not be connected to the power grid in the first phase, but the production will instead be measured, and the produced electricity will be dumped.

We have an extended data program where we can read, both on Crestwing and on the internet, the electrical production, forces in the vital parts, wave states etc. There is an alarm if Crestwing is not in the appointed position or if anything should happen to it. To show that Crestwing can survive the sea and have a high production of energy, it is vital to get as much data as possible.

Before the death of Henning, he was developing most of Tordenskiold, and he was almost done. But some final design decisions and calculation were still needed. Erik Bøgh, a senior maritime engineer, is indispensable in this final work. In the workshop Poul Bjørnager, with his skills and commitment, is unique.  

 

Technical specifications

Experiments have shown that Crestwing’s yearly energy production in the Danish Seas is around 1 million kWh, which is slightly less than the production from the Danish wind turbines. These data are from the tests, in the future there will be lots of work with development and optimizing of the power take of system. 

When the size of a wave is doubled, the energy in the wave is not merely doubled, but instead multiplied by a factor of 11. This means that Crestwing constructions made for seas with twice as large waves as the Danish waves, can reach an energy production of 11 million kWh. This is only achieved by very few wind turbines.

It is well known that the energy production from wave energy is much more stable than wind and solar energy. Where wind energy some years produce much less than predicted, and other years much more, wave energy has a more stable and predictable energy production.

The hull of Crestwing has been designed as a ship h­­ull. This makes it easy for any local shipyard to make the hull, so it does not have to be transported from inland. Because Crestwing is unreliant on the weight of the hull, one can always choose the cheapest material for the production.

When wind turbines and wave energy converters are put at sea, they are anchored by casting a concrete construction on the bottom of the ocean, which is expensive. Crestwing’s anchorage is instead screwed into the ocean floor. This makes the launch of Crestwing cheap. The anchorage is also easy to release, so Crestwing can be dragged into a shipyard for repairs.

If a mechanical error should arise, it is not as big a problem for Crestwing as with many other constructions. This is because Crestwing contains multiple generators, so if one fails, the energy production can continue, until repairs can be made. Because of the design of Crestwing, a repairman can easily dock on to Crestwing and enter it.

 

We are working in three steps.

October 2017

 

Launching Tordenskiold

 

81.000 EURO

 

2017-2019

 

Development and maintenance of Tordenskiold

 

242.000 EURO

 
2018-forward Engineering and funding the full scale Crestwing 5.400.000 EURO

 

Inventor and founder of Crestwing

Henning Pilgaard

19/6-1944 - 08/09-2016

In 1972 Henning Pilgaard finished his education as mechanical engineer and hereafter worked at Odense Steel Shipyard Lindø. Already in his time of study he was interested in renewable energy and after the energy crisis in 1973 he began, in his spare time, to work with a grassroots organization regarding conversion from fossil fuels to renewable energy in the municipality of Kerteminde.

Since 1982 Henning  worked full time promoting the transition to renewable energy, and among other things launched and finished many complex renewable energy projects, including two of the first wind turbine farms in Denmark, the regional energy project "Bornholm a green island", biogas plants, gas-engines based on CHP plants, and finally he has been developing and realizing the WEC Crestwing.

 

Co founder

Ruth Bloom

Ruth has been committed to working to preserve the environment and promote renewable energy since she in the beginning of 1980, became aware of the giant consumption of resources. She has the educations of blacksmith, teacher, 3D constructer and book keeper. She has participated in all parts of the process regarding the realization of Crestwing. Ruth and Henning were married for 28 years and they worked side by side with Crestwing and many other environmental projects and now she has taken over the management of Crestwing after his death. It is important for her and the world to complete their life work.

 

Chairman of the Board

Peter Høstgaard-Jensen

Peter has been the Director of Elsam which is the Danish electrical company in Copenhagen and is and has been in countless boards regarding renewable energy.

A short documentary from 2011, telling the story of Crestwing.

  Crestwing går nye bølgeveje

En kort film, der fortæller om Crestwings historie og mål
 

Som fortalt I filmen er der ikke noget bølgeenergi i verden som bidrager til elproduktionen. Der er forskellige forsøg, men der har endnu ikke været et gennembrud. Crestwingkonceptet er banebrydende ny tankegang inden for bølgeenergiforskningen og gør op med tidligere tiders fastlåste tankegang om, hvordan man kan udvinde energi fra bølger.

Den grundliggende idé bag Crestwing er at udnytte atmosfæretrykket, som giver en potentiel kraft på 10 ton per m². De 10 ton pr m² opfattes og måles som et sug eller et undertryk. Da der ikke kommer luft mellem anlægget og havoverfladen, ligger anlægget som limet til havoverfladen. Man kan sammenligne det med vindmøllerne. Mens de gamle kornmøller blev skubbet af vinden, virker de nye møller ved, at der skabes et undertryk på bagsiden af vingen. De trebladede vindmøller er aerodynamiske som en flyvinge og langt mere effektive end de gamle møllevinger. Bølgeenergi i almindelighed virker gennem et skub fra bølgen, mens Crestwing virker  ved et undertryk under anlægget. Crestwings princip er hydrodynamisk, og er langt mere effektiv end de anlæg, som udelukkende beror på skubbet fra bølgen, altså Arkimedes princip.

 

En kort teknisk film, som viser anlægget, og forklarer hvordan det virker

Crestwings koncept er en revolutionær tankegang, som gør op med den etablerede metode for bølgeenergi produktion. Derfor glæder vi os til at vise at Crestwing er det anlæg, som har evnen til at bringe bølgeenergi ind som en medspiller i menneskets bestræbelse på at komme over på en fossilfri energiforsyning.

Selvom anlægget er testet i mange mindre modeller er "Tordenskiold" som anlægget hedder den første i tæt på fuldskala.

Først og fremmest skal den vise, at den kan klare miljøet til søs og at forankring og hængsler holder. Derefter, at den er effektiv til at optage energi fra bølgerne og effektiv til at omdanne den optaget energi til El. Vi forventer naturligvis stadig meget udviklingsarbejde fremover.

Tordenskiold vil ikke blive tilsluttet elnettet i første omgang, Et kabel til el-tilslutning koster omkring 5.000.000 DDK produktionen vil blive aflæst og elproduktionen vil blive tilført en dump load.

Vi har et udvidet måleprogram, hvor vi kan aflæse data, både på anlægget og på land hvor meget el den producerer, kræfter i vitale dele, bølgetilstande osv. og alarm, hvis anlægget ikke er i position eller hvis der sker andet. Det er vitalt at vi får så meget data som muligt.

Før Henning døde var der arbejdet med alle områder af udviklingen af anlægget, men der manglede stadig de sidste beslutninger vedrørende design og beregninger på forskellige områder. Her er Erik Bøgh, som er senior maritim ingeniør, uundværlig.
I værkstedet er Poul Bjørnager en enestående kapacitet med sin viden, faglige færdigheder og engagement.

 

Lidt tekniske detaljer

Crestwings årlige energiproduktion i dansk farvand, er målt til at være omkring 1 million kWh, hvilket er lidt under de danske vindmøllers produktion i et godt år, og det samme som i dårlige år. Disse produktionstal er fra de udførte testresultater, der vil fremover være masser af arbejde med videreudvikling og optimering af power take off systemet. 

Bølgeenergi har den egenskab, at ved en fordobling af bølgernes størrelse, vil der være 11 gange mere energi til rådighed. Dette betyder, at i farvande med dobbelt så store bølger end de danske, vil anlægget kunne producere op imod 11 millioner kWh, hvilket kun få møller kan i dag.

 Det er alment anerkendt, at strømproduktionen fra bølgeenergi er meget mere stabil end vind og solenergi. Dette gør, at hvor vindenergi nogen år producere væsentlig mindre end forventet, og andre år producere væsentlig mere end forventet, vil bølgeenergi have en stabil forudsigelig produktion.

Crestwings skrog er designet som et skib. Det gør, at ethvert lokalt skibsværft vil kunne producere skroget, og det derfor ikke skal fragtes langt for at blive sat i vandet. Derudover er vægten af anlægget uden betydning, så byggematerialet kan altid ændres, til det som er billigst på byggetidspunktet.

I modsætning til mange andre havanlæg, både vindmøller og andre bølgeenergianlæg, er Crestwings forankringssystem ikke støbt på bunden af havet, men derimod skruet ned i havbunden. Dette gør udsætningen meget billigere. Forankringen er også simpel at frakoble anlægget, så den nemt kan slæbes til et skibsværft til reparationer.

Inde i Crestwing er der mange generatorer, i stedet for blot én. Dette gør, at hvis der sker en fejl i en generator, vil anlægget stadig producere strøm, indtil en reparatør kan komme til anlægget. På grund af anlæggets design, er det nemt at lægge til, og komme ind i anlægget, som har rigeligt med plads til at gå rundt i og reparer anlægget.

Vi arbejder i tre trin:

Oktober 2017

 

Søsætning af,Tordenskiol

 

700.000 DKK

 

2017-2019

 

Udvikling og vedligehold af Tordenskiold

 

1.900.000 DKK

 
2018-frem Projektering og produktion af en fuld skala Crestwing 40.000.000 DKK

 

Opfinder og stifter af Crestwing

Henning Pilgaard

19/6-1944 - 08/09-2016

I 1972 blev Henning Pilgaard færdig som maskiningeniør og arbejdede herefter i 10år på Odense Staalskibsværft Lindø. Allerede i sin studietid var han interesseret i vedvarende energi, og i forbindelse med energikrisen i 1973 blev han aktiv i græsrodsbevægelser omkring vedvarende energi. Dette arbejde udmundede i en rapport med beregninger og forslag på at omstille Kerteminde Kommune til fossil fri kommune.

Siden 1982 arbejdede han fuldtid med at fremme udviklingen af vedvarende energi, og forestod komplekse vedvarende energi systemer herunder projektering af de to første vindmølleparker, regionalprojektet ”Bornholm grøn ø”, biogasanlæg, gasbaseret kraftvarme anlæg og og de sidste tolv år realisering af bølgekraftanlægget Crestwing. Henning viede hele sit liv til, at være med til at skabe en grøn og humanistisk verden.

 

Med stifter

Ruth Bloom

Ruth har været optaget af miljøet og arbejdet for at fremme vedvarende energi siden hun, i begyndelse af 1980erne, blev klar over hvor stort ressourceforbruget er verden over. Hun er uddannet smed, lærer, bogholder og 3D-konstruktør. Hun har deltaget i alle dele af processen vedrørende udviklingen og realiseringen af Crestwing. Ruth og Henning var gift i 28 år og de har arbejdet side om side omkring Crestwing og mange miljøbevarende projekter. Ruth har overtaget ledelsen af projektet efter Hennings død. Det er vigtigt for hende og verden at fuldføre deres livsværk.  

 

Bestyrelsesformand

Peter Høstgaard-Jensen

Peter har været direktør for Elsam og er og har været med i utallige bestyrelser som har omdrejningspunkt omkring vedvarende energi.

En kort dokumentar fra 2011 om crestwing

Vi har et udvidet måleprogram, hvor vi kan aflæse data, både på anlægget og på land hvor meget el den producerer, kræfter i vitale dele, bølgetilstande osv. og alarm, hvis anlægget ikke er i position eller hvis der sker andet. Det er vitalt at vi får så meget data som muligt.
Før Henning døde var der arbejdet med alle områder af udviklingen af anlægget, men der manglede stadig de sidste beslutninger vedrørende design og beregninger på forskellige områder. Her er Erik Bøgh, som er senior maritim ingeniør, uundværlig.I værkstedet er Poul Bjørnager en enestående kapacitet med sin viden, faglige færdigheder og engagement.
 
Lidt tekniske detaljer
Crestwings årlige energiproduktion i dansk farvand, er målt til at være omkring 1 million kWh, hvilket er lidt under de danske vindmøllers produktion i et godt år, og det samme som i dårlige år. Disse produktionstal er fra de udførte testresultater, der vil fremover være masser af arbejde med videreudvikling og optimering af power take off systemet. 
Bølgeenergi har den egenskab, at ved en fordobling af bølgernes størrelse, vil der være 11 gange mere energi til rådighed. Dette betyder, at i farvande med dobbelt så store bølger end de danske, vil anlægget kunne producere op imod 11 millioner kWh, hvilket kun få møller kan i dag.
 Det er alment anerkendt, at strømproduktionen fra bølgeenergi er meget mere stabil end vind og solenergi. Dette gør, at hvor vindenergi nogen år producere væsentlig mindre end forventet, og andre år producere væsentlig mere end forventet, vil bølgeenergi have en stabil forudsigelig produktion.
Crestwings skrog er designet som et skib. Det gør, at ethvert lokalt skibsværft vil kunne producere skroget, og det derfor ikke skal fragtes langt for at blive sat i vandet. Derudover er vægten af anlægget uden betydning, så byggematerialet kan altid ændres, til det som er billigst på byggetidspunktet.
I modsætning til mange andre havanlæg, både vindmøller og andre bølgeenergianlæg, er Crestwings forankringssystem ikke støbt på bunden af havet, men derimod skruet ned i havbunden. Dette gør udsætningen meget billigere. Forankringen er også simpel at frakoble anlægget, så den nemt kan slæbes til et skibsværft til reparationer.
Inde i Crestwing er der mange generatorer, i stedet for blot én. Dette gør, at hvis der sker en fejl i en generator, vil anlægget stadig producere strøm, indtil en reparatør kan komme til anlægget. På grund af anlæggets design, er det nemt at lægge til, og komme ind i anlægget, som har rigeligt med plads til at gå rundt i og reparer anlægget.
Vi arbejder i tre trin:









Oktober 2017
 


Søsætning af,Tordenskiol
 


700.000 DKK
 




2017-2019
 


Udvikling og vedligehold af Tordenskiold
 


1.900.000 DKK
 



2018-frem
Projektering og produktion af en fuld skala Crestwing
40.000.000 DKK



 
Opfinder og stifter af Crestwing

Henning Pilgaard
19/6-1944 - 08/09-2016
I 1972 blev Henning Pilgaard færdig som maskiningeniør og arbejdede herefter i 10år på Odense Staalskibsværft Lindø. Allerede i sin studietid var han interesseret i vedvarende energi, og i forbindelse med energikrisen i 1973 blev han aktiv i græsrodsbevægelser omkring vedvarende energi. Dette arbejde udmundede i en rapport med beregninger og forslag på at omstille Kerteminde Kommune til fossil fri kommune.
Siden 1982 arbejdede han fuldtid med at fremme udviklingen af vedvarende energi, og forestod komplekse vedvarende energi systemer herunder projektering af de to første vindmølleparker, regionalprojektet ”Bornholm grøn ø”, biogasanlæg, gasbaseret kraftvarme anlæg og og de sidste tolv år realisering af bølgekraftanlægget Crestwing. Henning viede hele sit liv til, at være med til at skabe en grøn og humanistisk verden.
 
Med stifter

Ruth Bloom
Ruth har været optaget af miljøet og arbejdet for at fremme vedvarende energi siden hun, i begyndelse af 1980erne, blev klar over hvor stort ressourceforbruget er verden over. Hun er uddannet smed, lærer, bogholder og 3D-konstruktør. Hun har deltaget i alle dele af processen vedrørende udviklingen og realiseringen af Crestwing. Ruth og Henning var gift i 28 år og de har arbejdet side om side omkring Crestwing og mange miljøbevarende projekter. Ruth har overtaget ledelsen af projektet efter Hennings død. Det er vigtigt for hende og verden at fuldføre deres livsværk.  
 
Bestyrelsesformand

Peter Høstgaard-Jensen
Peter har været direktør for Elsam og er og har været med i utallige bestyrelser som har omdrejningspunkt omkring vedvarende energi.

En kort dokumentar fra 2011 om crestwing

story:
iMuto S5 was designed with lightweight and portability in mind, in a modern, minimalist style.

Our team believes that design must expertly combine form as well as function. It weighs only 2.1kg but provides 50,000mAh capacity with 7 ports. It’s the perfect power-ready solution for a one or two days outdoor trip, such as an afternoon picnic, weekend camping, fishing, trekking or as an emergency standby power source at home.

 

"We don't typically follow Indiegogo projects, but the iMuto S5 Portable Solar Power Station follows on the heels of some existing products that show serious promise. The iMuto S5 claims 50Ah and 180Wh of power geared primarily for mobile devices. It even has an optional solar charging system. "
                                                                                                                   ——Clint DeBoer, Protool Reviews

While there are many USB portable power packs available, many lack the versatility or the charge capacity to handle serving the power and charge needs for multiple devices and for extended periods of time. The iMuto S5 Portable Solar Power Station which just launched on Indiegogo looks like a possible solution and a game changer for me.

                                                                                                                 ——Julian Perry, The Gadgeteer

 

iMuto S5 has a battery capacity of 50,000mAh/180W and a total output of 260W. It will be the best companion for your outdoor life.

 

Unlike other power supplies with USB ports only, iMuto S5 has added capacity for home use together with mobile device power for family camping trips, traveling, or extreme expeditions. In addition, the iMuto S5 makes a reliable backup power supply for disasters and emergency situations. It is powerful enough to keep your cooler, lights, life-saving medical devices or other essential gear running during power outages.

No matter where you go, you can take iMuto S5 with you. Charging and recharging are simple. Collect and store power using the wall charger, a car, or directly from the sun!

Fast Re-charge

You can safely recharge iMuto S5 in 6 hours using wall charger, 9 hours using car charger (DC, 12V, 5A), or 15 hours using solar panels (DC, 18V 3A).

*Data under standard testing conditions STD：1000W/m², AM 1.5, 25 °C（38000-40000LUX).

iSolar Panels

iMuto S5 sets you free from the grid with anytime solar charging. Recharge iMuto and power up your devices anywhere using the free, limitless, and environmentally-friendly power of the sun. Long camping trips, off-grid areas and remote travel with reliable power are now possible.

 

For ease of use, iMuto features a clear, easy to read LED display. In this way, you can estimate charging and runtimes at a glance. A real-time input and output calculator keeps you informed with the charging status at all times.

Be prepared for an emergency with iMuto ready. In the past two years, iMuto products have helped hundreds of disaster survivals with their power supply. We are glad to help the people who went through Hurricane Harvey and Irma in 2017 & magnitude 6.7 earthquake at Hokkaido, Japan.

 

Compatible with iM-Power Technology, iMuto delivers fast simultaneous device charging. Charging is not only faster but even safer with iMuto S5. iMuto features an air cooling system and BMS battery management system, along with built-in protections from overheating, overvoltage, and short circuits to charge effectively and safely at all times. 

iMuto S5 is powered by the same type battery cells as Tesla EV - Li battery, which features ultra-long battery life and large capacity. Meanwhile, we’ve upgraded its safety performance with our comprehensive protection system and advanced battery management system to ensure that you are safe and sound in use. 

 

 In 2019, iMuto S5 won the prestigious CES Innovation Award and Reddot Award for its innovative and aesthetic design.

 

 

*Choose the appropriate Plug type for your iMuto S5. To deliver the best iMuto experience, currently we don't ship to country or region that is not in the list below. 

Kindly note that: for US 110V,  the AC output on the top is 3 prong. 

 

Shipping notice:
The imuto S5 has started shipping now.
1. imuto S5 US110V Order, Order for United States and Japan have been shipped by sea, it will take a long time to send the parcel to you .
please be patient.
2. imuto S5 US110V Order, Order for Canada and Taiwan have been shipped by air package, it is expected to arrive within 10 working days.
3. imuto S5 UK220V & Universal 220V have also been produced and packaged in succession and ready to ship, it will ship by air package, please be patient.
