Rocket Math Heater relates generally to an improved wood combustion heater. The method of wood combustion has been changed and is more efficient and sustainable.
A Rocket Math Heater offers almost the complete combustion of the wood. When wood is burned it releases volatile gases that we recognise as creosote or smoke and the Rocket Math Heater sucks these volatile gases into combustion tunnels and a combustion firebox of the unit where they combust. This action is known as the secondary combustion and it releases even more heat energy to power the ‘rocket’ process.The remarkable sucking of the flames down into the firebox resulting in a 'roar' is what gives the rocket stoves their name. The Rocket Math Heater combustion system is very cheap to run. The combustion area only burns the bottom of the feed tubes and as the wood burns vertically, only a small portion of wood is burnt at a time. They offer the almost complete combustion of wood, meaning they are hyper-efficient and burn super-clean and they can reach very high temperatures while only using small and medium diameters of timber. There would be no need to cut whole trees down, we could just harvest tree branches year after year. This way, we can save millions, potentially billions of trees.  Rocket Math Heater vs Conventional HeaterThe main difference between a normal wood heater and a Rocket Math Heater is that the rocket combustion is close to complete. When wood is burned it releases volatile compounds that we recognise as smoke, soot or creosote. In a Rocket Math Heater these compounds are sucked into combustion tunnels and a combustion firebox of the unit where they combust, releasing even more heat energy to drive the ‘rocket’ process, unlike a normal wood heater where they are blown out of the chimney.Rocket Math Heaters are improved by an operable auxiliary combustion chamber coupled to the main combustion chamber. The auxiliary combustion may further comprise an air supply conduit supplying air beneath the fuel chute, allowing lots of oxygen to be drawn into the unit. As the fire starts, and the burn tunnel heats up, the rising hot air races up the combustion chamber, drawing lots of air behind it. This incoming air flows into the feed tube and across the burning wood, creating the same effect as pointing a big air-blower at your fire. It gets really hot while the wood burns beautifully, and you can hear the air roaring as it charges through the system.In conventional wood stoves the air intake is small and adjustable to make them even smaller. This lack of oxygen chokes the combustion, leading to cool burns, incomplete combustion and lots of smoke and creosote. When combustion is complete, what comes out the chimney is pretty much only carbon dioxide, meaning no smoke: smoke means incomplete combustion, unburnt fuel or wasted energy. We are culturally trained to associate smoke with fire but with Rocket Math Heaters, where there is no smoke, there is still fire!Having ensured there is complete combustion and maximum heat generation, we then think about using wood heaters.Conventional wood heaters suck heat away from the combustion chamber for cooking and space heating but with ‘wet back’ water heaters, the unit just can’t get hot enough for combustion to be complete, resulting in lots of smoke.That is how a Rocket Math Heater differs from normal wood heater. *The picture show smoke from a conventional wood heater.Rocket Math Heater vs Rocket stove and Rocket mass heaterThe Rocket Math Heater is different from Rocket stoves and Rocket mass heaters because Rocket stoves are too small to heat a large space and Rocket mass heaters can heat large spaces but can not be manufactured and has to be built on a building site. The Rocket Math heater is able to be manufactured and also able to heat a large space. The Rocket Math Heater is basically an all in one combustion system.You and me can help save billions of trees from the wood fuel plantations, but keep wood industry jobs because medium sizes of wood requires more labor to split but requires less cutting down of trees and trees to not be cut down. Costs of action and inaction, which is the smart way?The NSW EPA reported that the additional health costs attributable to the impact of wood smoke by 2030 could be up to $8 billion in NSW alone. In addition to the economic costs associated with wood smoke there are the impacts on individuals to consider. Costs of action and inaction, which is the smart way?We need action before it’s too late. The Rocket Math Heater offer complete combustion, what comes out the chimney is pretty much only steam, meaning no smoke. The story of a cockatoo can save billions of trees.A cockatoo tried to put out a bush fire with her wings by dampening them in the river. She flew ten thousand times in and out from the river to the fire, all day and night.Her heroic gesture touched one of the great angels from heaven.The angel came to the fire and asked her “How come you can put out the bush fire with just a few drops from your wings each time you carried from the river?“In this stage, this is the only way I can put out the fire, if you have a better way, please do it, or I will have to go before the fire takes over and it will be too late!” The cockatoo answered.The great angel was very satisfied and created a heavy rain that put out the fire.They saved hundreds and thousands of lives and billions of trees in that forest.     Planning for force majeure and contingent conditions. Every family should have at least one Rocket Math Heater in their house or keep one in a shed for emergency use in some circumstances, such as you can not get electricity, petrol and firewood logs somehow! Rocket Math Heater can still help you and your family survive during that force majeure and contingent conditions. "We look after nature, she'll look after us, in this century we are beginning to realize that, in order to survive, we must protect it. The Rocket Math Heater really is an amazing asset for you and your family"  We can save billions of treesOur goal is 35,000 backers, maybe this is another daydream but we stay positive. Once we succeed in our campaign, we will choose local manufacturers to produce the Rocket Math Heater’s series to encourage some big brands of heater companies to lead the market and change our heating methods with Rocket Math Heater to save billions of trees.We are just like that cockatoo and you are our angels, we believe thousands of cockatoos and angels together can make a dream come true. We need your help to help our beautiful planet. Trees play a very important role in global warming solutions. You can save billions of trees in one click of a button. Order here to join us engage with our global family as Rocket Math Heater fans to support our beautiful planet. We need your help to help our beautiful planet.The world's most valuable gift for the person you love the most.The Rocket Math Heater last for decades. The Rocket Math Heater can save money from firewood consumption every year. The Rocket Math Heater can save millions to billions of trees for the usage of wood fuel.Only when we start to protect nature, we can then survive.Order now you won't be disappointed, Rocket Math Heater really is an amazing asset for you and the person you love the most. Rocket Math HeaterThe biggest innovation in the wood heater in 200 yearsTechniques as simple as a rocket stove, but much more powerful than rocket stove.           How does it work?There are only three simple steps to make your home cozy and then you can enjoy your relaxing lifestyle. Step One First load: load the firewood into the main combustion firebox.     It can reach very high temperatures within 10 minutes.    Step Two Second load: load the firewood into the auxiliary feed tube.    It creates a rocket jet fire from those sticks.This incoming air flows into the feed tube and across the burning wood, creating the same effect as pointing a big air-blower at your fire. It gets really hot while the wood burns beautifully, and you can hear the air roaring as it charges through the system. The combustion area only burns the bottom of the feed tubes and as the wood burns vertically, only a small portion of wood is burnt at a time.This is why we can save millions, potentially billions of trees every years.   Step ThreeThese pieces of firewood are the only pieces you will need for the second load and it lasts for 4 hours.Load two long pieces in auxiliary feed tube and three short pieces in the main firebox.     Now enjoy your cozy and relaxing lifestyle.    Risk & ChallengesAlthough this is our first time to participate in the Indiegogo campaign, we have enough confidence. the product design is straight forward and production is no stranger to us. We believe that our experienced team can well mitigate all potential risks in this journey. When do we start shipping?Estimated delivery of our first products will be shipped from our local factory in October 2019.Do you offer Warranty ? Yes, we offer 10 years Limited warranty against factory defects. How much does shipping cost?Shipping is set to $320 to $360 due to the fact that we ship from a local factories in Australia and in the USA. It is also one of the reasons why we keep our prices so competitive, as there are no intermediaries between you and the factory.NB: Application of extra shipping costs:  if you are in a “difficult to ship area”, such as remote locations, extra shipping costs may be applied. Please also note that some destinations, such as remote islands, can prove simply impossible to ship to. If you think you live in a hard-to-reach location, then please contact us before placing your order.Why is my wood heater spec’d with a component that differs from that listed on your site?The Rocket Math Heater is still in its prototype stage, so some components are subject to change if we find better, more suitable replacements. Once past this stage, we will continue to reserve the right to switch components for ones equal or higher in value. The purpose of this is to ensure that the customer continues to get the best value wood heater for the price.  Why does the new design make a big difference?They offer gravity feed without electricity.They only burn a portion of wood, so is highly efficient.They give no need to cut entire trees down for wood fuel.Human beings changing heating methods will save billions of trees. Why is it the same size of a heater but Rocket Math Heater is a little bit more expensive?The new design of wood heaters need new test reports and two auxiliaries cost extra materials, the decor cover for those two auxiliaries to make sure the Rocket Math Heater is a piece of art in your house. On the other hand you get money back from firewood consumption when you use the heater. Why do we need 35,000 backer for our goal?We need to lead the future market to prevent environmental impacts from cutting trees, or the market will keep the same heating method for many years until it is too late to realize why we haven’t changed it straight away years ago? What is our plan?After this campaign we would like to license as much as possible to all the manufactures to produce these kind of models. We would like to replace old heating methods and to prevent cutting millions of trees down.  Does the Rocket Math Heater only use medium sizes of timber for fuel?Actually the Rocket Math Heater is a multi-functional wood heater, an all in one wood heater including conventional wood heater, rocket stove, rocket mass heater, wood pellet heater and more. That means you can use multiple sizes of timber for the Rocket Math Heater.  Additional questions? Contact us at hello@orroro.com

story:
The LMX 161-H is the first ultra-lightweight electric freeride motorcycle.

The product

With a weight of 42kg in homologated version, the LMX 161-H is half the weight of combustion bikes of similar performance such as 85cc cross bikes.

Developed in France for riders and by riders, the LMX 161-H is optimized for extreme off-road use.

 

 

Now we need your help to reach for the next big step: making it street legal.

With this campaign we will fund the certification of the bike to enable registration as a L1E-B (50CC) moped in Europe.

While the bike will not be street legal as a moped in the US when it ships, we will offer the option to have working pedals that makes the LMX 161 a motor assisted bicycle in most US states, with reduced power and top speed. You can also use your LMX 161 as an offroad motorbike, and still get your bike much cheaper than the regular price!

Features

The LMX 161 uses a mix of the strongest downhill MTB parts and the lightest motorcycle components to reach both light weight and great reliability. All the parts selected are validated to comply with L1E-B requirements.

L for Lightweight

Having a off-road bike so light changes everything about offroad riding, making the ride experience much closer to downhill MTB, no hills needed.

 

Accessible to all riders

The weight makes it easy for beginners or first time riders to have fun with limited risks. The bike also features two ride modes : ECO, and Boost.

In ECO mode, the maximum power limited to about 3000W, making the bike very easy to control and safe for all riders. Flip it in Boost, and the full 8000W of electrical power is available for maximum performance.

Street legal

Ride safely and legally thanks to homologation, and be covered in case something happens on or off-road. Reach new trails and landscapes right from your home, and make your commute a lot more fun. For the US, the optional pedal attachment enables to use the bike as a motorized bicycle.

High Performance

The LMX 161 is a high performance motorcycle, with acceleration comparable to a 85cc offroad motorbike. With over 300 N.m at the back wheel available from zero RPM, the LMX 161-H really takes advantage of the electric drive train characteristics.

The linkage suspension provides a progressive leverage ratio, giving the bike good suspension performance for high speed bumps and rough landings.

Quick swap battery

Ride longer using multiple batteries, or bring your battery up to your apartment for charging.

 

Having a quick swap battery makes it easy to keep your LMX 161 charged. The 12 kg battery is released by a key lock and features a strap for easy handling. The light weight of the LMX 161 without the battery enables easy loading in your car or on a bike rack.

Low maintenance

The electric drive train and Igus® Iglidur® dry bearings makes the LMX 161 low maintenance and long lasting compared to other high performance off-road bikes.

The Samsung® 30Q cells used in our battery are rated 300 cycles to 75% of initial capacity at full power. This translates to about 750 hours of competition track time on a battery pack, and more than 40,000km of street use.

Thanks to forward planning in the bike's design and advances in battery capacity, the LMX 161-H battery will be upgradable in the future.

With electronic engine braking, the wear and tear on the brake pads during most braking situations, and about 5-10% energy can be regenerated.

Full Specifications

Optional pedal attachment for LMX 161-H

The optional pedal attachment gives the LMX 161-H working pedals, to use it as a motorized bicycle in most US states with restricted top speed and power, usually 750W and 20mph max. Check your local regulations for more details.

The attachment bolts in place of the footpegs and features a 120 mm wide bottom bracket with crankset and pedals. A freewheel installed on the motor axle enables to use the engine without spinning the cranks. The system is designed to pedal up to 5km/h, pedaling at higher speed is not possible due to high reduction ratio. 

Switching between pedals and foot pegs is possible by design.

This item will be available as an upgrade before the bike ships for 350€+VAT

Shipping & Taxes

Shipping such a bike internationally is not easy. When packed, the LMX 161 fits in a parcel 140x40x90 CM and 55kg. The battery has to be sent separately with special shipping service for overseas orders.

We already shipped complete bikes in Europe and overseas. We know the challenges and costs it involves, and we are confident that we can handle it for this campaign.

All bikes will ship from our assembly line in France, or affiliated LMX dealers.

The shipping will be billed before sending the bikes out, and with the VAT amount for EU customers.

For backers peace of mind, we guarantee the maximum shipping charges as follow :

  • France : MAX 120€+ VAT
  • EU : MAX 250€+ VAT
  • USA and canada : MAX 750€
  • Rest of the world : MAX 1200€

If the cost is lower, the actual cost of shipping will be billed, if it is higher, we will handle the extra charge.

For overseas customers, import taxes may be billed. Depending on the country, those taxes can be from 0% to 17%.

Risks and Challenges

Crowdfunding will enable us to finance:

  • Industrialisation from 50 frames per year in 2017 to 150 complete motorbikes per year in 24 months
  • Homologation in European Union including full EMC testing
  • Technical and aesthetic improvements
  • Parts Stock → reach MOQs
  • Reduced lead time on components and completes bikes orders in the future

We have self-funded about 30% of the certification program.

 

The tools for the serial frames are in progress, we have already served more than 220 customers worldwide since 2014.

 
  • We already have stock for many components :
  • Motors
  • Hubs and rims
  • Transmission components
  • Electrical components

Our requirement for product quality are high

 
  • We only use components validated by long-term tests in situ : we ride those bikes hard
  • Performance and durability of the battery, controller, motor has been validated
  • We will keep spare and tuning parts available for the fork, transmission and bike components, suspension springs
  • Assembly and quality control will be handled in our French workshop (Frontonas, Isere)

Testimonials

Industrialisation and suppliers selection

    We started selling the offroad LMX 161 in January 2017, and since that we produced in our French workshop 25 frames in 3 batches.

    This production enabled us to know the challenges associated with production of the frames, and enabled us to make big progress on the industrialisation of the production. Now to reach the next step we have to get the frames produced externally.

     

    Since 2014, we worked with different frame manufacturers, in Eastern Europe and in Asia. With this experience in internal and external frame production we will be able to bring the costs down and increase the quality.

    Timeline

    Delivery date and guarantee

    • The preorders will be shipped from May 2018 according to the preorder number (first paid, first delivered)
    • We will offer upon request purchase order slips from our webshop for orders placed on the campaign.

    About the company and team

    LMX bikes was founded in 2014, as a collaboration between Adam and Lucas. Lmx is the trademark of the idea of a Lightweight Moto Cross (MX)

    MS Systemes SAS is a French company registered at the RCS Vienne, founded by Adam and Lucas in 2016 to enable further developments of the LMX Brand. More than 50 frames and complete bikes were sold since then.

    In 2016, we developed a new MTB model with a patented dual drive system and we shifted to producing our bikes with aluminum frames, which make the bikes lightweight and durable. As a result, new and improved version of the LMX freeride motorcycle was born: the LMX 161.

    In the first 6 months of 2017, 25 of the new bikes models were delivered. We are continuously improving our bikes every day to make quick progress on the quality and performance.

    FAQ

    Spare parts

     

    A lot of the parts used on our bike are standard coming from DH and MX industry: the suspension, the tires, the brakes pads, and so on.

    We always stock all the parts you can’t find elsewhere (motor, transmission, frames, batteries and electrical power components) to perform quick aftersale service procedures.

     

    Bike maintenance

     

    Thanks to its electric powertrain, the LMX161 is very low maintenance compared to similar gas powered dirt bikes.

    The checkpoints are similar to a Downhill bicycle maintenance: tire pressure, suspension and brake cleaning and checking, chain lubrication and tension adjustment.

    There is no particular maintenance required on the motor, battery and electrical devices of the bike.

    An owner manual with detailed maintenance procedures and spare parts information will be sent with the bikes.


    Order slip

     

    Every indiegogo backing will be converted to an order on our webshop www.lmxbikes.com at the end of the campaign.

    Backers will have access to order status, billing and after sales service through the webshop.

    At this step, EU citizen customers will be charged of VAT and shipping fees before product delivery (Shipping and packing fees only for non EU foreign customers)


    Warranty

     

    According to our sales conditions, each product have a 2 year manufacturer warranty starting from product delivery (bill emission date) This warranty covers the all the bike parts excepted the following components:

    Batteries and electronics have a limited 6 month warranty.

    Consumable parts such as tires, brake discs and pads, chain and sprockets have no warranty on normal product using related wear.

    Warranty would be cancelled in case of water damage, shock damage or if any technical modification occurred on the product.

    In this case and after warranty delay, the customer will have to pay the spare parts, factory repair and shipping fees.

     

    Factory pick up

     

    Every backer can pick up the product at our factory without charge.

    In case of transportation company pickup of complete bike at our place, we will only charge €80 for product packing.

story:
Bref résumé

Le Togo est un pays à faible couverture forestière (6,8% de taux de couverture forestière en 2010) qui malheureusement a un taux élevé de de pertes relative de surface forestière dans le monde (5,1% entre 2000 et 2010). Chaque  année, le pays perd 15 000 ha de forêt contre 3 000 seulement reboisés ;

 En effet l’accentuation de la pauvreté conduit souvent à l’exploitation des ressources naturelles plutôt que de se soucier de les préserver. Dans les zones rurales, certaines pratiques agricoles ont de lourdes conséquences sur l’environnement. La recherche des ressources énergétiques (bois de chauffe) et l’agriculture sont les principaux moyens de survie des populations.

Ce phénomène est plus accentué dans la préfecture de Vo entrainant la destruction des forêts existantes et l’irrégularité des pluies dont les effets directs sont  la baisse de la production agricole et la pauvreté accrue.

Pour remédier à cette situation, l’ONG Jeunes Volontaires pour l’Environnement (JVE) réalise des activités promotion des foyers améliorés afin de lutter contre les changements climatiques, la déforestation et la désertification ainsi que la mise à la disposition des communautés des sources d’énergies renouvelables dans la préfecture depuis 2006.

le présent projet vise à permettre à chaque ménage d’avoir accès aux foyers améliorés à bois de chauffe dans deux (02) communautés à savoir ANEVE et MASSEKOPE. Ces deux communautés seront déclarés smoke free (sans fumée) à l'issu du projet. les fonds collecter serviront à réaliser des activités du projet telles que:

- l'organisation quatre (04)  séances de sensibilisations

- l'installation de mille (1000) foyers dans les ménages des deux communautés

- la formation de dix (10) promoteurs des foyers dans chaque communauté (qui vont assurer la continuité de l'activité à la fin du projet dans les villages voisin). Ceci constituerait un AGR pour les promoteurs

-  l'organisation de deux (02) émissions radios sur l'importance des foyers

 - l'organisation de deux (02) cérémonies de déclaration des deux villages smoke free

 - la confection des plaques d’identification des deux villages par rapport aux foyers....

 L'avantage des ces foyers est aussi le fait qu'elle permet  aux femmes de ne pas contracter des maladies liées à l'intoxication de la fumée.

l'expérience de l'ONG JVE dans les domaines de changements climatiques et des énergies renouvelables et surtout dans l'installation des foyers améliorés à bois (déjà installés dans onze (11) communauté au Togo) constitue un atout considérable pour la réussite du projet.
story_txt:
Bref résumé
Le Togo est un pays à faible couverture forestière (6,8% de taux de couverture forestière en 2010) qui malheureusement a un taux élevé de de pertes relative de surface forestière dans le monde (5,1% entre 2000 et 2010). Chaque  année, le pays perd 15 000 ha de forêt contre 3 000 seulement reboisés ;
 En effet l’accentuation de la pauvreté conduit souvent à l’exploitation des ressources naturelles plutôt que de se soucier de les préserver. Dans les zones rurales, certaines pratiques agricoles ont de lourdes conséquences sur l’environnement. La recherche des ressources énergétiques (bois de chauffe) et l’agriculture sont les principaux moyens de survie des populations.
Ce phénomène est plus accentué dans la préfecture de Vo entrainant la destruction des forêts existantes et l’irrégularité des pluies dont les effets directs sont  la baisse de la production agricole et la pauvreté accrue.
Pour remédier à cette situation, l’ONG Jeunes Volontaires pour l’Environnement (JVE) réalise des activités promotion des foyers améliorés afin de lutter contre les changements climatiques, la déforestation et la désertification ainsi que la mise à la disposition des communautés des sources d’énergies renouvelables dans la préfecture depuis 2006.
le présent projet vise à permettre à chaque ménage d’avoir accès aux foyers améliorés à bois de chauffe dans deux (02) communautés à savoir ANEVE et MASSEKOPE. Ces deux communautés seront déclarés smoke free (sans fumée) à l'issu du projet. les fonds collecter serviront à réaliser des activités du projet telles que:
- l'organisation quatre (04)  séances de sensibilisations
- l'installation de mille (1000) foyers dans les ménages des deux communautés
- la formation de dix (10) promoteurs des foyers dans chaque communauté (qui vont assurer la continuité de l'activité à la fin du projet dans les villages voisin). Ceci constituerait un AGR pour les promoteurs
-  l'organisation de deux (02) émissions radios sur l'importance des foyers
 - l'organisation de deux (02) cérémonies de déclaration des deux villages smoke free
 - la confection des plaques d’identification des deux villages par rapport aux foyers....
 L'avantage des ces foyers est aussi le fait qu'elle permet  aux femmes de ne pas contracter des maladies liées à l'intoxication de la fumée.
l'expérience de l'ONG JVE dans les domaines de changements climatiques et des énergies renouvelables et surtout dans l'installation des foyers améliorés à bois (déjà installés dans onze (11) communauté au Togo) constitue un atout considérable pour la réussite du projet.

story:
A multidisciplinary team for a complex need

Today's frontline workers engaged in the fight against Ebola in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC) must before all think about their own safety before taking care of their patients. This is due to their personal protective equipment (PPE) being inappropriate for the demanding conditions faced in tropical climates in developing countries. Overheating and exhaustion while working, self-contamination during the critical undressing procedure, lack of human and empathic relationship with patients are typical issues faced by healthcare workers in their daily work.

The team   


Esther: Medical doctor at MSF, responsible for tropical diseases


Danny: Scientist (PhD) and humanitarian, R&D project manager at MSF


Manu: Medical doctor at HUG, specialized in virology and infectious diseases


Franz: Founder and CEO of SF Tech, manufacturer of dry suits for divers in demanding environments


Matthieu: Engineer at EPFL's EssentialTech Centre

We are medical doctors, engineers, entrepreneurs and humanitarian responders engaged in developing a personal protective equipment allowing healthcare workers caring for patients infected by the Ebola virus to perform their work in a safe environments.

The institutions we belong to are world leaders in their domains: 

  • EPFL - the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Lausanne - is among the top universities worldwide, especially in engineering. EPFL's EssentialTech Centre was created with the goal to develop essential technologies that have the potential to reduce poverty and vulnerability. Its approach combines technology development with the elaboration of innovative business models for a sustainable and large-scale impact.
  • HUG - the Geneva University Hospitals - are host to the Centre for Emerging Viral Diseases, and have state-of-the-art diagnostic facilities, including a biosafety level 4 lab (BSL-4D). They have unique expertise in infectious diseases, and successfully treated a patient brought back from Sierra Leone by the World Health Organization (WHO) in 2015.
  • MSF - Médecins Sans Frontières - is an international, independent, medical humanitarian organisation that delivers emergency aid to people affected by armed conflict, epidemics, natural disasters and exclusion from healthcare. MSF offers assistance to people based on need, irrespective of race, religion, gender or political affiliation. MSF actions are guided by medical ethics and the principles of neutrality and impartiality. MSF is one of the leading organizations in Ebola response worldwide.
  • SF Tech possesses a long experience in the design and production of dry suits for professional scuba divers. This experience in the design of tailor-made solutions, for demanding environments and activities is particularly important for this project.

 

               

 

 

The solution

 

 

To address the safety issues linked to the multitude components of the PPE, especially those protecting the head and face area, we have designed a one-piece suit with a large face shield. This single-piece design greatly simplifies and accelerates dressing and undressing procedures. The latter is particularly crucial, since healthcare workers are exhausted - sometimes dehydrated - when they leave these suits, which makes them more prone to making mistakes if the undressing procedure is complex, thus increasing the risk of self-contamination with infected fluids remaining on the suit.

 

SmartPPE also features a ventilation system to keep the temperature inside the suit bearable. The air is filtered and brought directly to the face area, which prevents fogging of the face shield.

 

Finally, our solution is also reusable, contrarily to most items of currently used PPE. This means less hassle for procurement, storage and especially for waste disposal. But it also means a reduced cost in the long run for a better suit. The PPE can be disinfected using locally available infrastructures, i.e. essentially a bucket of chlorinated water, and reused up to 100 times.

 

The suit we are developing has already undergone several rounds of prototyping, has benefited from the long experience of SF Tech in designing suits for adverse environments and has undergone several reviews by field experts from MSF. It is now ready to enter a final testing phase in specialized laboratories to validate its protective performance in the conditions faced in Ebola treatment centers in DRC, before it can be safely sent to the field.

We need your support to carry out this critical phase before the project can be safely transferred to our industrial partner and the suit can start being used in the field, where it is most needed.

 

Are you ready to join us?

Your contribution today will help us get solid evidence that our suit is tough enough for the very demanding environmental conditions encountered in DRC. More importantly, since our solution is reusable, to cut down waste and costs, the tests we have planned will guarantee frontline workers that even after dozens of use, washing and disinfection cycles their equipment is as safe and performant as new. And because a project like this with multiple partners and institutions requires a strong pilot, we will look for the best possible leader to make this suit field ready.

 

In return

Traditional crowdfunding campaigns will reward your support with one of the items you will help produce. We do not think that you are interested in having an Ebola PPE for gardening or walking your dog. The perks we are offering reflect our expertise in our fields (like the waterproof laptop protection or the rugged water purifying bottle) as well as the human relationships we want to put at the heart of what our suit enables, by giving you the opportunity to meet us and discover the environment in which this suit is developed.

 

Bring this suit where it is needed

 

By carrying out this critical testing phase, we will then be confident to tell healthcare workers that they are safe to wear this suit when attending Ebola patients and that they can enjoy its benefits - more time at the patient's bed, more human relationship with them, focus on their work rather than their safety.

The biggest Ebola outbreak in the history of DRC is still ongoing, despite the availability of vaccines and treatments. One of the reasons for this is the difficulty to engage communities and build trust  to convince patients and potentially infected people to attend an Ebola treatment center. This difficulty comes in part from the lack of human relationship between caretakers and patients, because patients can only see healthcare workers' eyes - most of the time through fogged up goggles. Making our suit available in the field will help counter this, thanks to the large face visor, kept clear by the constantly ventilated air.

story:
Are you a frequent traveler like us, or do you bring your laptop to work outside but often start to look for the power supply? Have you ever been afraid of running out of the power before arriving to your final destination? RoySmart is born to solve this issue!

RoySmart is the ultimate versatile travel backpack with a built-in charging station. It brings you an unparalleled fast charging experience unlike any other backpack ever. RoySmart can charge all your portable devices in minutes on the go. What’s more, it provides you a 6-level anti-theft protection and relaxes your journey.

 

RoySmart Comes with built-in 15600mAh rechargeable PD battery to charge all your devices fastly and easily. The detachable battery module is designed for any occasion and perfect for your business travel.

 

  • The Right Bag for Biz Travel

External type-C USB port & Built-in Type-C USB cable offer a convenient way to charge your portable devices anywhere no matter inside or outside.

 

  • Daily Use 

 

  • Entertainment

 

  • Advanced Fast Charging

RoySmart adopts advanced fast charging technology and meets both the QC 3.0 standard and Power Delivery standard to charge your devices just in a few minutes. The external Type-C Port can support both input and output, so RoySmart can be recharged through the external Type-C Port easily without taking out of the battery.

 

  • Monitoring LED Light

The pretty cool bag uses Red, Orange, Blue and Green to show remaining power capacity.

Mixed with Bluetooth Finder, TSA Lock, Side Wire Lock, Cut-Resistant Fabric, Secret Pockets, and Hidden YKK zipper, RoyPack provides 6-level anti-theft protection and always gives you the peace of mind. You can completely relax and enjoy the wonderful scenery along your trips or travel.

 

  • Smart Anti-theft via APP Reminder

With Built-in Bluetooth Finder Module at the bottom of the backpack, you can connect RoySmart with your phone through an App easily. When your backpack is leaving without noticing, you will get a ringtone alert from your phone.

 

 

  •  Other Key Anti-theft Features

Integrated TSA Lock and retractable Side Wire can lock your backpack safe on the luggage carrier. There are also the hidden pockets in the sides and the back. You can put your valuables items such as wallet, phone, passport, keys etc. into the pocket.

 

  •  Super Compartment
RoySmart comes with five major storage compartments plus 2 additional packing cubes for clothes, tech, toiletry wash stuff and more.
  
  • Carry as much as 30L

Big enough to pack all your electronic devices and daily necessities.

 

  • Wash Pouch for all personal hygiene products
     
  •   Ergonomic Designed Shoulders to decrease the stress.
 
  •   Night Security

The RoySmart Lite has Reflective Bar on the back and it will make sure you travel safely during the night. The Monitoring LED Light on the RoySmart Pro can be set up with a flashlight to remind others to keep a safe distance.
 

  • Double Layer Rain Protection
RoySmart adopts the patented waterproof material and it is also equipped with a rain cover. It will keep your belongings away from the pouring rain.

story:
You can find the Media kit and Press Release here. 

 

AirZen is an indoor device that improves your quality of life by monitoring and adjusting your personal space air quality and fragrance. Our complex air purifying technology allows you to remove air pollutants, allergens, germs, dust, smoke and unpleasant smells from your environment. With AirZen you will always have a clear mind and the ability to breathe easily.
 

AirZen personal air humidifier for your home and office is the best solution to clear the air in your environment and improve your quality of life. Our warm and cool mist humidifier will make your dreams of a more pleasant environment come true and create a healthy breathing space. AirZen humidifier works within a radius that is just enough to turn your personal space into a favourable microclimate.  

 

AirZen personal air humidifier for your home and office is the best solution to clear the air in your environment and improve your quality of life. Our warm and cool mist humidifier will make your dreams of a more pleasant environment come true and create a healthy breathing space. AirZen humidifier works within a radius that is just enough to turn your personal space into a favourable microclimate.   

Low humidity level intensify the development of viruses and harmful particles. The use of humidifier prevents the risk of the illnesses, allergic reactions and air pollution. In addition, u can use physical solution or seawater which prevent viruses diseases and are a great form of illnesses prevention.

Air purification is one of the fundamental ways that help us to stay positive all day long. In answer to the growing concern about a comfortable and healthy environment in a world full of airborne toxins and pollutants, we have designed a device that incorporates all of the functions necessary to achieve a clean air environment in everyday use. AirZen HEPA filter air purifier is ideal for users with respiratory conditions, allergy sufferers and people living in contaminated urban areas with growing environmental problems.

Air Purification by an advanced 3 layers filter. It can capture up to 99% harmful particles, protect from viruses and smog, residual mites and odor. It can remove pollen, absorb formaldehyde, ammonia, toluene and other gases.

AirZen is also an aroma diffuser for essential oils. It has a specifically designed slot for organic essential oils. This allows you to experience personal aromatherapy without interfering with other peoples’ breathing space.

 

During non-working hours, the ionization mode can be turned on to improve the quality of the environment either manually or automatically.  This freshens the air and significantly reduces airborne pollutants as small as 1 micron, such as allergens, pollen, mould, smoke, pet odours, lingering smells, dust, and other airborne irritants.

 

Multifunctional AirZen device 5 in 1 is controlled via a mobile application on your phone. Choose the most desirable option from the provided presets and AirZen will begin its work. A variety of fragrances is available in our app shop section. You can check your air quality by tracking such parameters as: CO2 level, temperature and humidity. AirZen is a technologically advanced air and weather station. However you like your environment, with AirZen, you’re in control!

 

 

Aromatization is a great prevention from viral diseases, bacteria. It enriches the air with healthy molecules.

Essential oils are recommended for recreational use, and enhance both mood and clarity of mind. Our 6-Pack collection includes 10ml Eucalyptus, Lavender, Lemon grass, Orange, Peppermint, Tea tree, and more! The oil diffuser is the real deal for your personal environment and social gatherings, providing a calming mood and pleasant memories. You can learn more here about our  essential aroma oils.

 

 
There are 3 filters in the Air Zen: the sponge filter, carbon filter and HEPA. Using filters that meets HEPA standards, the device will begin destroying allergens, bacteria, bad odours, toxic gases and viruses, alleviating asthma, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), and poor air quality for everyone. Carbon filtration also helps to reduce odours further and absorbs volatile airborne pollutants.
We recommend changing the filter regularly. When using the device for 2-8 hours a day, the filter will last from 3 to 6 months, depending on the severity of the pollution of the room. The mobile application will inform you when the filter needs to be changed.
 

It saturates the air with negative ions, which improves the air quality. Dust, particles and viruses settles on horizontal surfaces. All u need after – is to do a wet cleaning.

 

 

Our mission is to help people to live healthy life and to be happy. We are working in the field of climate equipment and want each single product to have high standards of quality. 

 

Risks and Challenges

The day-to-day world needs motivation to enable all of our dreams, ideas and insights into clean-air solutions to come true. Our creative team is ready and waiting to shoulder the enormous demands and to fulfil all our obligations during the production and order stages. We understand all the natural risks and technical difficulties, issues in the supply chain and the challenges that feedback brings.
AirZen has been preparing for a long time and we are now ready to make a great impression! You can relax and stay positive and well informed as we’ll do our best to satisfy all your needs. Design, custom, application, hardware – It’s easy when you have the passion and love for our product that we do! AirZen is the art and you are the creators!

story:
As Mary Lou Cook says ‘Creativity is inventing, experimenting, growing, taking risks, breaking rules, making mistakes, and having fun.’ That’s why X-Power is an ideal DIY kit for everyone to unleash your creativity and challenge your mind. You can build a working 4-stroke and 2-cylinder engine all by yourself just like a professional mechanic. All pieces are made with high-quality aluminum and they are very precise, which provides you a wonderful craftship experience.
 

  •  Fresh Hands-on Review From American Tech 

Build A Working Engine All By Yourself

Making a 4-stroke and 2-cylinder engine step by step and having a better understanding of the core principles of machine operation. 

 

 

Enjoy The Incredible Fun Of Assembling

More than 100 parts can allow you to demonstrate the application value of a machine virtually, and also get more hands-on experience than ever.
 

 

Explore The Spirit of Craftsmen

Every part needs to be assembled by yourself. Figuring out what parts should be assembled together or refitting parts to improve performance, such experiences will teach you something new.
 

 

Unlock Your Potential

X-Power unlocks your creative potential, from RC models to daily gadget kit, gaining from the process of building.

 

 

Inspire Your Creativity

Your creativity is unlimited! X-Power gives you thousands of possibilities to be creative.
 

 

X-Power is an amazing DIY experience that helps you relieve daily stress. When you work with X-Power, everything else fades away and a new world is yours!
 

 

X-Power is a build-it-yourself kit that includes every single nut, bolt, and everything else required to assemble a working engine and explore your creativity. From beginner to expert, it is a fun way to explore DIY and create your first engine kit.

 

 

Exquisite Model

X-Power has a highly simulated appearance and it’s much closer to a real engine, which can bring you brand-new fun!

 

 

Practical Use

Running Up to 16,000 RPM, X-Power can boost your RC models performance, applicable to 1:10, 1:12, and 1:14 scale models.
 

 

Lightweight Structure 

The weight of the whole engine kit is 590g. Lightweight structure design can be better compatible with RC models, greatly improving the unit power outer ratio.
 

 

Build-in Water Cooled Design

With the built-in water-cooled system, X-Power has a large conversion potential and no need to worry that the engine is overheating.
 

About Toyan

Founded in 2015, TOYAN Co.,Ltd, is specialized in the development and manufacture of mini engines and model simulation cars. Toyan has been in the model engine technology industry for over 4 years, and its main products include single-cylinder engines, four-cylinder engines, and metal base sets.

 

The company has an elite R&D team, and a huge production base with a wide range of products. Since the establishment, TOYAN has won reputation and trust from thousands of customers through advanced production technology and a well-established service system.

TOYAN is constantly looking for innovative ways to improve existing products for model players and promote the continued development of engine models.

As Mary Lou Cook says ‘Creativity is inventing, experimenting, growing, taking risks, breaking rules, making mistakes, and having fun.’ That’s why X-Power is an ideal DIY kit for everyone to unleash your creativity and challenge your mind. You can build a working 4-stroke and 2-cylinder engine all by yourself just like a professional mechanic. All pieces are made with high-quality aluminum and they are very precise, which provides you a wonderful craftship experience. 

 

 
 
 Fresh Hands-on Review From American Tech 
 

 

 

 

 

 
Build A Working Engine All By Yourself
Making a 4-stroke and 2-cylinder engine step by step and having a better understanding of the core principles of machine operation. 
 

 
Enjoy The Incredible Fun Of Assembling
More than 100 parts can allow you to demonstrate the application value of a machine virtually, and also get more hands-on experience than ever. 

 
Explore The Spirit of Craftsmen
Every part needs to be assembled by yourself. Figuring out what parts should be assembled together or refitting parts to improve performance, such experiences will teach you something new. 

 
Unlock Your Potential
X-Power unlocks your creative potential, from RC models to daily gadget kit, gaining from the process of building.
 

 
Inspire Your Creativity
Your creativity is unlimited! X-Power gives you thousands of possibilities to be creative.

story:
Trimatis - From Plastic Waste to 3D Space

Since our conception in early 2018, Trimatis LLC, has become a  leader in creating sustainable 3D printing solutions.  With our 4 Phase strategy, we deliver cost effective innovation to schools and educators, while helping the environment one bottle at a time!

_____________________________________

 

 

There are a lot of awesome people in the world working on sustainable 3D printing methods. The problem is that most of them are recycling 3D printer plastic. That's great, but it doesn't go far enough.

_____________________________________

What is 3D Printing Anyway?

You've probably heard people talk about 3D printing, but maybe you don't know what it is.  Here's a simple explanation:

3D Printing is great technology, but it adds to the amount of plastic polluting our environment and also generates a lot of waste.

 

________________________________________

Plastic Pollution

 

Did you know that only 9% of plastic is recycled?  A National Geographic story found that 91% of the plastic we create ends up as trash or litter. 

Even the bottles you put out to the curb every week end up as trash.  And a lot of it ends up in the ocean.  In fact, every minute, the equivalent of one garbage truck full of plastic is dumped into our oceans. 

 

 

So the question is not only how we clean up our oceans, but how do we prevent plastic pollution in the first place?

 

That's where we come in!

 

______________________________________

 

 

Here at Trimatis, we've developed a patent-pending process to create 3D printer Eco-filament from your plastic bottles - that's right, we collect your plastic bottles and repurpose them.  We not only cut down on the amount of plastic in our oceans, but also reduce the amount of new plastic generated.

 

 

_____________________________________

Can we make an impact?

 

YES

Using our process, we can make a spool of filament from 80 plastic bottles.

 

 

 

 

____________________________________

You can make a difference!

 

 

 

 

____________________________________

​How You Can Help

 

Your generous donation will allow us to grow so we can provide a more sustainable way to 3D print to schools and universities, who are already using 3D printing in their curriculum.

Our dream is to not only help the environment, but empower a whole new generation to understand the importance of sustainability in everything they do.   

 

We will initially generate two revenue streams, consisting of the distribution of our Eco-Filament to schools and universities, with whom we've already established relationships, as well as the delivery of  educational workshops on 3D printing and sustainability.  

​

To keep up with demand, we'll need your help to scale up our operations.  Part of our costs have already been covered by utilizing the owners' equity.  We also are blessed to have incubator space allowing us to operate rent-free.​

 

  ​

 

____________________________________

Job Creation

 

As we scale-up our operations, we will hire a work-force from the local community to collect and sort plastic waste. 

As we expand our customer base, we'll create manufacturing jobs to ensure continued product quality and excellence in order fulfillment. 

 

____________________________________

Who Are We  

 

Trimatis, LLC

Our combination of technical expertise, a strong commitment to education, environmental stewardship, and helping others, make us the right team to tackle this problem. ​

 

​​

________________________________________

 

We appreciate your donation!

 

You can also help us out by getting the word out and sharing this campagin with your friends, coworkers and families!

 

 

This crowdfunding campaign is part of The Great Social Enterprise Pitch, a friendly competition facilitated by ASSETS and the Lancaster County Community Foundation. The Pitch consists of social enterprise ideas based in Central Pennsylvania. A Social Enterprise is a market-based, income-generating enterprise that aims to solve a social and/or environmental problem through its business activities. Social enterprises focus on a triple bottom line:  people, planet, and profit. Upon completion of the Crowdfunding phase of the competition, 5 ideas will be chosen to move on to the Live Pitch, during which the contestants will present their ideas to a panel of judges, with winners receiving a package of cash and pro-bono prizes. In 2017, winners received over $50,000 in cash and pro-bono prizes. In addition, all participants have agreed to donate 5% of their total raised funds from their crowdfunding campaign to ASSETS.

 

Please visit www.lancasterpitch.com for more information.

 

To access to the crowdfunding sites of all participating social enterprise ideas, click here: https://www.indiegogo.com/partners/SocialEnterp....

story:
FIRST SKYDIVING SPEED RECORD IN THE JET STREAM

Promoting untapped wind energy on TV

 

The Challenge

The jet stream is one of the most powerful energy sources of our planet, but most of us are not aware of this high-altitude wind power. How could we spread this information on a global scale?

The Solution

Create a world record skydiving mission in the jet stream, capture the story in an action packed documentary. As with other films Claudio has made, the programme will be broadcast on an international news channel such as BBC World News TV.

We will take off, but we need some extra cash to cover the documentary production budget and the balloon ride

Our sponsors will help us make the exploration a reality.
However, we are relying on crowdfunding support for the film production and potentially for the relocation to Australia if we can't jump in Switzerland before mid-March 2018.


The adventure in a nutshell

  • Goal: Flying forward in freefall as fast as possible by using the jet stream as a tailwind!
    Raise awareness about the untapped clean energy potential of the jet stream.
  • Stunt: First human flight (skydive) inside the jet stream.
  • Skydiving Suit: No wingsuit, just a normal skydiving suit.
  • Skydiver: World Record Holder Marc Hauser
  • Aircraft: Hot air balloon
  • Altitude: approx. 34,000ft / 10'000m above sea level
  • Temperature: -50° Celsius/ -58 °F
  • Wind speed: +80kn | +150 km/h (hopefully even faster)
  • Expected forward ground speed: +200 m/ph | +320 km/h 
  • Place: Switzerland or Australia (after mid-March)
  • Date: This winter/springtime 2018
  • International media partners




My dream - flying the jet stream


Marc Hauser, born 1971, lives in Bern, Switzerland and has two adult daughters.

Marc is an entrepreneur, an adventurer and a skydiving pioneer. In 2012 he created the Speed-Tracking discipline and reached a horizontal speed of 304 km/h, 188 mph without tail wind. This is still an unbroken world record in forward speed for a skydiver without wingsuit. 

First World Record by Marc Hauser 2012 over Empuriabrava, Spain: 304 km/h | 188mp/h

As JET STREAM SUPERMAN Marc is now looking for the strongest possible tailwind in the jet stream to beat his own 2012 record and explore the energy potential of high-altitude wind-power.


Documentary filmmaker Claudio von Planta

Claudio von Planta is a star himself. He filmed Star Wars actor Ewan McGregor and Charley Boorman on motorcycle journeys around the world and across Africa. Claudio was the third guy on the bike in Long Way Round and Long Way Down.  Now he will produce a documentary about Jet Stream Superman, which we are confident will be broadcast on an international TV channel, such as BBC World News.


Ewan McGregor | Claudio von Planta | Charley Boorman

MEDIAPARTNERS

We will be looking to licence the documentary to a number of TV channels, among them BBC World News, which has shown an interest in this story and where Claudio has been honoured to have his films shown previously.

 

  • KEYSTONE Agency

They started to cover the preparations in Switzerland and will provide agency news about Marc's record jump to many media organisations in Europe.

KEYSTONE interview with Marc Hauser in Crans Montana, Switzerland winter 2017/2018


Why we need your support?

Your support will help us to take off and jump and produce an awe inspiring film that will be seen around the world on some of the most prestigious channels available.


What we need

Budget positions:

  • Skydiving training in Spain: travel, accommodation, car rentals etc.
  • Hot air balloon training and jumps
  • Risk Insurances
  • Special Equipment: cameras, thermal protection, clothing
  • Additional crew for the film production: extra cameramen, editors, graphic designers

Most likely this crowdfunding campaign will not close the holes in our pockets but it will allow us to produce a better documentary and this will be essential to inspire a global audience.


Film and event production budget

A broadcast quality documentary shot on various international locations typically costs $4.000 USD per minute. BBC World News TV has expressed an interest in acquiring our film as 3 x 22 minute programmes. That's a production budget of $264.000 USD. But first we have to finance the production on our own.

Fortunately a highly experienced freelancer like Claudio can survive on a smaller budget because he is used to film, direct and edit on his own. However, at rock bottom Claudio will still need about $40.000 USD to cover a minimal fee and his expenses for equipment, travel and accommodation. In addition he will have to hire some extra crew and equipment for a multi-camera shoot to capture the finale of Marc's record jump. 

Claudio will also have to hire experts to polish the post-production of the film because professional colour grading, music and sound-design will be essential for a broadcast quality film. These indispensable cost for extra manpower will add another $10.000 USD to our budget.  

  • For the film production we are aiming to raise $50.000 USD
  • If we can't jump in Switzerland we will need an additional $30.000 USD for expenses to relocate our event to Australia.
  • We are looking at a total of $80.000 USD


What you get

With our campaign you will be part of a journey towards the new field of high altitude wind power. That makes you an explorer as well. And you can be on board of our hot-air balloon!
At least your picture/ your logo can.

You can get

  • Vouchers for FORMEX Swiss watches
  • Links for the film documentary
  • 24-karat gold leaf directly from the jet stream
  • Personal Thank-You-Videos
  • Swiss watches (limited mechanicals, this perk is coming soon)
  • Private workshops with Marc or Claudio via Skype
  • Advertising space on the jet stream balloon basket poster
  • Breathtaking jet flights and meetings with the team in Australia
     

Hot-air balloon training in Switzerland 2017 with Raphaël Granito | Marc Hauser | Tom Naef
 

The energy background of the jet stream

High-altitude wind power could be the answer to our energy problems.
Just a small part of the jet stream power could make the job.
There are innovative companies like TWINGTEC involved in this new business field.
They do not reach jet stream altitude yet. But it's a first step towards a brighter future.

 

For our documentary we also visited the Weathermuseum near Berlin, Germany. They still hold the high altitude world record for kites at jet stream levels of 31.955ft | 9740m.

The record was set in 1919. Imagine: This world record kite reached jet stream altitude!
In 2016 Bill Gates mentioned the jet stream as one of the "energy miracles" of the future.

 

The meteorology of the jet stream

The jet stream over Switzerland can be really strong.
What we need is a combination of good weather on the ground, not too much clouds in the air and fair winds at 34.000 ft/ 10'000m above sea level. Sounds like a piece of cake? It's not.

 Our meteorologist Dr. Ralph Rickli, a highly experienced expedition weather forecaster.

At Windy.com you can check the jet stream at your place in realtime.
 

The risks

Skydiving can be dangerous.
But skydiving from above 30.000 feet is even more risky.

We have to deal with

  • low density air and oxygene levels - danger of hypoxia
  • temperatures below -50° Celsius/ -58 °F
  • commercial and military airplanes at these flight levels
  • and heavy winds - that's what we are looking for

Scary moments before exit


The solution

Training and preparation is everything.
We established a team with the best experts in aviation.
From N°1 ranked hot air balloon pilots to riggers, oxygen specialists, military doctors, and freefly camera men. But the adventure still remains dangerous.

Hot-air balloon of Swiss champion Stefan Zeberli

 

Why we will be the game changers?

It all comes down to mass when you want to accelerate in freefall.
That's why I had to gain weight. By the way, that was one of the best parts of the adventure.
Now with my giant size of 200cm/ 6'7'' and my 110kg/ 242 lbs I am a living cannonball.
I am by far not the best skydiver. But my body makes me pretty fast.
As a good skydiver you could try to catch me in freefall. But it could be physically impossible.

With 20 years of experience as a glider pilot and single engine pilot I have a good understanding of aerodynamics. And my Swiss bullhead gives me the mental power and will to succeed.


 

Pressure chamber test at Swiss Army:
Claudio von Planta | Stefan Zeberli (hot air ballon pilot) | Marc Hauser


We will takeoff anyway - so why should you contribute?

Since we are already on stand by for takeoff you may think:
"Let them do their job and I will enjoy the show."

No, we would miss a crucial trick.

To capitalise fully on the broadcast opportunity with BBC World News and win maximum global attention we need to complete and release our documentary as soon as possible.

Speed is everything like for Marc in the jet stream. We will have to hire extra man power to finish our post-production with tight deadlines . Your crowdfunding support will  make that possible.

Where do we take off and land?

Until mid-March we can start and land in Europe. We plan to take off in Germany, the jet stream will bring us over Switzerland, where I will land with my parachute. And the balloon will fly to Italy and land in the region of Milano.
 

Plan B is Australia

Form mid March onwards the thermal winds will be too strong for a balloon flight in Europe during daytime. Then we would have to re-locate to Australia. This option would give us some nice new opportunities... but as well some extra expenses, for sure.
The fundraising for the Australian Plan B Budget of 20k could become our second goal after mid March.
 

Steve Gale, our jet pilot and supporter when we will have to re-locate to Australia.
 

The two jets of Steve Gale in Australia.
We are planning a formation flight with 2 jets, 1 hot air balloon, 1 skydiver.
Good to know: Steve is a committed fan of our project and he is offering these expenses...


After the successful jump: Spreading the word!

As an adventurer I am on stages as a keynote speaker on a regular basis. - Not so much during the last months of the training. This will change after completing our mission in the sky!
I am already looking forward to spread the word about our fascinating clean energy project.

Marc Hauser at TEDx in Hamburg, Germany

 

How you can support us without money

We are more than happy to get your attention for our project.
And if you could share our Website or the campaign link you could do us a huge favor!
Thank you so much. 

 

What could happen if we don't reach our funding goal?

We would start crying. Then we would takeoff anyway.
But here is the real problem:

  • The post production of the documentary after the jump would take ages.
    The reason for that: we could not hire additional post-production experts to support Claudio.
  • We could not afford 3D-graphics and smart animations to illustrate the complexity of this clean energy phenomenon and the technology background of the jump
  • Therefore a lot of viewers would miss the sustainability point
  • I would try to play the guitar and Claudio would try to sing the background music. We both are pretty sure one should avoid that experience.

And last but not least we would never ever start an adventure funded by ourselves again.
Not because it was not funny, it really was! - But because our pockets would remain empty.

"See you soon - at the other side of the jet stream."

Marc Hauser | Bern Switzerland | February 2018

 

Thank you so much for your contribution and support!
You are our TRUE heroes!



FAQ's

Please feel free to ask your questions about our adventure. We will answer them asap.
