story:
Short Summary

Welcome to MaSEG, I’m Richard Kilgore, inventor of the Magnified Solar Energy Generator.

My education is in Business and Electrical Engineering.

My background also includes construction, manufacturing, wholesale and retail sales.

In 1977, I had an idea, an idea to develop solar energy without using solar panels while producing efficiency more than four times greater than other solar devices. Right out of the gate I realized, solar energy only works when the sun’s shining, so I had to overcome that obstacle first. And, In order to be efficient and cost effective, solar energy must be converted into other multiple forms of energy, and then, used in conversion to electricity.

After many long hours of research and development and tens of thousands of dollars, I discovered how to generate electricity 24/7, continuously, with a MaSEG unit. Until now, solar panels and solar devices could not give you that capability.

We have come a long way, through times when people thought that solar energy wasn’t even feasible, thinking, there couldn’t be enough electricity produced to really make a difference. Politics, business and our environment have gone through a total transformation with no real answers in sight to questions remotely related to solar energy. In 1977, renewable, green energy wasn’t feasible or even heard of for that matter, but today, not only is it feasible, it can also be efficient and cost effective with a MaSEG unit, in any size or output.

A Patent Application was filed August of 2011 and now it has become necessary to defend that patent to its completion. Along with that defense, the purpose of this project is to build a MaSEG unit that will supply 20 homes with electricity well below the prevailing kWh market price while paying for itself in 2 to 5 years depending on your local pricing by selling extra power on the grid. This will be our first residential production model.

This initial project is to get MaSEG off the ground and into production. Pledges and/or donations are not to be used as profit. All donations will be used for research, development and associated costs to get MaSEG ready to become a marketable product to help people everywhere.

With people like you, who are interested in renewable, green energy, less oil dependency or maybe just a clean environment, we can complete MaSEG while helping our friends and neighbors around the globe.

Man is not meant to walk alone. I’m not asking you to walk behind me or ahead of me. I’m asking you to walk with me arm and arm together, so we can make great strides in making solar energy available everywhere.

Thank you for your interest, if you participate with us, the world will thank YOU for MaSEG and for making our world a better place for everyone. Be sure to view the MaSEG videos and updates to keep up with all the details and don’t forget the perks for your donations to reach our goals, “they are awesome”.

We need your help in getting the word out about this MaSEG project. So tell everyone you personally know through emails, casual conversations, phone calls and social media. Without you, we cannot move forward with completing our patent or building our first residential production model.

Come walk with us and one day we will run together, knowing we made a huge difference in our world.

           

Click Link below to see How MaSEG Works

 http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/magnified-solar-energy-generator/x/4252642?c=gallery#1

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • This initial project is to raise $250,000 to get MaSEG off the ground and into production. Pledges and/or donations are not to be used as profit. All donations will be used for research, development and associated costs to get MaSEG ready to become a marketable product to help people everywhere. We will use our accounting firm to audit our expenditures and keep everyone updated until all donations have been accounted for.

 

  • Our perks are very unique due to their magnitude. Check them out.
  • At $25 and up you will receive a MaSEG T-Shirt.
  • At $200 and up you will recieve a Purchase Agreement for savings from $10,000 up to $41,000 as donation levels progress.
  • At $500 and up you will receive a small working model of our Solar Steam Generator like our original prototype.
  • At $5,000 and up in addition to all the before mentioned Perks, you will be listed in our publications as a MaSEG Backer.
  • At each level from $500 up, the Purchase Agreement grows exponentially.

 

  • In case we do not reach our intended goal.
  • We will use the donations to defend the patent. 
  • Get started on building the first residential MaSEG Unit.
  • Then, we will start another campaign to move forward with approvals and manufacturing.

 

The Impact

Our main focus is on people helping people. That includes children, homeless, battered, abused, the elderly and those that are less fortunate around the globe.

  • Electricity can be generated for your use at home and extra sold on the power grid for an ongoing income of $1,500 to $3,000 monthly with a Residential MaSEG Unit.
  • Commercial MaSEG Units can be used to supply power to businesses, hospitals, schools, churches, subdivisions, towns and cities of any size.
  • Containerized Emergency MaSEG Units can be delivered to disaster areas within hours, set up and generating power within hours after delivery as well as areas without a power grid.
  • People living in remote areas will have an opportunity to have electricity maybe for the first time ever.

 

The Success Track

It took a lot of trial and error to develop the first working prototype of a solar energy generator just to get it to the point of using solar energy only when the sun was shining. After about 12 months it came together and proved that in fact, it could be done. The next accomplishment came a little quicker. Over the next 6 months manufacturers of off the shelf products such as steam engines, generators and batteries were located. Don't forget, this was in the late 1970's. Over the next 5 years I developed a solar collector, a heat transfer unit and a boiler. Then due to the lack of funding and the lack of interest the project slowed to an almost standstill. "I could not let it go." It stayed on my mind until the 1990's with very little progress. Then I started trying to get a patent. Three years of hard work, research and development went into getting it ready for patent but it was not ready for patent. It was really only feasible at that point for desert-like environments. The focus then shifted to developing a way to generate electricity 24/7, continuously. Finally in 2010, I solved the problem, came up with the name Magnified Solar Energy Generator, (MaSEG) and filed the patent August of 2011. So it has been now 36 years since the original idea. I cannot give up; it is a God given project to help the world. I must see it through as long as I'm around and then leave it to someone else to continue on with MaSEG.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't help with a donation, we still need your help in getting the word out about this MaSEG project. So tell everyone you personally know through emails, casual conversatons, phone calls and social media. Without you, we cannot move forward with completing our patent or building our first residential production model. Go Tell, the World is waiting!

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to communicate with others!

And that’s all there is to it.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Welcome to MaSEG, I’m Richard Kilgore, inventor of the Magnified Solar Energy Generator.
My education is in Business and Electrical Engineering.
My background also includes construction, manufacturing, wholesale and retail sales.
In 1977, I had an idea, an idea to develop solar energy without using solar panels while producing efficiency more than four times greater than other solar devices. Right out of the gate I realized, solar energy only works when the sun’s shining, so I had to overcome that obstacle first. And, In order to be efficient and cost effective, solar energy must be converted into other multiple forms of energy, and then, used in conversion to electricity.
After many long hours of research and development and tens of thousands of dollars, I discovered how to generate electricity 24/7, continuously, with a MaSEG unit. Until now, solar panels and solar devices could not give you that capability.
We have come a long way, through times when people thought that solar energy wasn’t even feasible, thinking, there couldn’t be enough electricity produced to really make a difference. Politics, business and our environment have gone through a total transformation with no real answers in sight to questions remotely related to solar energy. story:
WHAT IS Leaf Burrito® ?

Leaf Burritos are already being made and have been in use in Charlotte for over a year. When you buy a Burrito through our crowdfunding campaign, you WILL receive it whether we hit our Indiegogo flexible goal or not. Your support will fund mass production and our efforts to educate cities and municipalities about the importance of replacing non-recyclable single-use plastic as a receptacle for yard waste. 
Plastics are quickly destroying our planet!

 

The Leaf Burrito is an ingenious new yard debris system that makes the arduous task of bagging leaves, hedge clippings, weeds, sticks, and grass clippings be an incredibly simple and eco-friendly experience! It holds 4+ large lawn bags worth of leaves and starts completely flat for instant loading then burritos up with heavy duty zippers.

  • Reusable and eliminates single-use bags where the plastic film goes directly into the landfill.
  • Approved by the City of Charlotte for curbside servicing where they empty the burrito and leave it in your yard.
  • Made of our own custom heavy-duty mesh which will not collect water like plastic trash cans and paper bags.
  • 5 high-strength straps for easy dragging, carrying, lifting, loading & emptying.
  • 5 industrial-strength zippers with pulls and lanyards.
  • Holds 4+ large plastic bags worth of yard debris...and even more if you walk on it and crush it.
  • So incredibly easy to use that it makes it a breeze to keep up with your yard work more often.
  • Kids even love stuffing burritos.

 

 

WE ARE ON A MISSION

 

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

The Leaf Burrito is already in production! It's a real product in use today and we already have the support of a major metro, Charlotte, for the use of Leaf Burrito as a yard waste container.

So what are we going to use the funds for?

  1. Ramp up the production and reduce the cost of making Leaf Burritos with larger production runs. This will help us grow and deliver more Burritos to more people!
  2. Educate customers and cities about the impact of single-use plastic on the environment and our communities.
  3. Give back to the communities that support us by donating 5% of all funds raised AND 5% of future revenues, as the company grows, to local greenway development organizations.

 

SUPPORTED BY

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

You may not be able to contribute right now, but you can still help!

Please Share Our Planet Saving Campaign!

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We are so excited about this project. We’ve had many sleepless nights making sure that everything is perfect. Still, we can’t foresee every problem so we’re committed to fixing any challenges that may arise during the fulfillment process.

Product Manufacturing

  • We’ve produced many Burritos that have been tested by friends and customers alike.
  • We will maintain constant communication with our manufacturer to ensure on-time delivery and resolve any challenges that arise.

story:
A New Wind Energy!
WindJammer Energy, Inc. is a start up energy company. I am Greg Wilson, the president of WindJammer Energy. I have been issued the patent by the US Patent Office for a new type of wind energy called WindJammer Generators, the future of wind energy. I am a certified gas and diesel mechanic, studied construction engineering and worked as a job site supervisor, sailor, and long distance semi driver. I have combined my knowledge of automotive drivetrains and gear designs with sails and equipment on sailboats to make a new wind generator that produces electricity. Using my experience building bridges and driving coast to coast I have calculated how structures can support WindJammers Generators. About 15 years ago I realized how much energy is captured by sails on a sail boat. Working for years I developed a simple design that will adapt to its surroundings. New sailing equipment and electronics entering the market and building the new grid will make this wind energy possible now.

WindJammer Generators
WindJammers use large sails to capture wind energy and produce electricity where consumers use it. They are not wind turbines, do not look or operate like wind turbines. The Eco friendly quiet, slow moving sails and Base Units are bird, bat and people friendly. The big white sails capture wind energy which is transferred down a line in a reciprocating motion to the Base Unit that produces electricity. We use old sails off of sailboats or new sails that are made from recycled plastic, cloth, palm fronds, etc... The sails reflect sunlight back into space creating a big cool shadow helping to cool the planet. Pictures or art work can be displayed on the sails for an artistic vista or advertising. New sail plans are covered in the patent. WindJammers will be Made in the USA. To reduce construction costs the sails are made to fit local structures such as flag poles, live trees, houses, buildings, water towers, it can go really big on a radio tower. When the wind stops blowing helium balloons can lift large spinnaker sails into the sky catching more wind. New prototypes, including models for cars, are constantly being designed. Large WindJammers will produce more than 10,000 kilowatt per hour (kWh) powering 10,000 homes with a rapid payoff compared to the biggest 6,000 kWh wind turbines now built. We will be working with local business as WindJammers will use several different trades to build the prototypes. We are ready to build and market several different WindJammers.

We Can Build The New Green Energy!
We can change to a locally produced renewable energy. Producing electricity where it is consumed WindJammers will end power blackouts after disasters even when the grid is damaged. The US Department of Energy is starting work on building a new power grid for renewable energy. Our vision for WindJammer Energy is too expand across the country hiring employees, opening offices, factories, and working with local power companies to service customers. WindJammer's electricity can run water pumps supplying running water to undeveloped communities. Climate change and rising ocean temperatures cause extreme weather events. Superstorm Sandy was a small hurricane that combined with a Nor'easter causing billions of dollars in damages to the Northeast. There will be many more extreme weather events caused from burning fossil fuels and we must respond to raising CO2 levels and the terrible storms it causes.
President Obama stated in his inaugural address. "We will respond to the threat of climate change, knowing that the failure to do so would betray our children and future generations. But America cannot resist this transition; we must lead it."

Making the Change
WindJammer Generators will reduce our dependency on coal, oil, natural gas, nuclear power and hydroelectric dams. As the BP Deep Horizon sank it exposed the dangers of deep ocean drilling with the millions of gallons crude oil spilled into the Gulf of Mexico. Spraying 2 million gallons of Corexit dispersant to clean up the oil poisoned gulf coast residents and sea life. Shell's 2012 Arctic Ocean drilling attempt failed as storms blew the drill rigs aground. Burning coal and oil causes CO2 levels to rise and carbon black exhaust soot is turning glacier ice black melting it faster as seen in the movie "Chasing Ice". Mountaintop Removal Coal Mining has demolished over 500 Appalachian Mountaintops devastating ecosystems and water supplies. WindJammers can be install on trees living on the mountaintops with no environmental impact while saving the mountains. Old coal power plants can become WindJammer wind farms. Burning fossil fuels also cause cancers, lung disease, birth defects, etc… Drilling natural gas wells use dangerous fracking to get the gas and the equipment leaks methane, a greenhouse gas, into the atmosphere. Buildings blow up due to leaking natural gas causing death. Fukushima Nuclear Plants are leaking radioactive material that will take centuries to clean up, but the industry wants to build more nukes. The Columbia River hydroelectric dams block salmon reproduction forcing some species into extinction. WindJammers could turn the Columbia River Gorge into a 1,200 mile long wind farm making the dams obsolete. New technology takes time to change the market place. Do we have adequate time to save Mother Earth?

Go Green!
Donations for WindJammer Energy will be a catalyst, aiding America's transition to a new green wind energy. The success of this Crowdraiser will enable us to build the first prototypes and create a new fresh start for wind energy. We have set the realistic campaign goal at $30,000 but the real goal should be over $100,000. This is a start up campaign to see how well WindJammer Generators work and more campaigns may follow. Your donation is a down payment for your WindJammer Generator. Please donate and forward my Indiegogo Crowdraiser to your family, friends and contacts to make this a successful campaign. Even if you can't donate you can forward this crowdraiser helping WindJammer to have a successful campaign. A successful crowdraiser will reduce the wait time for your new WindJammer and a local office. Donors and helpers can join us at the Face Book group WindJammer Energy, Inc. for up dates and to share your comments. Your donation and efforts will help America end our obsession to fossil fuels. Only consumers can stop global warming and end climate change.

Help this Happen!
The funds collected from this crowdraiser will go to build WindJammer prototypes. We will start building small WindJammers first then work on larger designs as the campaign gains momentum. If the campaign fails to come close to the target, building new models will stop and we will contact manufactures to put the working prototypes on the market. A successful campaign will speed up development and delivery times. A very successful campaign raising over $100,000 will build many new prototypes and help WindJammer Energy rapidly expand across the country.
Depending on unit size and your location, delivery could be within one year in the US and North America.
I will be posting updates often on;
1. Indiegogo short link at igg.me/at/help-windjammer-energy-short-link
2. WindJammer's web site, www.windjammerenergy.com.
3. The Face Book group WindJammer Energy, Inc. for face book fans.
Please donate today as time is running out for a clean environment.
Time for people is running out.

Cree Prophesy,
Only after the last tree has been cut down
Only after the last fish has been caught
Only after the last river has been poisoned
Only after the air has been polluted
Only then will you find money cannot be eaten
Surely you want to leave your children and future generations a beautiful Mother Earth just like the planet you grew up on.

WindJammer Energy Perks will be very unique to this Crowdraiser.
1. Your donation will add your name to the customer and/or employee list. Every customer is a potential employee as the sails advertise the WindJammer Generator. The sales pitch starts as a smile as you say "Free Electricity"! There will be unlimited opportunities for advancement in this start up company. More customers in an area will increase the demand for additional employees creating advancement opportunities and a new local office.
2. Your donation amount is a down payment for a new WindJammer Generator and larger donations can speed up your delivery date.
3. You make a profit by selling electricity to the grid after the quick payoff.
The profits could be more than $5,000 per year from a single family home WindJammer.
4. A cleaner greener planet with Clean Air and Water.
***Additional perks are for larger donations:
5. A personalized picture post card of the first WindJammer Generator prototype from sunny Dunedin.
6. WindJammer Energy Hat(s) with the company logo.
7. A WindJammer Energy T Shirt(s) with a WindJammer picture and logo.
8. A WindJammer Energy Jacket(s) with a WindJammer picture and logo.   **The large Perks didn't fit in the perk box.                                                              The $1,000.00 donors receive 2 Hats, 2 T Shirts, 2 Jackets.                     The $5,000.00 donors receive 4 Hats, 4 T Shirts, 4 Jackets.

A successful crowdraiser will reduce the wait time for your new WindJammer and a local office. Donors and helpers can join us at the Face Book group WindJammer Energy, Inc. for up dates and to share your comments. Your donation and efforts will help America end our obsession to fossil fuels. Only consumers can stop global warming and end climate change.
Help this Happen!The funds collected from this crowdraiser will go to build WindJammer prototypes. We will start building small WindJammers first then work on larger designs as the campaign gains momentum. If the campaign fails to come close to the target, building new models will stop and we will contact manufactures to put the working prototypes on the market. A successful campaign will speed up development and delivery times. A very successful campaign raising over $100,000 will build many new prototypes and help WindJammer Energy rapidly expand across the country.Depending on unit size and your location, delivery could be within one year in the US and North America.I will be posting updates often on;1. Indiegogo short link at igg.me/at/help-windjammer-energy-short-link2. WindJammer's web site, www.windjammerenergy.com.3. The Face Book group WindJammer Energy, Inc. for face book fans.Please donate today as time is running out for a clean environment.Time for people is running out.
Cree Prophesy,Only after the last tree has been cut downOnly after the last fish has been caughtOnly after the last river has been poisonedOnly after the air has been pollutedOnly then will you find money cannot be eatenSurely you want to leave your children and future generations a beautiful Mother Earth just like the planet you grew up on.
WindJammer Energy Perks will be very unique to this Crowdraiser.1. Your donation will add your name to the customer and/or employee list. Every customer is a potential employee as the sails advertise the WindJammer Generator. The sales pitch starts as a smile as you say "Free Electricity"! There will be unlimited opportunities for advancement in this start up company. More customers in an area will increase the demand for additional employees creating advancement opportunities and a new local office. 2. Your donation amount is a down payment for a new WindJammer Generator and larger donations can speed up your delivery date.3. You make a profit by selling electricity to the grid after the quick payoff.  The profits could be more than $5,000 per year from a single family home WindJammer.4. A cleaner greener planet with Clean Air and Water.***Additional perks are for larger donations:5. A personalized picture post card of the first WindJammer Generator prototype from sunny Dunedin.6. WindJammer Energy Hat(s) with the company logo.7. A WindJammer Energy T Shirt(s) with a WindJammer picture and logo.8. A WindJammer Energy Jacket(s) with a WindJammer picture and logo.   **The large Perks didn't fit in the perk box.                                                              The $1,000.00 donors receive 2 Hats, 2 T Shirts, 2 Jackets.                     The $5,000.00 donors receive 4 Hats, 4 T Shirts, 4 Jackets.

story:
Why is this Bike the NEXT BIG THING?


Your Contributions Will Help....

us achieve the next step in bringing the Power Boost™ Bike to the
consumer market, setting up a production and distribution facility.

      What YOU get for YOUR contributions!


Power Boost™ Bikes Family Story

Our father had a vision of a motorized bicycle that doesn't need electricity, gasoline or batteries. A completely sustainable energy bicycle for all aspects of the world. A bicycle that would power itself without the use of electricity or gasoline and could be used in remote areas of the world that do not have access to electricity or gas powered engines. He also envisioned, with the touch of a throttle the Power Boost™ Bike could assist the everyday bicyclist with extra power for their bicycling adventures. With his international patent, his vision was to make the Power Boost™ Bike a worldwide option for sustainable energy and power for the bicycle while maintaining the healthy lifestyle of pedaling.

On a personal note...

"Our mission is important to us. I want to thank you for watching our video and taking the time to visit our campaign for the Power Boost™ Bike. I realize not everyone can contribute financially but if you can SHARE, GET THE WORD OUT AND TELL YOUR FRIENDS about OUR STORY we would really appreciate it." 
          Kathy

    Power Boost™ Bikes Foundation

    The Power Boost™ Bikes Family has a long term vision of....
    designing and manufacturing a specially-designed bicycle for rural and remote areas of the world.

     1/4 of the world has no access to electricity. Over a billion people worldwide lack adequate access to transport. Most live in rural areas cut off from markets, clinics, and schools. 

    It is our vision to create a foundation that would allow us to manufacture the Power Boost™ Cargo Bike and distribute this bike through our foundation to help increase mobility when journeys involve long distances, heavy loads or urgency of arrival, as is often the case in rural communities.

    A specially-designed cargo bicycle is an ideal low-cost, efficient and sustainable energy mode of transportation for the rural poor. Bicycling is three times faster than walking, with increased mobility in these regions, markets, schools and clinics would be within reach.



    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can’t contribute financially, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

    PLEASE HELP get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

    PLEASE use the Indiegogo share tools! COPY IT, POST IT, SHARE IT!!

story:
Overview

Comfort Farms has been working towards localizing food production and building a strong farming community. By adding a climate controlled produce farming system, we can guarantee out-of-season supply and crop consistency, allowing us to secure shelf space at local groceries and to more reliably feed the members of our local community. Ponix has been developing hydroponic growing systems for the past three years and has begun construction on a unit built inside a 20ft shipping container. This has the potential to produce an amount of lettuce and leafy greens equivalent to an acre worth of traditional farm land, while also preserving water and reducing labor requirements. We need your help to ensure this project is a success, so we can spread this sustainable technology to other small business farmers, strengthening our collective group.

What We Need

We are looking to raise $3,000 through this campaign. Those funds will help launch this farm by providing the following:

  • First harvest supplies
    • seeds
    • growing medium
    • nutrients
  • Upgrades to the container farm system
    • upgraded automation system
    • advanced water filtration

Impact

By helping with the installation of this farm, you would also be supporting:

  • Local community farmers market
  • Veterans support center
  • Fresh, locally grown fruits and veggies
  • Sustainable agriculture technology

Thank You

As is tradition, we are offering small tokens of appreciation for those who donate, including:

  • Stickers
  • Hats
  • T-Shirts
  • Mugs
  • Social Media shoutouts
  • CSA Produce Pack
  • Tour of Comfort Farms
  • Harvest Invitational Dinner (April)

story:
The observation hive is not a new concept in beekeeping - but existing styles of observation hives haven't changed in decades, and they are limited in their functionality. Not anymore: BEEcosystem is designed specifically to be simple and modular, expanding across your wall in any hexagonal pattern.

Even if your BEEcosystem hive is setup outdoors, the unique modularity allows for the hive colonies to be securely and easily closed off for events and educational purposes. Afterwards, simply reattach the hive to its home and open one of the vents.

We are a team of two who originally met while attending Penn State University together back in 2012. Dustin was studying biology and working in a honeybee research lab, and Mike was studying architecture and working on urban farming design modeling - since then, we have a substantial track record of collaborating together successfully over the past 5+ years on a variety of interior agro/eco design-build projects.  This campaign is about growing the BEEcosystem community as we enter our second year of business as BEEcosystem LLC. By supporting our campaign, your contribution is directly helping us to grow our manufacturing capabilities this year, bringing more BEEcosystem hives to more people, and helping educate one another about the critical roles that pollinators play in agriculture and the environment.

When we began this project by prototyping our first hives in Fall 2014 and then installing our first experimental hive colonies in the Spring 2015 season, we already knew that there was a LOT of room for innovation in observation hives. BEEcosystem's modern and elegant design not only looks great, but also addresses the common irritations users have with existing observation hives:

If you’re a beekeeper, you know that Langstroth and Warre hives have always expanded vertically by adding new boxes and supers—now, BEEcosystem is the first observation hive to use the same tried and true logic, but on a horizontal plane, expanding across your wall in a hexagonal pattern.

BEEcosystem's modular expansion works by using our unique (patent pending) vent-to-passageway magnetic connection points. Because both the hive’s side vents and additional hive bodies attach magnetically, by simply sliding out any one of the four side-ventilation screens, another BEEcosystem hive body can be attached to create a more spacious hive interior—giving your colony room to grow and thrive.

By using magnetic alignment, BEEcosystem units connect together effortlessly—and because we use powerful magnets, they also connect together securely—delivering both peace of mind and ease of installation.

 

When we began work on the very first BEEcosystem prototypes in October 2014, our goal was to design the most user-friendly observation honeybee hive ever built, period.

This past year, we put the first commercially-available BEEcosystem hives into the hands of several dozen customers and beekeepers, who sent us overwhelmingly positive feedback. Listening to that feedback, we heard one commonality for a proposed design tweak—that there was a desire for the hive to open from the front rather than from the back, so that outdoor hives could be opened up and maintained directly in place, without having to remove them from the wall in order to open them from the back. We are pleased to announce that beginning now, all 2018 BEEcosystem hives will feature this update! Additionally, all 2018 hives will also still be contiguous with the 2017 (back-opening) hive models, so that all of our existing customers can modularly connect new 2018 hives with their current 2017 hives. 

We strongly believe that we have designed a hive product that meets the needs and desires of our customers, and is indeed the most user-friendly observation hive ever built. The diagram below illustrates some features detailed in the 2018 BEEcosystem hive specifications:

Great! Welcome to the fascinating world of apiculture. If you are new, we are here to help you learn. Whether that be offering advice, pointing you in the right direction for answers, or trying to connect you with your local beekeepers association, we want you and your BEEcosystem hives to be setup for success. 

Through our new Ambassador Program, we are in the process of building a platform to facilitate more connections between beekeepers and non-beekeepers, who are likewise passionate about helping take action to support pollinator protection. Our goal is to connect experienced beekeepers with less experienced BEEcosystem observation hive customers: beekeepers act as "sideliners," helping to maintain BEEcosystem hives on their own terms, most typically for agro/eco businesses or environmental education centers that host BEEcosystem hives—and Ambassador beekeepers can get paid for providing their knowledge and services. For more information, visit the Beekeeper Ambassador page on our website. 

BEEcosystem LLC was cofounded by Mike Zaengle and Dustin Betz, and officially incorporated in January of 2017. Mike and Dustin have worked together over the past 5+ years on a wide variety of interior agro/eco design-build projects, from aquaponic miniature container farms and rotating living wall vertical farms, to hydroponic furnishing pieces for a variety of residential and commercial clients. 

Even if you can't pledge your financial support to backing our campaign here on Indiegogo, you can still help us spread the word! "Like" or "Follow" us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter, and give us a shout-out! Also, please share this video and this campaign page on social media and with your friends! 

And if you're an experienced beekeeper, regardless of whether you can support us financially by backing this campaign or purchasing a hive, we would love to tell you more about our new Beekeeper Ambassador Program. Click here to visit our website and learn more, and fill out the form at the bottom of the page for us to get in touch with you. We will also be exhibiting at this year's American Beekeeping Federation Conference & Trade Show in Reno, Nevada between January 10th-13th, 2018 - so if you're attending the conference, stop by our booth in the Trade Show!

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Because we have already been manufacturing and fulfilling BEEcosystem hive orders for the past year, fulfilling backers' campaign pledges will not be a challenge for our team, regardless of whether or not we meet our flex funding goal. We have our manufacturing supply chain in place, and the manufacturing run will absolutely happen—so backers can rest assured that they will receive their orders/perks. Our goal in launching this campaign is simply to consolidate some preorders ahead of the 2018 season, which will help make our first manufacturing run of the 2018 year even more successful, as well as to help generate some buzz in coordination with our exhibition at this year's big American Beekeeping Federation Conference and Trade Show in Reno, the largest beekeeping conference in the USA.

A consistent challenge we face today, as we have also faced in the past, is in helping to guide novice beekeepers who back our campaign—BEEcosystem attracts all kinds of people, and we designed it to be beautiful and interesting so that it does just that—so if you're a first-time beekeeper, we welcome you to the BEEcosystem community! However, we consider it our responsibility to offer some guidance to new beekeepers, and also to correct those who might hold the misperception that beekeeping is an effortless hobby that magically produces honey. Unfortunately, this is simply not the case. In fact, many beekeepers will conservatively recommend waiting until after hive's second fall/autumn season in order to harvest honey for the first time, and even then only harvesting the surplus honey that bees have stored up, so that they do not starve themselves overwintering, which can happen if too much honey is harvested. Beekeeping is certainly not difficult to learn, but it does require a desire to want to learn it! Luckily, beekeepers tend to be the most curious educators, who love to help one another learn continuously—and the level support out there for beginner beekeepers is truly enormous. We are thrilled be a part of that support system for first time beekeepers, and we do provide some resources, as well as openly welcome questions from those getting started for the first time.

Going hand-in-hand with beginner beekeeping, another unique challenge comes in the form of making sure our backers know their local beekeeping laws and ordinances. While the tides of stigma are changing, some municipalities still ban beekeeping outright. It is important to check with your state and local laws and ordinances, as some states also require beekeepers to register their hive(s). Both throughout and following the campaign, our team will make ourselves available to work closely with our backers and make sure everyone understands their local laws and regulations, as well as how to meet them.

A third challenge may come from backers who pledge a reward level to receive only a single BEEcosystem "HexHive," and whose honeybee colony then successfully outgrows the space of that single HexHive. The reason BEEcosystem is modular is to be able to expand the available hive-interior space; however, this assumes backers will either pledge reward levels upfront that receive multiple HexHives, or purchase additional HexHives later on as needed. A larger honeybee colony tends to be a stronger honeybee colony, so permanently restricting bees to a single HexHive is not the ideal longterm condition to foster hive stability, as a colony that runs out of room is far likelier to swarm. Swarming is not necessarily a bad thing in and of itself, because it is essentially a reproductive phenomenon—but if the colony either splits or leaves completely in a swarm event, the beekeeper may be disappointed. BEEcosystem is designed to expand into a large observation hive, not remain confined to a single 6-frame HexHive for consecutive years of use. We will work with our backers, especially new beekeepers, to help them understand swarming behaviors and how to manage them effectively.

One final challenge is that some backers (again, especially first time beekeepers) may believe that a failed colony signifies that they are a failure as a beekeeper—this is simply incorrect, but offers a teachable moment about what it really means to practice beekeeping. Remember the often cited Colony Collapse Disorder statistic: that on average ~1/3 of ALL hives are lost EACH YEAR due to Colony Collapse. That means even professional beekeepers, who keep bees commercially to earn their living, still experience failing colonies every single year. Unfortunately, this is the harsh reality of nature and a true fact of beekeeping—but it is also a driving motivation for the creation of BEEcosystem: because by together encouraging new hobbyist beekeepers to host more hives, we all help make small contributions to our localized honeybee genetic diversities. Some researchers believe the best hope for honeybees' future will lie in their ability to naturally adapt and evolve resistances to the various localized stressors that contribute to Colony Collapse. Therefore, by keeping bees in your local community, you ARE helping to naturally foster that random genetic diversity—so remember, if your colony does fail, that does not make you a failure as a beekeeper. On the contrary, it proves you ARE a beekeeper for having tried, and you will always have the ability to continue beekeeping, by starting up a new colony the next season, and helping add that pollinator genetic diversity to your local area.

story:
Thank you to all our backers for your incredible support! We truly appreciate each and every one of you! 

If you missed the chance to back our IndieGoGo campaign, all is not lost! Head over the http://www.hydrobee.com/gethydrobee where we'll continue to take pre-orders until we are in production.

Sincerely,
Burt & the Hydrobee Team

One way to charge Hydrobee is to drop it in the river using the Streambee attachment and the water current charge the battery.  See UPDATE listing the award-winning design features!


Hydrobee generates power for your phone/camera/anything charged by USB, from nature any time and any where.

Some of the people who will benefit from a Hydrobee are use any kind of USB device (camera, phone, lamp, :

  • Campers (can charge in a river with a Streambee or Sun with Sunbee)

  • Preppers (can charge in a river with a Streambee or Sun with Sunbee)

  • Bikers (can charge it by attaching to their bike frame to draw energy from turning wheel)

  • Parents (can attach it to their jogging strollers or bike)

  • Fisherman/Sailer (can use the Streambee and just let the water currents charge it behind boat or from the shore)

  • Anyone (can use the hand crank, water currents from sink as you wash dishes or whatever accessory makes the most sense for you)

You can charge ANY USB powered device with the Hydrobee.  It has 2 USB 3.0 ports and a 5000 mAh battery, powerful enough to charge 2 smart phones or many tablets (not iPads).

The Hydrobee battery takes about 3 hours to charge from a USB 2.0 wall power outlet, or from one of our accessory rotors, the same charge time as a smart phone with the same wall power.  

When the "can" body is removed from the mounting bracket, add the LED puck so it becomes a powerful flashlight.  Sit Hydrobee on its base and attach the collapsible soft plastic lamp shade and illuminate a room or camp site.

Great question!

  • Attach the Hydrobee to anything, then use our accessory rotors to spin the generator.  The rotors for wind, bikes, rivers and water pipes are in development.
  • The modular design is the size of a soda can, because a can may be delivered anywhere.  Think turbines in six-packs.  When any modular part wears out, especially the batteries, they can be easily replaced.  

The mounting block is for long-term installation of the Hydrobee, where you want a fixed charging source like:

  • wagon
  • belt drive
  • waterwheel
  • bike
  • treadmill
  • ...or anything that can move for hours.  
You can unscrew the Hydrobee battery from the mounting block and take it with you for power and light.  

You DON'T need the mounting block to go camping with Hydrobee.  It's a powerful backup battery, with hand crank for extra power, and a flashlight/table lamp, which should be enough phone and light power for a 2-4 day trip away from it all. 

Hydrobee makes it affordable to a billion people in poverty who can use existing "pay as you go" to pay just a few dollars a week to buy the Hydrobee.  This is being done now for solar panels, but Hydrobees are better because they can charge from sun and also from flowing water, wind, and other natural energy sources.  

Please back us so we can finish the production and field testing faster and tell us what you want to charge your Hydrobee!. 

Our first accessory stemmed from our original vision of Hydrobee. We made a tiny turbine in a can and attached it to a faucet to charge batteries from water flowing through it.  But there's no faucet when we are camping or living off the grid!   So we invented the Streambee to hold the turbine in the water current in streams and rivers.  The flowing water spins the external propeller which then turns the generator and charges the battery.  When it's charged, just "reel it in" and take the battery to go. Now it's a power pack with LOTS of accessories in development to harvest the clean energy from nature.

The Evolution of the Hydrobee:


What is Your Local Renewable Energy Source?

Water faucets and pipes:  If there is a blackout and no electricity for several days, you may still have water pressure from a gravity-fed reservoir system.  Attach the Hydrobee and the "PipeBee" rotor to a water faucet and generate power whenever you run water for drinking, cooking, cleaning, gardening or irrigation.

Streams and rivers:  If there is water flow faster than 4 knots (fast walking speed) and deeper than 12 inches, the StreamBee floating accessory can harvest the hydrokinetic energy and charge the Hydrobee battery.  Below:  3-D printed full size model of the Streambee.

Sailboats and canoes:   Tow the StreamBee behind and let the wind or your muscles power it up!  Keep up a good pace, you need 4 knots or about 7.5 km/hour of speed for "standard" charging times of 3 hours.  

Wind:  Use our WindBee folding wind propeller and pole mount to put up the Hydrobee in wind.  

Bikes:   The BikeBee rolls against the bike tire.  

Muscles:   The CrankBee is spun by hand.  Here's a picture of it attached to a table, with the LED lamp attachment.  

The KickBee holds a car wheel rim and tire flat on the floor, on its side, on a bearing on a short post.  Sit in a chair and push it with your feet to spin and run the Hydrobee on the post via a belt drive.  Works with most car rims and tires.

Sun:   SunBee is a roll-up 10W solar panel that fits in a soda can.

We have not made the accessories yet because we don't know which ones are going to be the most popular.  The tooling to mass produce each accessory is expensive.  We will survey all backers to learn what they want, and backers will get a coupon for a free accessory of their choice when they are available in 2015.  

Dane Roth is the co-founder and industrial designer of Hydrobee.  He has 20+ years of experience designing medical devices and turbines.  In his last job he designed hydrokinetic turbines to make renewable power from canals and waterfalls.  He was the lead designer of the Clarisonic Skin Brush and was on the design team of the famous Sonicare toothbrush.  

Dave Vaillencourt is the owner and president of DA Graphics.  For over 20 years he has designed and made a wide variety of products in China and imports them for sale in the USA.  He specializes in remote-control toy hydrofoil raceboats and monster trucks.   We have great production capability for the Hydrobee.   Below:  At DA Graphics, and some of their products.

Hydrobee co-founder and inventor Burt Hamner founded, grew and sold a company making micro-hydrokinetic turbines to generate renewable energy from irrigation canals and water treatment plants.  Dane was the designer.  Burt became an international expert on micro-renewable energy and won three major cleantech awards.  Before that Burt spent over 20 years promoting clean technologies in developing countries for the US Agency for International Development, the United Nations and others.   Watch Hydrobee founder and President on stage at the North American Startup Clash!

Hydrobee SPC has a formal Board of Advisors.  They include Warren Evans, the former Director of the Environment Department of The World Bank, and four other distinguished experts.  


This year Hydrobee SPC won the:

  • National Business for Good contest of the Social Enterprise Alliance
  • Innovative World Technologies Award from the SXSW V2Venture conference
  • North America finalist in the American Startup Clash
Each of these contests has more than 200 applicants, and the winners are chosen by judges with great experience.

Other partnerships include: 

  • Autodesk Clean Tech Partners  and use their software to design the Hydrobee product line.  We are featured in their blog Inventing the Future.  
  • Our partners include Dan Terry Inc (Firebee thermo-electric generator co-inventor)
  • Lumeter Networks (micro-financing of renewable energy) and OSSCube (open-source software)
  • Hydrobee SPC is a "graduate" of the Fledge Accelerator program  in Seattle. 
We are serious about creating a great company so you get great products and we can help the billion people in energy poverty who need Hydrobees right now so... 

It will cost $32,000 for the tooling, production run and shipping for the first run of Hydrobee units, and they will go to the first 150 people who back us and select that reward.  Your support means we'll get it done faster and better!

The Hydrobee is being produced by our great partner, DA Graphics in Seattle.  They have been doing rapid prototyping in China for twenty years and only take on products they believe will be big sellers.   They recently produced the crazy-successful Sansaire Sous-Vide cooker and have proven capability.   They love Hydrobee!  We have been working with them since April 2014 and now have firm designs and quotes.  With your help we can pay for the tooling to produce the product and the first inventory stock.  Our goal is $32,000.  

PERKS:   We are offering "perks" to reward you for backing our project.  All backers will have their names encoded on a ROM chip on every Hydrobee circuit board, and we plan to make a mobile app that will let you read the names of all backers on your phone, as well as check on battery and charging status, and more.  

You can get Hydrobees at big discounts, and even join our team.   See the Perks page for more information.  

Backers at the higher levels will get:

Hydrobee base unit:  Mounting block, generator, battery, power puck, LED light puck, collapsing lampshade, hand crank charger accessory.  AND:

A coupon for one accessory:  for wind, water, sun, bikes or belt drives, when these are completed for distribution.  We will survey backers after the campaign to learn what they want, and they will get the first ones. 

SCHEDULE:  We will expect to deliver the first Hydrobees and rotors in May 2015.  DA Graphics has great experience producing products like these and we are confident in their schedule.  We will do intense product testing before we ship to backers and customers.  

WARRANTY:   All Hydrobees will have a one-year warranty covering all parts.  The batteries are rated for 500+ recharge cycles .  They will eventually die, like all rechargeable batteries, depending on how frequently and where they are used (temperature affects battery life).  We expect them to last at least a few years of regular use.  We will have a recycling option in the USA and Canada, and are investigating options in other countries.

For most of us with household power, the impact of personal renewable energy is convenience.  But in a long-term power outage after a disaster, having your own USB energy source could be vital.  After Superstorm Sandy, over 10 million people had no power for weeks, but most of them still had water pressure.  They could have used the Hydrobee to make power from their faucets whenever they used water for cooking or bathing or cleaning.  

For over a billion people, having a USB power source for phones and LED lights is revolutionary.  Right now they spend over $30 billion a year buying micro-charges for a few pennies a time.  They also spend about $30B a year buying kerosene fuel for dirty dangerous little lamps.   But just finding charging sources and fuel also uses a huge amount of their time, so it costs them lost work as well.  If they can get useful USB power from nature around them it will make their lives better immediately.  Because the Hydrobee can be recharged by any kind of natural energy, it will work for most people and be affordable through mass production.  

How can very poor people afford a modern personal power plant?  The same way they pay for their mobile phones:  a few cents a day.  If they don't pay, their service goes off.  They now buy solar charging systems this way.  The systems have a cell phone chip in them.  The owners pay every month for it or it's turned off with a text message from the vendor.  Over 20 million solar systems are now installed in village huts around the world and most of them are financed this way.  The Hydrobee also has a cell phone or pager chip.  We will provide it as an upgrade to the systems already in place because it accepts the solar charge but also makes power when there is no strong sun.  Read more about it here.

Anything that harvests energy from nature must be very rugged and suitable for many environments.   We have a technology risk to make our Hydrobee as tough as possible while remaining affordable.   All our components are currently made in field versions for other products and we will do extensive field testing before we launch into full sales.  Our Advisor for Testing is Eric Rasmussen, MD, who is a a principal at Infinitum Humanitarian Systems and is a global expert in disaster response technologies.  

There is market risk for the sale of Hydrobees over micro-finance and mobile payment systems.  These systems must be in place and trusted before we can benefit from them.  However, they are spreading fast in India and Africa and will soon be found in Central and South America.  There are many models and companies in this area now, so we will partner with the winners.  We are advised on micro-finance by Global Partnerships, a non-profit organization with micro finance and solar lighting distribution projects throughout Central and South America.

A solution for USA is not necessarily a solution for Uganda or Bolivia or Thailand.  We have a risk of the "product fit" for different markets.  To get help designing the right accessories for different markets, we will hold global "Design-a-Thons" with the Impact Hub centers around the world.  

Other Ways You Can Help 

If you can't back us with a little money, you can still help.  Please take our online survey and tell us what you want and how you'll use the Hydrobee.  

Tell others and share about our campaign!   You can use the Indiegogo share tools to post to social media.  

Want more details?  See our Gallery page on this site, and our home page at www.hydrobee.com.  THANK YOU for your support!

story:
Who Are We, And What Is The Solar Co-Op?

First, a little about us.  We are an independent, renewable energy company, exclusively producing solar energy.  We develop, own, and operate utility scale solar facilities (solar farms - you know, those big facilities with thousands of solar panels).  In other words, we are solar farmers.  And when we select a location for one of our projects, we don’t choose a place that only gets a few hours of sunlight each day, or where there’s lots of shade, or where it’s cloudy or raining all the time.

Because that would be dumb.

We choose a location that gets lots and lots of sunlight, all year round, because more sunlight means more electricity.  That’s what makes a solar farm practical and profitable.  This is great for people who are able to build solar farms, but it's not so great for everyone else, and let’s be honest, not very many people are able to build a solar farm.

But what if they could?  What if the average person could build their own solar farm and could benefit directly from the electricity that it generates?

This is what the Solar Co-Op is all about - making it possible for normal people all over the world to become solar farmers.  We think it’s a pretty incredible idea, and we think the world will agree with us.

What's The Plan?

Okay, so here’s the deal: we're building the ADÉLIE GLACIER SOLAR ARRAY (a 2.5MW utility scale solar facility), and we're building it regardless of whether or not anyone contributes to this campaign.

O ur plan was that if even one person - one single, solitary person, living anywhere in the world, was willing to put up just one dollar because they believed the Solar Co-Op is a good idea, then the ADÉLIE GLACIER SOLAR ARRAY would be a Solar Co-Op, owned in part by ordinary, everyday people from all over the world.

That was the plan.  But before we could even launch this campaign, people from all over the world had already joined the Solar Co-Op!

 

 

How Does The Solar Co-Op Work?

 

The solar co-op will allow hundreds, even thousands of individuals to become solar farmers.  Their individual solar farms (some tiny, some large) will be tied together to create the co-op.  It's the same principle as a traditional agricultural co-op where you have a lot of small, family farms that cooperate (thus the term "co-op") so that they can compete in a huge market.  By working together, the little guys can compete with the big guys.

We've taken this agricultural co-op model, successful since the 17th century, and applied it to the modern energy industry.  The solar farming co-op makes solar power accessible to everyone, everywhere so that today, quite literally, anyone can be a solar farmer.  And since we want to solar co-op to be accessible to everyone, we've scaled down the size of the solar farm.  No longer is it necessary to have thousands of solar panels to be a solar farmer. In fact, with the solar co-op, you don't even need one panel.  Made up of just 3 solar cells, our Nano Farm is the world's smallest solar farm!  For about the price of a large pizza, you can be the proud owner of a solar farm, and that farm will reduce coal consumption and eliminate CO2 emissions every single year. 

The world, and especially young people all over the world are screaming at the top of their lungs for someone, somewhere to do something about the climate crisis.  We at PeakSunNRG sincerely hope that world leaders will listen and act, but…

 

The verdict is in.  The science is indisputable.  Climate Change is real, and within 30 years, if left unchecked, it will destroy our world.

 

Check this out: In the past, unless you had thousands of dollars, you couldn't really do much in the way of solar.  But now, if you've got even one extra dollar lying around, you have the power to meaningfully impact climate change.  Really, a dollar - check your couch cushions and that junk drawer in your kitchen for some spare change. That one-time, one-dollar investment will have an impact on our environment for decades to come!

In the meantime, make your voice heard.  Share this project with your friends and family, and anyone else who will listen.  Use your social media network to let people know that the solar co-op is a thing; that they can actually do something about climate change.

 

 

"RESISTANCE IS EXISTENCE" was a call to arms of the French Resistance fighters during World War II. Theirs was a fight for the very existence of their nation and their way of life. 

Today, the climate crisis is an insidious enemy, destroying the world as we know it and threatening the existence of not just one nation, but of the entire human race. A renewable energy resistance against fossil fuels and carbon emissions is all that can preserve our existence, so stand up and fight!

 

For the price of a Venti, Caramel Macchiato, you can JOIN THE RESISTANCE. You'll be reducing coal consumption by about 5 pounds, and CO2 emissions by about 15 pounds, every single year. Resistance doesn't get much easier than that. Plus, your local coffee shop isn't gonna give you a super cool RESISTANCE IS EXISTENCE sticker!

 

 

The real beauty of the solar co-op is that your solar farm can be as small as three solar cells! We're talking about a teeny, tiny, itty, bitty, little solar farm here, and that's exactly the point. The solar co-op revolutionizes the solar industry because now, just about anyone, anywhere can be a solar farmer. Not only that, but we do all the heavy lifting!  PeakSunNRG handles all the maintenance and repair and replacements of components. We tie all the individual solar farms together, and we handle all the administrative tasks associated with a commercial solar facility.  

Plus, at all "solar farmer" levels, we'll send you, not only the RESISTANCE sticker, but one of these cool SOLAR CO-OP, I AM A SOLAR FARMER stickers too.  Display it prominently!  Let people know that you are a solar farmer.

All you need to do is choose what size solar farm you'd like to own.

The NANO FARM is the world's smallest solar farm.  But that doesn't mean it's not important in the war on climate change.  In fact, for a one-time, 15 dollar investment, this little solar farm will keep 12.5 pounds of coal in the ground this year, next year, the year after that, and the year after that, and... well, you get the point.  And because we won't be burning that coal, global output of CO2 will be reduced by about 38 pounds every year! 

 

This is pretty simple math here.  The NANO FARM 2X is 2 times the size of the NANO FARM. That means it'll have twice the impact on our climate!

Now, at the MICRO FARM level and above, you can get one of our incredibly stylish t-shirts to let people know you've taken a stand for the climate. Best of all, you don't have to say a word. These shirts will do all the talking.

 

The MICRO FARM is still pretty small, but think about this: Every year, this little solar farm is reducing carbon emissions by 150 pounds.  You might not even weigh 150 pounds. Your farm will be removing your weight in CO2 every, single year!

 

 

At this level you get to customize the small, metal plaque attached to this solar panel.  Put anything you want on it, your name, your kid's names, the name of your significant other, or your farm, anything you like.  Get creative. The MINI FARM reduces coal consumption by around 100 pounds a year, and carbon emissions by about 300 pounds every, single year! 300 POUNDS! 136 KILOS! That's a lot of CO2. Having a tough time picturing what that much CO2 looks like? Check this out.

 

 

A single TINY FARM will eliminate the need for 300 pounds (136 kg) of coal every year.  That coal will stay in the ground, and that means global output of CO2 will also be reduced by about 900 pounds (410 kg) every year.  by 2030, your TINY FARM will be responsible for the elimination of nearly 10,000 pounds (4,500 kg) of CO2. That's an enormous impact from such a tiny farm.

 

And don't forget Indigogo's share tools!  They're right there, up at the top of the page.  You may have to scroll for a bit, but it's totally worth it.

 

Risks & Challenges

We wanted to talk for a moment about the risks and challenges that we face in making the world's first, true solar co-op a reality.  Here's the thing, though: there aren't really any.

As we mentioned already, the ADÉLIE GLACIER SOLAR ARRAY is going to be built regardless of whether or not we get any funding here.  The only question is, "Will this solar facility be a solar co-op?" That's why we were only asking for a dollar. We're building this solar farm and we wanted to see if anyone wanted to be a part of it.

It's kinda like if we were in the kitchen and said, "Hey, we're making coffee.  If anybody wants some, it's in the pot." If you want some coffee, great! It's in the pot.  If you don't want coffee, that's okay too. It's still in the pot.

And now, since we had people from all over the world step up and join the Solar Co-Op before we could even launch this campaign, we're already doing it!  So, if you think the solar co-op is a pretty fantastic idea, tell people about it! If you want to be a solar farmer, reduce fossil fuel consumption, lower carbon emissions, and save some money on your electric bill, this is your chance.
story_txt:
Who Are We, And What Is The Solar Co-Op?First, a little about us.  We are an independent, renewable energy company, exclusively producing solar energy.  We develop, own, and operate utility scale solar facilities (solar farms - you know, those big facilities with thousands of solar panels).  In other words, we are solar farmers.  And when we select a location for one of our projects, we don’t choose a place that only gets a few hours of sunlight each day, or where there’s lots of shade, or where it’s cloudy or raining all the time.Because that would be dumb.We choose a location that gets lots and lots of sunlight, all year round, because more sunlight means more electricity.  That’s what makes a solar farm practical and profitable.  This is great for people who are able to build solar farms, but it's not so great for everyone else, and let’s be honest, not very many people are able to build a solar farm.But what if they could?  What if the average person could build their own solar farm and could benefit directly from the electricity that it generates?This is what the Solar Co-Op is all about - making it possible for normal people all over the world to become solar farmers.  We think it’s a pretty incredible idea, and we think the world will agree with us.What's The Plan?Okay, so here’s the deal: we're building the ADÉLIE GLACIER SOLAR ARRAY (a 2.5MW utility scale solar facility), and we're building it regardless of whether or not anyone contributes to this campaign.O ur plan was that if even one person - one single, solitary person, living anywhere in the world, was willing to put up just one dollar because they believed the Solar Co-Op is a good idea, then the ADÉLIE GLACIER SOLAR ARRAY would be a Solar Co-Op, owned in part by ordinary, everyday people from all over the world.That was the plan.  But before we could even launch this campaign, people from all over the world had already joined the Solar Co-Op!  How Does The Solar Co-Op Work?

 
The solar co-op will allow hundreds, even thousands of individuals to become solar farmers.  Their individual solar farms (some tiny, some large) will be tied together to create the co-op.  It's the same principle as a traditional agricultural co-op where you have a lot of small, family farms that cooperate (thus the term "co-op") so that they can compete in a huge market.  By working together, the little guys can compete with the big guys.We've taken this agricultural co-op model, successful since the 17th century, and applied it to the modern energy industry.  The solar farming co-op makes solar power accessible to everyone, everywhere so that today, quite literally, anyone can be a solar farmer.  And since we want to solar co-op to be accessible to everyone, we've scaled down the size of the solar farm.  No longer is it necessary to have thousands of solar panels to be a solar farmer. In fact, with the solar co-op, you don't even need one panel.  Made up of just 3 solar cells, our Nano Farm is the world's smallest solar farm!  For about the price of a large pizza, you can be the proud owner of a solar farm, and that farm will reduce coal consumption and eliminate CO2 emissions every single year. The world, and especially young people all over the world are screaming at the top of their lungs for someone, somewhere to do something about the climate crisis.  We at PeakSunNRG sincerely hope that world leaders will listen and act, but… The verdict is in.  The science is indisputable.  Climate Change is real, and within 30 years, if left unchecked, it will destroy our world. Check this out: In the past, unless you had thousands of dollars, you couldn't really do much in the way of solar.  But now, if you've got even one extra dollar lying around, you have the power to meaningfully impact climate change.  Really, a dollar - check your couch cushions and that junk drawer in your kitchen for some spare change. That one-time, one-dollar investment will have an impact on our environment for decades to come!In the meantime, make your voice heard.  Share this project with your friends and family, and anyone else who will listen.  Use your social media network to let people know that the solar co-op is a thing; that they can actually do something about climate change.  "RESISTANCE IS EXISTENCE" was a call to arms of the French Resistance fighters during World War II. Theirs was a fight for the very existence of their nation and their way of life. Today, the climate crisis is an insidious enemy, destroying the world as we know it and threatening the existence of not just one nation, but of the entire human race. A renewable energy resistance against fossil fuels and carbon emissions is all that can preserve our existence, so stand up and fight! For the price of a Venti, Caramel Macchiato, you can JOIN THE RESISTANCE. You'll be reducing coal consumption by about 5 pounds, and CO2 emissions by about 15 pounds, every single year. Resistance doesn't get much easier than that. Plus, your local coffee shop isn't gonna give you a super cool RESISTANCE IS EXISTENCE sticker!  The real beauty of the solar co-op is that your solar farm can be as small as three solar cells! We're talking about a teeny, tiny, itty, bitty, little solar farm here, and that's exactly the point. The solar co-op revolutionizes the solar industry because now, just about anyone, anywhere can be a solar farmer. Not only that, but we do all the heavy lifting!  PeakSunNRG handles all the maintenance and repair and replacements of components. We tie all the individual solar farms together, and we handle all the administrative tasks associated with a commercial solar facility.  Plus, at all "solar farmer" levels, we'll send you, not only the RESISTANCE sticker, but one of these cool SOLAR CO-OP, I AM A SOLAR FARMER stickers too.  Display it prominently!  Let people know that you are a solar farmer.All you need to do is choose what size solar farm you'd like to own.The NANO FARM is the world's smallest solar farm.  But that doesn't mean it's not important in the war on climate change.  In fact, for a one-time, 15 dollar investment, this little solar farm will keep 12.5 pounds of coal in the ground this year, next year, the year after that, and the year after that, and... well, you get the point.  And because we won't be burning that coal, global output of CO2 will be reduced by about 38 pounds every year!  This is pretty simple math here.  The NANO FARM 2X is 2 times the size of the NANO FARM. That means it'll have twice the impact on our climate!Now, at the MICRO FARM level and above, you can get one of our incredibly stylish t-shirts to let people know you've taken a stand for the climate. Best of all, you don't have to say a word. These shirts will do all the talking. The MICRO FARM is still pretty small, but think about this: Every year, this little solar farm is reducing carbon emissions by 150 pounds.  You might not even weigh 150 pounds. Your farm will be removing your weight in CO2 every, single year!  At this level you get to customize the small, metal plaque attached to this solar panel.  Put anything you want on it, your name, your kid's names, the name of your significant other, or your farm, anything you like.  Get creative. The MINI FARM reduces coal consumption by around 100 pounds a year, and carbon emissions by about 300 pounds every, single year! 300 POUNDS! 136 KILOS! That's a lot of CO2. Having a tough time picturing what that much CO2 looks like? Check this out.  A single TINY FARM will eliminate the need for 300 pounds (136 kg) of coal every year.  That coal will stay in the ground, and that means global output of CO2 will also be reduced by about 900 pounds (410 kg) every year.  by 2030, your TINY FARM will be responsible for the elimination of nearly 10,000 pounds (4,500 kg) of CO2. That's an enormous impact from such a tiny farm. And don't forget Indigogo's share tools!  They're right there, up at the top of the page.  You may have to scroll for a bit, but it's totally worth it. Risks & ChallengesWe wanted to talk for a moment about the risks and challenges that we face in making the world's first, true solar co-op a reality.  Here's the thing, though: there aren't really any.As we mentioned already, the ADÉLIE GLACIER SOLAR ARRAY is going to be built regardless of whether or not we get any funding here.  The only question is, "Will this solar facility be a solar co-op?" That's why we were only asking for a dollar. We're building this solar farm and we wanted to see if anyone wanted to be a part of it.It's kinda like if we were in the kitchen and said, "Hey, we're making coffee.  If anybody wants some, it's in the pot." If you want some coffee, great! It's in the pot.  If you don't want coffee, that's okay too. It's still in the pot.And now, since we had people from all over the world step up and join the Solar Co-Op before we could even launch this campaign, we're already doing it!  So, if you think the solar co-op is a pretty fantastic idea, tell people about it! If you want to be a solar farmer, reduce fossil fuel consumption, lower carbon emissions, and save some money on your electric bill, this is your chance.

story:
NOW AVAILABLE ON OUR WEBSITE

--------------------------------

Alec and I used to sell period products to women around the UK. The more we sold, the more we realised the enormous waste coming from these small everyday items. We were selling reusable alternatives on our site but no one was buying them. Why not? We dug deeper and discovered that the habit change was one of the biggest barriers to women switching to more sustainable alternatives. We wanted to make it easy.

So we stopped selling tampons, took a deep breath, and decided to tackle the problem ourselves. This is our story so far, and we'd love Indiegogo's help bringing D to life.

After 14 months, we now have a fully functioning prototype. We've teamed up with medical engineers to ensure D is not only hygienic, but the most comfortable applicator you'll ever use.

Yes, we said antimicrobial. D contains advanced Saniconcentrates™ that work on a molecular level giving the Mediprene® material antiseptic and antimicrobial characteristics.

These properties last D's lifetime and the materials are proven by test according to ISO 22196 and JIS Z 2801 standard.

D is made of just two parts and a lid, so it couldn't be simpler.

While designing D, we aimed to improve every aspect of current disposable applicators. It's packed full of features that make it 100% keepable.

EXTRA CARE

D is not a medical device in the EU, but we wanted it to be totally safe and hygienic... so designed it to medical standards anyway. It's passed:

Cytotoxicity tests according to ISO 10993-5 Biocompatibility tests according to ISO 10993-10 ISO 10993-11 (Acute Systemic Toxicity) and USP Class VI.

Due to D's antimicrobial technology, cleaning it couldn't be easier. In any washroom it's the same - just wipe, rinse, and go.

Each D comes with its own storage tin, travel pouch, and 6 of our own DAME organic tampons.

TRAVEL POUCH DESIGN

Made from sustainable organic cotton, breathable, and convenient.

ORGANIC TAMPONS

We engrain sustainability in all we do. With every D you get 6 DAME organic tampons, so you're ready to go from the start. The tampons are:

  • bleach free
  • rayon free
  • pesticide free
  • fragrance free
  • biodegradable
  • 100% organic

... and while we're on the topic, our packaging is fully compostable and resealable. No more big boxes exploding in bags.

Whilst we prefer organic, D can be used with most standard-sized non-applicator tampon (lite, regular, super and super plus).

PACKAGING & STORAGE TIN DESIGN

Materials matter, so your tin can be reused to store your tampons - no more ugly boxes in your bathroom.

The tin can be reused time and again to store your tampons.

WITH YOU ALL THE WAY

We believe in building products for life - building relationships even more so. If you ever need to replace a part of your D, you can send it in to us and we'll replace it free of charge. 

DAME was founded by Celia Pool and Alec Mills. This is us...

OUR VALUES

We're on a mission to to reduce waste from everyday products, without compromising on performance or beauty. Period products are just the start.

We're rethinking the bathroom. D is the start of a whole range of sustainable products that eliminate plastic and enrich our lives.

Having won the B Corp Hackathon for Best Sustainable Business idea, it's great to know there are many people who share our vision.

Like all ideas, we've needed help along the way and have built a community of amazing women who share our vision. We couldn't have done it without their awesome support:

We're all about women, they've been key at every stage of the process. (Our intended female engineer was on maternity leave - so we started a campaign to get more female engineers. Why not.)

We've been working on this project for over a year now, hit all the big milestones, and it's getting exciting.

We need Indiegogo's help and have some great rewards for everyone who supports us. 

 

MOULD TOOLS

We've sourced our tool makers and manufacturer already. We wanted to be on top of the process so have gone British, with scope to expand production when we see fit.

ORDER PACKAGING

Whilst we pride ourselves in reducing packaging, we still need to order the tin and bags. They've all been designed, sized up, and sourced. We even have samples... just need to pull the trigger.

PRODUCTION & ASSEMBLY

After tooling and packaging, we're production-ready and can start shipping Ds to women around the world.

... for even getting this far. We're so grateful for any support, but particularly to the crowdfunding community for helping bring D to life and preventing a bloody waste of plastic.

 

WE'VE ALREADY HAD SOME GREAT PRESS:
