These Solar Road Panels can be installed on roads, parking lots, driveways, sidewalks, bike paths, playgrounds... literally any surface under the sun. They help pay for themselves primarily through the generation of electricity, which can power homes and businesses connected via driveways and parking lots. A nationwide system could produce more clean renewable energy than a country uses as a whole (http://solarroadways.com/Home/Specifics). They have many other features as well, including: heating elements to stay snow/ice free, LEDs to make road lines and signage, and attached Cable Corridor to store and treat stormwater and provide a "home" for power and data cables. EVs will be able to charge with energy from the sun (instead of fossil fuels) from parking lots and driveways and after a roadway system is in place, mutual induction technology will allow for charging while driving.  Did you know: · Solar Roadways has received three phases of funding from the U.S. Federal Highway Administration for research and development. · Our glass surface has been tested for traction, load testing, and impact resistance testing in civil engineering laboratories around the country, and exceeded all requirements.· Solar Roadways was chosen as a finalist in the IEEE Ace Awards in 2009 and 2010.· Solar Roadways is a modular system that will modernize our aging infrastructure with an intelligent system that can become the new Smart Grid. In GE's Ecomagination Challenge, we won the Community Award of $50,000 by getting the most votes for "Powering the Grid" in 2010. We had the most votes again in their 2011 Ecomagination Challenge for "Powering the Home".· On August 21, 2013, Solar Roadways was selected by their peers as a Finalist in the World Technology Award For Energy, presented in association with TIME, Fortune, CNN, and Science.· Solar Roadways was chosen by Google to be one of their Moonshots in May of 2013. · Solar Roadways was chosen by Popular Science as one of the 100 Greatest Innovations of the Year 2014· Solar Roadways has given presentations around the country including: TEDx Sacramento, Google's Solve for X at Google's NYC Headquarters, NASA, Keynote Speaker for the International Parking Institute's Conference and much more...· Solar Roadways is tackling more than solar energy: The FHWA tasked us with addressing the problem of stormwater. Currently, over 50% of the pollution in U.S. waterways comes from stormwater. We have created a section in our Cable Corridors for storing, treating, and moving stormwater.· The implementation of our concept on a grand scale could create thousands of jobs in the U.S. and around the world. It could allow us all the ability to manufacture our way out of our current economic crisis.   Would you like to join us?We've come a long way since our project was just an inspiration!  It's been an exciting journey, but also a tremendous amount of work for two people and occasional part time volunteers. Now, thanks to our supporters on Indiegogo, we're hiring a team to help us move into production.   We are blessed to have a multitude of potential customers, even before we are product ready. Many have been waiting on redoing driveways, parking lots, etc. hoping that we will be ready to give them the solar option they want.Our new facility in Sandpoint has the space to house our engineers and gives us a light manufacturing facility to get started. We need to make a few tweaks to our product and streamline our manufacturing process so that we can make our panels available to the public as quickly as possible.If you love our concept, but aren't able to contribute financially, no worries. There are so many other ways to help out. We appreciate those who tell us they talk about Solar Roadways with people they meet. It helps us when people join in on our social media pages to "like", comment, share, tweet, and pin. We have to give a special shout out to our wonderful Facebook fans who have formed a sort of grass roots movement to help spread the word and move us forward. When we started our original Indiegogo campaign in April of 2014, we have about 6,000 Facebook fans. Today, we have over 88,000. Thank you to each and every one of you!Paradigm ShiftThe implementation of our Solar Roadways project on a grand scale would change the world as we know it in significant ways. Imagine the possibilities of a post Solar Roadways world: Your home could be all or nearly off grid thanks to your solar driveway (which you no longer have to shovel or plow if you live in the north), patio, or walkways etc. When you leave home, you'll be driving on Solar Roadways which are snow and ice free, pothole free, and the LEDs help you see the lines clearly and easily, especially at night when many people suffer night blindness.  A study in the UK showed that LED markers on road lines reduced nighttime accidents by 70-percent. If there is danger ahead from a deer in the road or a sudden accident, the intelligent road can sense this and warn you to "Slow Down". This will save the lives of countless animals and keep people safer too.  If you go somewhere new, the intelligent road can direct you with an LED-lit arrow that you follow to your destination. If you have an EV, you can stop and charge at a solar parking lot while you work, shop or eat, using clean energy from the sun. Eventually, you'll be able to charge while you drive via mutual induction panels. Solar Roadways will provide the infrastructure to make this possible.    Perks:For our new InDemand Campaign, we've got a lot of great new ideas for perks! Many people have written with requests and we've been working with our team to create some brand new items. We'll ship all items free of charge (for deliveries outside of the U.S., we cannot be responsible for any duty fees or extra charges).Solar Freakin' Flashdrive!8GB, USB 2.0 includes viral Solar Freakin' Roadways video!Image shows front and back. One flashdrive per donation.    Wristband Set Set of three silicone, debossed, color-filled, 1/2-inch adult-sized wristbands.   Bumper Sticker Set 3 or Car Magnet Set 3Rectangles are 3" x 10"Hexagon is 5" wide and 4.5" high    Mouse Pad - Solar Roadways Logo7.5" x 8" (19.1cm x 20.3cm) plastic laminate with rubber backing. Terrific conversation starter for the office.    "Solar Roadie" Key Ring / Bottle Opener Zinc hexagon like our Solar Road Panel. Great for opening bottles and starting great conversations!   

Tote Bag - Word Hex
Durable 10-ounce, 100% cotton twill
15.5"H x 14.5"W x 7"D
Approx 1,573 cubic inches

Tote Bag - Shop/Drive Green
Durable 10-ounce, 100% cotton twill
15.5"H x 14.5"W x 7"D
Approx 1,573 cubic inches
 

Hat - logo 
Made of 100% washed cotton twill, this structured cap sports our iconic company logo embroidered in full colors on the front. It's soft, lived-in look is great for all your adventures. Be prepared to share with people noticing Solar Roadways on this hat!
 Hat - hexesMade of 100% cotton twill, this black structured cap pops with "SR" (for Solar Roadways) in an embroidered visible blue starting on the bill and climbing up the side. It is specially designed to be in style for many years after Solar Roadways is everywhere!
 
 
 

 

Green Water Bottle + Bumper Sticker Set 3
Image shows front and back sides of same bottle
24 fluid ounces
Stainless steel, with silicon ring for good seal
Carry handle built into the lid
Carabineer to help carry hands-free
 

Blue Water Bottle + Bumper Sticker Set 3
Image shows front and back sides of same bottle
24 fluid ounces
Stainless steel, with silicon ring for good seal
Carry handle built into the lid
Carabineer to help carry hands-free
 

Glass Solar Cell Pendant - 1" tall
Made from actual solar cells damaged during the assembly of the 108 Phase II prototype Solar Road Panels. We hope you like the way that we are re-purposing our scrap solar cell material and honoring its historical significance. Only available while remaining supplies last.
 
 
 

Solar Roadways was featured on Innovation Nation on CBS with Mo Rocca on February 14th. Here's the full segment shot in Sandpoint, Idaho:
 
We made President Obama's State of the Union Address - 2015! 
 

Julie and Scott in the White House's Blue Room. We were honored to be invited to the first annual Maker's Faire (June 2014).
 
 
Solar Roadways made the list for 2014 - what an honor! 

 
 
Specifics
Please visit our Specifics page on our website: http://solarroadways.com/Home/Specifics
 
In the Press:
 

 

  
 

About us:
Scott and Julie are the co-inventors of Solar Roadways. Scott is an Electrical Engineer (MSEE) and Julie is a Counselor (MA LCPC LMFT). Scott has worked in the engineering field for over 25 years and his main fields of expertise are in hardware, firmware, and software. We started working on our project in 2009. It's been quite a journey taking our concept from a dream to where we are today, poised to become product ready and make the world a safer, greener place.
 
 
Snow melting test
The parking lot of your favorite store would be snow/ice free and lit with LEDs.  Handicapped spaces will be created as needed so they no longer have to be dedicated.  EVs can charge in the parking lot while you shop and business owners could also choose to offer some preferred parking spaces to EV owners. They could offer smaller spaces for motorcycles, larger spaces for RVs and trucks, all changeable at the touch of the manager’s computer button. The parking configuration itself can be changed as needed with presets too. Imagine your favorite sports arena all lit up with LED filled parking lots and walkways in team colors, perhaps displaying images of your favorite players on the walkway as you approach. Imagine going to an amusement park with solar walkways that change colors by area, event, time, or any other variable. Think of all of the tarmac at airports just baking in the sun. Our panels could not only generate large amounts of power, but pilots tell us they could be used to provide signage visible to them from the air.



A mountain of recycled glass - we used 1600 pounds in our base layer
We are concerned about all of the mountains of trash in our landfills and even worse - in our oceans. We want to utilize recycled materials wherever possible. We were able to use recycled glass as ten percent of the aggregate in our base layer for our prototype parking lot and we want to work with materials engineers to use as many recycled materials as we can at every phase of production.
All of the ugly overhead cables that mar our landscape and are susceptible to damage from ice, can have a home now in our Cable Corridors, where utility workers can access them easily. There will be no more cell phone dead spots and no more need for cell towers due to the "leaky" cables that can be installed in the Cable Corridor. It would be a home for fiber optic internet too, bringing high speed internet to everyone.
The other side of our Cable Corridors will also store, treat and redistribute stormwater. Our lakes and rivers and oceans become polluted by stormwater which is rain water that picks up things like pesticides from lawns and oil from roads and makes its way into the nearest body of water. When it's collected in Cable Corridors, it can be treated on site or moved to treatment centers or to wherever it's needed such as agricultural centers, aquifers, or helping drought stricken areas for example. In parking lots, water can be treated and then delivered to landscaping or wherever the business owner wants it to go. We can have cleaner water to enjoy while protecting fish and whales and all of the amazing sea creatures that depend on our wisdom.
In America, our infrastructure is badly in need of updating. State DOTs are struggling for money and are not able to keep up with maintenance the way they would like to. We were thrilled when the Federal Highway Administration expressed an interest in what we were doing and provided us the funding to move our concept forward.
Solar Roadways can also become the Smart Grid. The roads that already traverse each country are perfect for becoming the grid that carries our power. It will allow us to create an organized system, a decentralized system which is secure and protected, unlike the current centralized power stations. Solar Roadways can become the hub which welcomes other types of renewable energy and other inventions into the Smart Grid for distribution.
Our grand vision includes the ability to help in various ways where there is a need. In times of disasters, such as earthquakes or tsunamis, lack of power hinders rescue workers. After the Haiti Earthquake, we were asked if we could send some panels.  Unfortunately, we were not product ready, but it made us realize how much our panels could help in such situations. They could be dropped in by helicopter and set up to provide a triage center for medical care and food distribution. There would be solar energy and light to help with current needs.
We often hear from third world countries such as African countries that desperately want our panels to help provide needed power. That power can be used to create clean drinking water and energy to run lights and computers for education.
We worry about Climate Change. We keep hearing reports that it's happening faster than expected. We can help by easing and then eliminating our dependence on fossil fuels. We began our project with the goal of helping with environmental issues and then realized our concept would help the world in so many other ways too.
So a post Solar Roadways world could be very different from the one we live in today. If you would welcome these changes, please join with us to help bring it about.   
More About Parking Lots
Our solar parking lots will offer many benefits to business owners. The solar energy alone could eliminate their monthly electric bill and would likely allow them to send power back to the grid, turning their parking lot into a source of profit.
The lots will be intelligent and the LED lights can reflect that intelligence in a myriad of ways. Managers will be able to change parking configurations at the touch of a button. Different  sizes can be offered: smaller spaces for motorcycles, larger ones for RVs etc. VIP spaces can be created for special visitors and then deleted just as quickly when they are gone. Some lot owners might want to give priority parking to EV owners and of course EV charging can be made available using standard plug in chargers or mutual induction plates. 
 EVs would be charging with the clean energy from the sun, instead of charging with fossil fuels, which is the current standard. Instead of dedicating a certain number of spaces for handipcapped drivers, such spaces could be created as needed, as the video below illustrates.  Retail owners could track customer trends and with feedback from the intelligent lot regarding capacity at different times.
Our Cable Corridors will be able to treat their stormwater on site. Water can be used for landscaping, grey water, etc.
Business owners who are early adopters are likely to find that their new parking lot has become a tourist attraction, drawing people to their business while showing the world their commitment to helping the environment, in the most obvious possible way. 

An intelligent parking lot can determine if a parking space is occupied or not. Once all available handicapped spaces are filled, an empty space is converted to an additional handicapped space. With this method, a parking lot will never run out of handicapped spaces.
 
How can your donation help?
Your donations to our original campaign allowed us to acquire and renovate a building to meet our needs, hire staff, and purchase needed equipment. 
We're still in need of specialized manufacturing equipment to streamline the assembly process. Your donations will help get us to market faster. 
We feel truly blessed and overwhelmed with the outpouring of support from around the world. The time for Solar Roadways has come, and you each now have a part in it - thank you so very much!
 
Specifics
Please visit our Specifics page on our website: http://solarroadways.com/Home/Specifics
Find This Campaign On
Facebook Twitter Website

story:
Global Re-Fuel Renewable Energy Biomass Technology Solves Economic, Poultry Health and Environmental Issues Facing Poultry Farmers

As a commercial poultry grower for more than 10 years, Rocky Irvin - a founding member of Global Re-Fuel - was keenly aware of the economic, poultry health and environmental concerns of his fellow poultry farmers.

To address these concerns, the Global Re-Fuel team developed its patented poultry litter-fueled warm-air biomass furnace that:

  • Improves farmers’ profits by more than $15,000 per year per poultry house
  • Eliminates the use of propane to heat poultry houses
  • Reduces CO2 emissions by more than 70,000 pounds per year per house
  • Reduces poultry litter volume by 80%
  • Creates a pathogen-free organic fertilizer
  • Reduces poultry house ammonia levels by 74%
  • Improves poultry living conditions
  • Improves poultry health
  • Improves bird mortality by 80%
  • Increases bird weight
  • Improves feed conversion rate by 1.2%

Mike Weaver, commercial poultry grower and president of Contract Poultry Growers Association of the Virginias, is excited about the furnace:

“I have evaluated many different poultry litter fueled heating systems, and I have a Global Re-Fuel system on my farm.  It is by far the most affordable system and has the potential to be a considerable cost saver for growers.”

Glenn Rodes,commercial poultry grower, is also very enthusiastic about the system:

“I’ve always had an interest in alternative energies of different types, and the thing that’s really been fascinating is to be able to burn poultry litter, which is a waste product, and produce heat.  It’s very exciting to be involved in the project and have a Global Re-Fuel system on my farm.”

Virginia Farming's (WVPT) broadcast a story about the Global Re-Fuel PLF-500 operating on Glenn's farm, telling its viewers about the benefits to farmers and the community.

 

How Can You Help?

While we have several units installed on farms and are poised to build more, as reflected in the above video and slideshows below, we need your help to take the next step to commercialize this renewable energy technology.

 

We appreciate contributions of any kind from those who share our commitment to solving the problems facing the environment and poultry farmers.  Besides money, what we also need - right now - are poultry growers to fill out our Grower Interest Form (see the pink link below).

Win the latest iPhone or Android!!

Whoever refers the most commercial poultry growers to our Indiegogo campaign who fill out our Grower Interest Form will win the latest iPhone or Android phone.  If you are referring a commercial poultry grower, please be sure you are logged into your Indiegogo account and use the share tools to make your referral.  Pursuant to Indiegogo rules, for your referral to qualify, you must donate at least $1 to the campaign, but if the poultry grower you refer fills out the Grower Interest Form, we will refund that $1.

Big Discounts for Poultry Farmers!!

If you are a poultry farmer, please fill out the Grower Interest Form.  The first 30 commercial poultry growers who fill out the Grower Interest Form will receive a $7,000 discount off the price of a PLF-500 biomass furnace.  In addition, Texas poultry farmers will have another special opportunity when they fill out the Grower Interest Form.  If someone referred you to this campaign through the Indiegogo share tools, for them to receive credit for the referral, you must donate at least $1 to the Global Re-Fuel campaign, but we will refund that $1 if you fill out the Grower Interest Form.  So, if you were referred by someone, make at least a $1 contribution, then fill out the Grower Interest Form at this link; otherwise, just visit the link to fill out the form.

Rewards

One of the biggest rewards for contributing to our campaign is that you will be helping solve the ever-increasing nutrient overload and runoff problem that is pervasive near livestock concentrations, such as the algae bloom dead zones in our waterways.  At the same time, you will be supporting the family-farm way of life and helping those farmers - the original environmentalists - implement sustainable animal husbandry procedures.

In addition, for contributions of $50 or more, you will receive a "thank you" on our company website and a container of our pathogen-free organic fertilizer.  Refuel your plants with Global Re-Fuel organic fertilizer, which contains trace elements that are valuable micro-nutrient soil amendments not typically found in commercial fertilizer.

All monetary contributions will be used to drive commercialization of this renewable energy technology, including the purchase of component and sub-assemblies, a technology and inventory payment, and customary working capital (including labor, marketing, rent, etc.).

We understand that not everyone can contribute or knows a poultry grower who they can refer. However, you never know which of your friends might know a poultry grower who might benefit from our technology.  So, please help us get the word out and make some noise - primarily on social media - about our campaign so everyone can benefit, including the environment, the farmer and the chickens.

Our Team

Rocky Irvin (center), a founding member of Global Re-Fuel, has more than 10 years of poultry industry experience as a Pilgrim’s Pride contract broiler grower and more than five years developing the Global Re-Fuel biomass furnace.

Craig Beck (left), a founding member of Global Re-Fuel, has more than 30 years' experience developing projects in the energy sector and more than two years developing the Global Re-Fuel project.

Kim Lawrence (right), advisor, has more than 15 years' experience in the poultry industry, including as former VP of Pilgrim's Pride and as a former member of the Mountaire Corporation board of directors.

Media Coverage

story:
Benny Dupré Pulga     
(Founder)

I spent long time of my life among the most beautiful beaches in the world and there's no greater joy than walking barefoot on the clean sand.
"The sea covers 71% of our planet and it is the second lung of the earth. Taking care of it is a bit like embracing the world. Let's start from us!"


Stefano Pulga           
(Founder)

"Smoking is a free choice,
respect is the free consequence. 
Preserve the planet our own responsibility!"
"Our sea doesn't smoke but breathes!"

SAVE

To preserve the environment with a smart, practical, innovative and dynamic object we introduce you: SAVE

It's handy and easy to move. 
Fully eco-friendly and made with totally recycled material. It can be used everywhere in all the world’s beaches.

HOW DOES IT LOOK?

Born to safeguard our planet and the environment we live in.
It shows up with a smart and cute design with bright and glossy colors.
It is composed by two elements: a container and one extractable net.
It's standard size makes it easy to place SAVE directly on the sand.
It lends it's versatility both on format and the color customization.
Light, handy and easy to carry, you can take it with you anywhere. 

HOW CAN I USE IT?

SAVE is simple and functional: 
I bring it with me on the beach or in a Beach Resort.
I just have to fill it with sand and use it for my entire stay to the sea.
Finally, at the end of the day, simply extracting our net and…voilà! 
All the cigarette butts will be separated and ready to throw away.
The clean sand is ready to return to the beach and, of course, our SAVE is happy and ready to be used again. 

OUR GOAL?

Safeguarding and protecting our planet and the beauty of our seas, the beauty of our beaches and territories.
Eco-sustainability while respecting the environment and protection of marine faunal and floral species.

 

Save your Ambient your Vacation Everywhere!

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get 

SAVE is our idea of a better world. A world where our seas and our beaches are safeguarded from cigarette butts in a simple yet meaningful way.
An idea that now needs your help to be brought to life and to be able to make a real impact in the world.

Why SAVE needs 100.000 euros

  • First stage: 3D printed prototype development
  • Second stage: Making the mold
  • Third stage: Production
  • Fourth stage: Promotion and distribution in 3 pilot seaside resort

We divided SAVE business plan this way, so that if we don’t reach the final goal, we can still proceed with the first stages of the plan.

 

 

The Impact

4.5 trillion cigarettes are littered worldwide every year; they are the most littered item in the world, and a major problem at our beaches.

A San Diego State University study showed that one cigarette soaked in the water for 96 hours leached enough toxins to kill half of the fresh or saltwater fish exposed to it. 

Considered that most litter occurs within 5 meters of a garbage receptacle, you can see how your support to the SAVE project could make a real difference for this problem.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

SAVE philosophy is all about the little things that are able to make a huge impact. So, if you just can’t contribute, you can help us getting the word out by sharing the SAVE project.

Share with us!

story:
Get Your WASHWOW 2.0 Today!

We launched a crowdfunding campaign in April 2018. Thank all of our backers' support, making WASHWOW 2.0 a reality! We have taken our time and put a lot of effort into testing WASHWOW 2.0, and only when we were certain that we had everything down pat did we decide to move forward. Now is the time to bring WASHWOW 2.0 to market. 

Meet WASHWOW at CES 2019

Date: 8-11 Jan, 2019

Booth: South HALL 1 #21255

How do you get that precious silk dress of yours clean without damaging it? The washing machine is too rough to do the job, but if you choose to hand-wash it instead, you are probably going to end up leaving bacteria behind.

All of these were troubles until the coming of WASHWOW 2.0.

WASHWOW 2.0 is going to change the way that people think about doing laundry.

No Clothes Damage

With WASHWOW 2.0 to clean your business and casual wearing in a high-tech gentle way, you can relax and say good-bye to shrinking clothes. All kinds of delicate fabrics are tested to be safe from any damage, including silk, lace and so on. There is no abrasion in using this magic technique to clean clothes, and it especially protects your high-grade clothes.

Disinfection

Don’t just clean your clothes; disinfect them! WASHWOW 2.0 makes a 99.98% sterilization rate possible. Using water of electrolysis technique, WASHWOW 2.0 disinfects even your most delicate clothing from the inside out without using any detergent or additive.

Portability

Weighing in at just 265g, WASHWOW 2.0 is surprisingly easy to carry in any luggage or handbag wherever you go! So you can travel without the hassle of laundry.

Saving Water & Money

Without any laundry detergent, this means big savings! All you need is water and electricity. Wash clothes with only 1/6 water needed by a traditional washing machine.

Wireless Charging Technology

WASHWOW 2.0 charges without any wires. This means ultimate convenience for you. Forget about looking around for power outlets in new places!

Queitness

Making no sound even when it is on, WASHWOW 2.0 is just as peaceful as it is convenient! So you can wash during late hours without distrubing even the lightest sleepers.

The working principle of WASHWOW 2.0 is to use the reactive oxygen species which generated by electrolysis of water to decompose organic stains on clothes. The machine interior is coated with noble metal which can create positive and negative electrodes. The components OH, O, O2, O3, On, HnOn can decompose the organic dirt into water and carbon dioxide or others, and hypochlorous acid has antibacterial effect to make bacteria and dust mites not attach to clothes.

There is alkaline ionic at the cathode end during water electrolysis, to create an environment like having detergent but better effect, the metallic oxide, lipids and some residual chemical components in the wastewater are oxidized and discomposed accordingly. Also, there is acid iron on the anode end to achieve the effect of sterilization and deodorization combined functions. WASHWOW 2.0 is a ground-breaking advance in the laundry world.

Does it really work?

Here is the testing result of WASHWOW 2.0 sample:

 

Step 1: Charge your WASHWOW 2.0 with a wireless charging pad for 6-8 hours. On a full charge WASHWOW 2.0 will last for six 20-25-minute uses.

Step 2: Turn WASHWOW 2.0 on. You can choose either of the two intensity modes.

Step 3: Put clothes in water and place WASHWOW 2.0 inside.

Step 4: Rinse your clothes and then hang them out to dry. 

Voila! Your clothing, delicate as they may have seemed, are now 100% clean and 100% intact. 

The orignal WASHWOW 2.0 set including:

Right now, we offer a featured WASHWOW 2.0 set with a portable carrying case.

The best set for travel.

 

How much laundry can WASHWOW 2.0 clean in one load?

  • We recommend no more than 1 kg (4-5 T shirt or underwear) of laundry every washing.

Can WASHWOW 2.0 remove stains like tomato sauce or soy sauce?

  • Yes, according to our testings, it can effectively remove stains like tomato sauce or soy sauce.

Can I add detergent while using WASHWOW 2.0 ?

  • No. Please don't add any detergent while using WASHWOW 2.0. As it works by water of electrolysis to create reactive oxygen species which can remove the organic stain on clothes. It also can effective kill most bacteria on underwear. The sterilization rate can reach 99.98%.

Are there any fabrics that should not be washed with this product? Specifically, water repellent fabrics. I am concerned the process used might effect the water repellency on my clothes.

  • No worries, it will do no harm to any kind of fabric. It will not effect the water repellency on your water repellent clothes. We recommend to wash thin and delicate fabric like lace, silk, and cotton etc.

Will WASHWOW 2.0 discolor my clothes?

  • No. it preserves your clothes’ color. 

How long can the battery last on one charge?

  • Please charge WASHWOW 2.0 with wireless charging pad for 6-8 hours. After fully charged, it can be used for 5-6 times (20-25 mins for each time) in most common scenarios.

Is there any indicator light showing it has been fully charged?

  • Yes, there is a red indicator light on the surface of WASHWOW 2.0. When it is fully charged, the red indicator light will be on for long, not flashing any more.

Can I use the wireless charging pad of my iPhone to charge WASHWOW 2.0?

  • Yes, WASHWOW 2.0 can support wireless charging pad with QI standard at market (such as wireless charging pad for iPhone or other Smart Phone).

Can I take WASHWOW 2.0 in my carry-on package on flight?

  • Yes. The lithium-ion battery capacity of WASHWOW 2.0 is 6000 mAH (0.6 Wh) which is far lower that the limit standard of international airports. The restrictions as per the Federal Aviation Administration are for lithium-ion batteries rated above “100 watt hours (Wh) per battery”. Don't worry, just put WASHWOW 2.0 into your carry-on baggage.

Can WASHWOW 2.0 replace my automatic washing machine?

  • No. WASHWOW 2.0 is not a full cycle washing machine, so it does only the washing part. It will also not be effective for big loads of laundry and for voluminous pieces such as bed linen, towels, jeans etc. It will rather complement your washing machine to deal with small volumes of delicate fabric like silk, lace, T-shirts, underwear etc. which require a sensitive wash. 

What is the main difference between WASHWOW 1.0 and 2.0?

  • WASHWOW 2.0 is the upgrade wireless charging version. Compared with 1.0, 2.0 has adopted wireless charging technology and doesn't need power cable while using. More convenient to use.

Does WASHWOW 2.0 have quality guarantee?

  • Yes, WASHWOW 2.0 has 1 year quality guarantee. If there is any question while using, please feel free to contact our service team at: washwowtechnology@gmail.com.

I'm a member of press media, how do I contact your team?

  • Please contact us at washwowteam@gmail.com.

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to buying WASHWOW 2.0, you also can show your support for WASHWOW 2.0 by sharing our campaign link on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you frequent. We appreciate your ever support and sharing, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing! With all your support, we will keep on innovation!

story:
Penna straw 3D rendering

 

PENNA straws have been noted for 4 pieces of short stainless steel straws, making them easy to carry. It is designed to be detachable in order to increase the portability of the multi-use straw that should always be carried. At the end of the separate piece of straw, a strong magnet is applied for quick assembly and use.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

How uncomfortable would you be if you had to use a cleaning brush every time after you use a straw? The difficulty of washing is the biggest reason many people who have used stainless straws because of the environment are not using them again. Penna Straw uses a clean system with a storage case that makes cleaning straws easier and cleaner.

Difficult washing method of conventional stainless straw

 

How to clean the straws with the brushes in the case

 

 

 

 The Penna straw special case is equipped with UV light for sterilization. This feature eliminates 99.9% of invisible bacteria that are not sterilized by washing. 

 

 

Penna Straw was created after a year of research and development.

 

 

 

 

 

Take Penna straw easily with the storage case.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Warranty : PENNA Straw is manufactured by Elretron Inc. a Korea company renown for Retro Design & New technology and strict safety regulations are applied accordingly. Certified technical staff in Elretron is able to process all procedures to ensure safety and quality assurance.

 

Manufacturing design: Our products, already validated by precedented prototype, have been redesigned after additional modifications. Engineers and mechanical experts at Elretron ceaselessly strive to make perfect product with processes which we will continuously communicate with our backers even after the funding.

 

Production :To make the highest quality PENNA Straw, we place the foremost priority on making it perfect, while having no interests in short-term profit. All manufacturing facilities are located in South Korea to maintain highest quality in production line.

We have conducted numerous simulations with our factories to solve in advance, all of technical problems that could possibly arise from manufacturing process, and we prepared specification requirement and facilities ready for immediate production after the funding. We will provide continuous communication to our backers and deliver the complete product by the promised timeline.

 

Shipping : PENNA is manufactured and assembled in Korea to ensure first-rate workmanship, and maybe subject to duties when being shipped to international address.

story:
HY-TEK Bio: Changing the Equation on Climate Change with Algae

HY-TEK Bio is an emerging global leader in reducing greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions using algae. The company's patent-pending technology uses a unique strain of algae (HTB-1) - isolated from thousands of strains - to consume up to 100 percent of the GHG emissions from flue gases generated by industrial manufacturing and power generation.
HY-TEK Bio has created a revolutionary business model that unquestionably changes the equation regarding climate change since it allows the use of fossil fuels, methane and even biomass as sources of clean energy while generating revenue to pay for the installation and operation of the technology, including profits for users and investors.
Because of the optimum conditions created in HY-TEK Bio’s patent-pending photo bioreactor tanks, the algae reproduces at an accelerated rate using the GHG emissions as food and is then harvested to manufacture high-value products, including pharmaceuticals, nutraceuticals, bioplastics, thickeners for cosmetics and paints, nutritional additives for animal and human food products, lutein/zeaxanthin (ultra antioxidants) as well as biofuel.


HY-TEK Bio has been recognized with awards and grants
HY-TEK Bio has developed its patent-pending processes in partnership with the University of Maryland's Center for Environmental Sciences  and Institute for Marine and Environmental Technologies, and has been recognized extensively with both grants and awards:

  • Climate Change & Emissions Management Corporation’s (CCEMC)  - HY-TEK Bio in cooperation with the University of Maryland Center for Environmental Science was awarded a $500,000 grant as one of 24 Finalists among 344 submissions from 37 countries on six continents as part of a $35 million international Grand Challenge for Innovative Carbon Uses.
  • The Maryland Industrial Partnerships Program  - HY-TEK Bio was awarded three $100,000 grants over the past 4 years in addition to a current grant of $240,000 to work with the University of Maryland Center for Environmental Science to help move its technology toward commercialization.
  • Department of EnergyDepartment of Energy (DOE) - HY-TEK Bio also has been fortunate to have received a $255,000 grant from the DOE through a contract with the City of Baltimore to demonstrate that its technology could mitigate a portion of the Greenhouse Gas (GHG) emissions from the exhaust gases produced by the City’s methane-fired three-megawatt electric generators at their Back River Waste Water Treatment Plant. 
  • Maryland Clean Energy Center (MCEC) - Recently chose HY-TEK Bio’s President & CEO, Robert M. Mroz, as the 2014 Entrepreneur of the Year. The MCEC was created in 2008 by the Maryland State Legislature to encourage the transformation of the energy economy and catalyze the growth of green business strategies in Maryland.


Now, HY-TEK Bio needs your support to commercialize
While HY-TEK Bio has support in its research and development, we still need funding to commercialize processes that can change how we all invest in the reduction of greenhouse gas.
HY-TEK Bio’s technology produces large volumes of high grade algae which can be used to produce a multitude of high-value products as mentioned above.  To do this, the HY-TEK Bio process uses unique bioreactors (very large containers filled with algae) as an optimum environment to allow its special strain of algae to rapidly grow and consume the CO2, NOx and other GHG emissions in the flue gases. These photo bioreactors are a HY-TEK Bio patent-pending design developed from unique materials.
We have also developed unique and innovative advancements in LED grow light technology, gas injection technology, and inexpensive yet high value nutrients – but that’s a whole other story. What we need your help with right now is…


WE NEED $50,000 to:

  • Fund the final re-design and prototyping of our latest photo bioreactors, including 3D software design for automation of the manufacturing process which includes the water-proofing base plate and supporting top ring for the photo bioreactors;
  • Fund the final design and prototype of our unique algae de-watering technology so we can quickly de-water the algae we harvest from our photo bioreactors so we can convert the algae to marketable products, and;
  • Fund the design and production of promotional materials to help explain the HY-TEK Bio technology and process to potential customers.

The impact of your contribution
Your contribution to HY-TEK Bio will have an immediate impact on moving our technology to commercialization.  A product that is ready to installation at landfills, waste water treatment plants, cement factories, power plants and other carbon emitters on a large scale.
There are literally thousands of landfills, waste water treatment plants, cement factories, power plants and other carbon emitters around the world that this technology can be installed and reduce if not completely eliminate the GHG emissions these facilities vent into the atmosphere every day.  And since the technology generates a revenue stream from the sale of the algae, local economies are supported through the new jobs and marketable products this technology creates

Your contribution will help launch this clean energy technology into the world.
We have had a demonstration of this technology working on an industrial scale for the past 18 months and have had help from the state and federal government and the support of expert university staff, but we need your help right now to actually launch this clean energy technology into the real world!

story:
Art Lamp is more than just a lamp

Art Lamp is a desk lamp you can play with. When you are thinking or fidgeting. Art Lamp can become a way to release your stress and bring up the creative spirit.

Art Lamp can has countless shapeds

 

 When you feeling tired from long period of working and blocked in thoughts, just spend a few seconds changing Art Lamp into another fomation. The moment you turn on the new shape of light on your desk, it might trigger some new inspiration :) 

 Why would you need Art Lamp?

 

 

Creative habbit: Challenge yourself to make Art Lamp different everyday, and fostering a little creative habbit :)

Mood Changer: Sometimes, create things can be a long march, but Art Lamp can provide a creative outcome spending only a few seconds. The sense of completion is great for mood adjustion :) 

 When you are stucked with work in hand, or feeling stressful, just fidget Art Lamp. Changing shape, play with switich, or simply play with the tube. Fidget is a good way to release stress and

help with focusing. 

 

Just tab and fidget with it :)

Since you can change the shape and brightness, Art Lamp can be placed anywhere as a nice decoration.

Art Lamp's battery can be charged with included cable. 

The battery capacity is 800mA. 

Art Lamp uses top quality beech wood material as shell, and 0.75*2W LED light.  

 Please note that the variation rate changes all the time, the following chart is only for referrence.

 

Risks and challenges

1. On timing: 
Since the exact number of backers is unknown to us, so the timing may fall out of schedule a little. But we did leave ourselves with extra time already, and we will try to get ahead of time for each step, so don't worry. :)

2. On shipping: 
Shipping is another potential problem as well. Should the shipping take way too long than regular time, we will assume the package is lost and resend the reward. Promises promises :)

3. On refund: 
We will arrange refund, if it is strongly insisted. There is no point in keeping the money from backers if they don't have our back any more. We will do our best to meet backers' anticipation as we should, and hope the worst won't happen.

The moment you turn on the new shape of light on your desk, it might trigger some new inspiration :)  Why would you need Art Lamp?  Creative habbit: Challenge yourself to make Art Lamp different everyday, and fostering a little creative habbit :)Mood Changer: Sometimes, create things can be a long march, but Art Lamp can provide a creative outcome spending only a few seconds. The sense of completion is great for mood adjustion :)  When you are stucked with work in hand, or feeling stressful, just fidget Art Lamp. Changing shape, play with switich, or simply play with the tube. Fidget is a good way to release stress and help with focusing.  Just tab and fidget with it :)Since you can change the shape and brightness, Art Lamp can be placed anywhere as a nice decoration.Art Lamp's battery can be charged with included cable. The battery capacity is 800mA. Art Lamp uses top quality beech wood material as shell, and 0.75*2W LED light.   Please note that the variation rate changes all the time, the following chart is only for referrence. Risks and challenges1. On timing: Since the exact number of backers is unknown to us, so the timing may fall out of schedule a little. But we did leave ourselves with extra time already, and we will try to get ahead of time for each step, so don't worry. :)2. On shipping: Shipping is another potential problem as well. Should the shipping take way too long than regular time, we will assume the package is lost and resend the reward. Promises promises :)3. On refund: We will arrange refund, if it is strongly insisted. There is no point in keeping the money from backers if they don't have our back any more. We will do our best to meet backers' anticipation as we should, and hope the worst won't happen.

story:
What need to power up this?

Only the charging cable capable with your device and the sun.

How it works?

Just plug the cable to the charger and turn the charger to the sun. It will automatically start.

Can I order from anywhere in the world?

Yes, for sure. As we found out there is no obstacle for entering any country in the world but anyway all purchaser have to know about theirs country's customs process and restrictions for imports.

Is there any battery?

No, there is no battery inculded. It is instantly providing electricity.

How much does shipping cost?

Shipping is set to $7 due to the fact that we ship worldwide directly from our factory in Asia NB: Application of extra shipping costs: if you are in a “difficult to ship area”, such as remote locations, extra shipping costs may be applied. Please also note that some destinations, such as remote islands, can prove simply impossible to ship to. If you think you live in a hard-to-reach location, then please contact us before placing your order.

What kind of warranty being offered?

All plancx's come with a 1 year limited manufacturer's warranty. Should you encounter some production related manufacturer’s defect during this time, we will take care of it according to our warranty. Otherwise, we do not offer warranty for user-induced reasons. For more details, please contact us via contact@plancx.com.

What is your returns policy?

Please contact with us via contact@plancx.com

Any additional taxes, duties or VAT?


 

If you buy only one item, it is not supposed to be needed paying extra fee because we send the package as a regular post mail with a tracking number. That means there will be no customs process for most country. Anyway, the backer is responsible if any fee apply so please check your country's import duties/VAT/GST before purchasing.

story:
Looking for Distributors & International dealers


Dear backers

Do you own or manage a wholesale company, distributorship? We are seeking global distributors, who specialize in any of the following industries: Camping/Outdoors Adventure, RV, Marine/Beach, Hardware/Garden, General Retail, Solar Installers, Solar Wholesalers, Survival/Disaster Prep, Fishing, Sustainability/Earth Friendly, Off-Grid, and other niche markets that complement Solar. Please kindly send us an email (flextech_sales4@meigeinc.com) for cooperation.

SunPack solar backpack 

 

Amazing features of SunPack solar backpack:     

  1. 3-in-1 removeable solar panel, power bank and backpack are integrated in one gear, off-grid power supply for camping or emergency backup. 
  2.  Built-in ultra thin 3500mAh li-polymer battery, can be charged by solar panel; About 3~5 hours to fully charge under 70000lux light condition. An hour charging can support 1.5-2.5 hours talk time. 
  3.  High Process: 5.3W solar panel uses ETFE coating instead of PET, be free from maintenance, the age of ETFE laminated membrane is up to 25 years 
  4.  Details: RFID safe pocket--- Keep personal data safe , Quick access key ring---Ensure your keys safely stored, Road safety reflectors to never worry about driving a bike during night.... 
  5. High Quality: Made from durable and water resistant oxford cloth , which is light-weight carrying; Exquisite workmanship and humanized zipper and straps make the user more comfortable.

 

 The project link is https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/sunpack-a-backpack-with-removable-solar-charger/x/12777016#/

We appreciate your support ! :)  

Flextech solar gadgets

 

..................................................................................................................................................................

Meet the PocketPower

When you're outdoors , in the jungle, on the mountains, wherever , and the battery of your phone is dead. Same for your powerbank. And you desperately want to use the GPS function of your smart phone... But you can't. Because there`s no power. How to prevent that from happening? PocketPower can help you out. 

PocketPower is an ultra portable solar charger, which can be folded and easily fit into your pocket . Thanks to the support of 946 backers, our campaign was just successfully funded in kickstarter. 

Lillian and her friend David introducing PocketPower in Rocky Mountains.  No worries about charging under low temperature, the PocketPower`s operation temperature is -20℃~70℃.

 

PocketPower at CES 2017 in Las Vegas.

Where can you use PocketPower?

PocketPower is good for camping, travelling, hiking and emergency preparation. It can power up all your USB devices including mobile phones, tablets, power banks, MP4, GPS, bluetooth headsets ,portable speakers and other gadgets when there`s sunshine. Or you can combine it with bags, bikes, golf cart, boat, tents.  

 

Solar fan system.

Solar Backpack

PocketPower can be attacheded to your backpack, charging your devices on the move.

 Just wipe it clean

See the PocketPower is easy to clean up no matter it`s covered by dust, ice cream or other stuffs.

Under water test

When the water covers Pocket Power, it still can charge the electric fan.

Technology

Surface deep embossing + ETFE film coating+ integrated lamilation, making this panel waterproof, dustproof, super durable.

Advantages of deep embossing surface craft.

Auto-Restart function

 

Specifications 

 PocketPower solar charger , Powerbank, Backpack.

 

Perks

 

Timeline

 

Thank YOU

Thank you previous backers, your support encourages us to continuously make high quality solar gadgets.

Thank you John, Dave, Charie  for deisigning such a cool solar charger and always improving product technology

Thank you Lillian, Ellie, Joyce, Song, Susan, Nana ,XP `s help in taking videos and pictures.

In this sunny winter day, we present PocketPower solar charger to you , hope you love it and will have a happy charging time! :)

Follow us 

FAQ

1) Want to ask if the solar charger can charge all the power banks or just the power bank you provided?

 It can charge all the power banks. 

2)  How well does it charge in indoor lighting?

Outdoor lighting is always best for solar products. window glass will weaken the sunlight by around 50%. The charging speed will be slower.

3) Are cells poly or monocrystaline?

cells are monocrystaline.

4) How durable is the pocketpower under normal usage? 

Under normal usage the lifespan of PocketPower is 5~8 years because of durable surface material ETFE film and integrated lamination method.

5) Are the bags water proof or water resistant?

The bag itself is not waterproof, but it`s with raincover to provide extra waterproof protection.

Refund/Return Policy

We take our quality control very seriously, every product`s appearance and electrical performance will be checked before sending out, but rarely there may be a manufacturing defect. In this case, we are happy to assist you with an exchange or repair of your product . Please note: there will be no exchanges unless there is a manufacturing defect.   Also scratches or problems caused by user's carelessness are not included in the after-sales service terms.  Buyer’s simple change in mind cannot be the reason for refund or exchange. If it`s a manufacturing defect, we`ll take our responsiblity,  under this circumstances, you can return your unused purchase to our warehouse. Customer will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning the item. Shipping cost is not refundable. 

Risks and challenges

We understand there might be unforeseen issues even for the best laid plan, however, samples of PocketPower have been made, tested, and put into some real life situations to use. They perform very well. Also in November PocketPower passed CE RoHS FCC tests.

Our biggest challenge will be international delivery because different countries have different policies. Some unexpected components shortage can happen. In that case, we will try our best to solve the problem. However, PocketPower is our second kickstarter campaign. We have successfully delivered Powerleaf solar chargers to kickstarter backers , so this time shipping will be easier.

Please also feel free to let us know your concerns, we look forward to hearing from the Indiegogo community. Thank you!

story:
DGP High Performance Synthetic Lubricants

Extend Engine Life
Reduce Engine Wear
Lengthen Time Between Fluid Changes
Reduce Metal Breakdown
Outperform Conventional Petroleum 100% of the Time

...Oh and it's Green 
 

THE 2020 CHALLENGE - Stop Making a Mess of Things

There are over 300 million pieces of power equipment and machines in the United States that use oil, and over 200 million gallons of that oil is spilled, dripped, leaked or disposed of illegally every year. DGP High Performance products are biodegradable, breaking down up to 30 times faster when exposed to microorganisms in the case of a spill or leak. This means less of an impact on the environment. We ALL have to do our part to overcome this challenge.

Watch what happens when we use 10W-30 Plant based synthetic oil in our F-250s and measure the performance against Semi-Synthetic

DGP products will replace your conventional petroleum fluids with something innovative, green, and high performance. See Detailed Report

THE 2020 ANSWER - Go Green and Increase Equipment Life

In these unfortunate times where a virus has slowed the world down, we are already being able to see rivers clean up and smog reduce. We have to realize we are doing this to ourselves. We have to start thinking differently about what we are doing. We have to make the world a cleaner place.  Until this point, using green lubricants meant you had to give up performance and question whether it was good for your equipment. DGP High Performance products not only reduce environmental pollution, but they increase equipment life, allowing machines to run more efficiently while you have a better peace of mind.  Not only do we work great in heavy machinery, but we are an excellent option to help every person reduce their usage of petroleum based and non-biodegradable fluids. 

       

HOW DID WE DO IT WHEN OTHERS HAVEN'T BEEN ABLE TO?

Where there's a will, there's a way. There isn't much sleep, lots of money spent, AND new challenges day after day. That is a good question how did we do it? Simple...we wouldn't take NO for an answer and we didn't know enough not to try unordinary things. We are so proud that we have solved something others have not been able to. This can and will make an impact with your help.

Look at the difference in heat maps between petroleum and plant-based Bar & Chain Oil

Watch Video on Bar & Chain Oil

WHO ARE WE?

Dynamic Green Products Inc is a bio-based lubricant and solutions manufacturer headquartered in Houston, Texas. The last 4 years we have been perfecting our products under the brand NV Earth. We have proven that it is possible to make high performance synthetic lubricants without petroleum base. We are now launching a full line of high performance lubricants under the brand DGP High Performance. Our unique formulas allow us to create a plant based lubricant that will outperform petroleum based products 100% of the time. 

 PRESS KIT

What We Need & What You Get

IT IS TIME TO BRING THIS TO THE WORLD IN A BIG WAY.  As a start-up company, we are asking for help to enable us to get our new products to the world and create an international awareness campaign about the benefits of these bio-based alternatives. With your donation, you can receive various gifts, ranging from stickers, to t-shirts, bio-based product and more! We need supportive backers who want to make a change in the world through simple purchasing decisions of unique bio-based solutions. Even if you can only pledge $5 to our campaign, we want you to know it has a meaningful difference because you’ve acknowledged your support to help advance safer, bio-based solutions that anyone can use.  We are grateful to everyone that can help promote our cause which will benefit millions of people across the country operating power equipment.  Imagine what would happen if suddenly 1 million people stopped buying petrochemical based products tomorrow and bought bio-based?  You can be a part of that change and whether you’re a seasoned professional or weekend DIY’er, we hope you join us.

Watch the video below to see the full line of DGP Products.

Risks & Challenges

Our main challenge is that we are a small company and unknown to millions of potential consumers. However as our funding grows and we are able to invest in national marketing we hope to eliminate that hurdle.  We also recognize that many people can be skeptical of bio-based products, as the majority of marketing and advertising they’re exposed to in the US is from Big petroleum and petrochemical based products.   Since you are a campaign backer that will receive DGP High Performance products, we would ask that you show family, friends, neighbors, co-workers, schools, city officials and more, how they perform and where to find them.  In doing so you become the conduit for proliferation of DGP bio-based products and you are the ones generating real awareness.  All the data sheets and science in the world can substantiate our claims but people want to see other people using the products, it affirms their desire to make a change.  This is where we really need your help and we hope that your passion for a cleaner Earth, your support for our campaign and your promotion of our message will be transformative for others that share the same vision.  It comes down to you, our amazing contributors!  By sharing our name on social media or through email or during your next chat over coffee, you are doing something positive for the planet and for equipment operators.  Let's make a difference future generations can be proud of, team DGP thanks you for your support.

If you are a company that wants to provide their customers the high performing product that does the right thing or a company that wants to talk about swapping your petroleum products with a sustainable solution...Call us @ 1.855.BIO.OILS

story:
This is Nofence

The system consists of a solar-powered GPS collar and an app. If an animal crosses the nofence boundary and enters the warning zone, the collar starts vibrating and beeping to warn the animal that it might receive an electric shock. They are easily trained to  understand what the signals from the collar mean, and turn back to avoid the electric shock. This ensures that the animal stay within the defined boundary. Nofence safeguards animal welfare and promotes sustainable agriculture.

Features included

  • Nofence smartphone-app (Android og iOS) for daily administration of pastures and tracking of your collars. Draw new pastures or change existing pastures.

  • my.nofence.no - User portal for desktop computer
    Log in via your browser and access all data collected from the collars for a deeper analysis- Behaviour data is presented as heat maps and statistics. You can also activate or deactivate your pool of collars.

  • Firmware updates – Quick and easy
    We push out new firmware updates to all your collars through the mobile network.

  • Free Support
    Call us for help - Linda and her team will be ready to help. We will also supply all the material you need to learn about our technology and how to train your goats

  • Connectivity
    All collars comes with a SIM-card that enables data communication over your local mobile network- The subscription cost to the network provider is included in your price.

The user portal - https://my.nofence.no will give you valueable insights into status and statistics such as grazing habits - This is seen from our support console where we easily can look at your data if you need any help

Press

 

    How it works

     

    You need:

    The Nofence system consists of the collars worn by the animals, as well as an app that works on tablets and smartphones (iOS & Android).

     

    Draw the grazing area

    The app allows you to draw the virtual fence on a digital map. Keep in mind the natural behaviour of your goats and their ability to understand Nofence when drawing the virtual fence. If the area is too small, doesn’t have the variety of vegetation that the goats want or does not satisfy basic needs, they are less likely to respect the Nofence boundary. In addition, the grazing area shouldn’t have any sharp angles or excessively narrow corridors. Also remember that GPS works best if the collar has a clear line of sight in all directions.

    Nofence allows you to create whatever grazing area you want, but obviously you should bear in mind the terrain and surroundings. Give the animals access to water by putting the boundary slightly into a tarn, lake or a river. Give access to rocky terrain, that the goat loves, but is difficult to fence. Manage your livestock to improve your land. Use this great tool and give yourself and your animals a better farm life!

    Find more information here

    The new design:

    After the pilot we saw several areas for improvement which are now included in our new hardware design. Status as of January 15th is that all parts are now ordered, and our sub supplier in China is starting to construct the injection molds - We will update our backers with the progress

    3D Model of the 2018 Nofence Goat Collar

     

    The Product packages in this campaign (Perks)

    The goat collars provided in this campaign comes in two types of product packages, each in a few different sizes that can be combined to the amount of collars you need:

    1) PRE-PAID 12 month - 1, 4, 6 or 10 Collars
    The best deal - Buy the collars you need with 12 months of subscription cost included at a reduced price. Suitable for those grazing all the year. (Cost equivalent to approx. 7 months use of FLEX)

    2) FLEX - 1, 4, 6 or 10 Collars
    The flexible deal - Buy the collars and pay the subscription cost monthly, starting when you receive the collars. Suitable if you want to reduce up-front cost and pay as you go. 

    (The general terms & conditions that will apply, can be found on our website here)

    Delivery time

    We plan for delivery in some selected markets first. Norway, our home market, will be prioritized to get the first deliveries.

    • Norway Q3 2018 (estimated late june)
    • Europe Q3 2018 (estimated august)
    • Australia & New Zealand Q4 2018 (estimated october)
    • USA & Canada Q4 2018 (estimated december)

    Risks & Challenges

    The product works and has been used by 120 pilot farmers in Norway the last two years. A total of 1200 collars and approx. 3.000.000 hours of thorough testing have given us a great opportunity to improve the prototype collar to an industrialized and market ready product.


    The 2016 Prototype used in the two year trials in Norway - Se also the videos below.

    We have experienced a lot of trouble in the pilot, like watertightness, hardware issues and energy issues. These risks are now strongly mitigated for the next version of the collar. We have completely re-designed the collar so it will meet those issues or in technical terms; IP-54 class. Hardware design is improved through cooperation with industry leading advisors and suppliers. So far, energy balance has been the biggest issue. Continuous position measurements and data transmission are energy consuming. The collar has solar panels to refill energy into the battery. The new design will therefore have a battery package that can easily be replaced when necessary. For comparison to your farm, we achieved 30-40  days of use before battery change, at a farm in North West coast of Norway, September 2016.

    Energy consumption depends on how close the animals are grazing to the Nofence boundary. Larger pastures generally gives less energy consumption due to smart software. You must expect to replace batteries during use, especially in northern Europe, but we ensure you that we are working hard every day towards the ultimate goal of energy balance in demanding countries like Norway. In other countries, more blessed with solar radiation, this could be significant better in theory, but we have no data to quantify this (yet…)

    The collar has a satelite receiver that provide position data. Position accuracy  can be an issue near ie. steep cliffs or near/inside buildings. The best position accuracy is however found in open landscapes that correlates well with quality pastures. If the animals absolutely have to be in areas with less accurate position data, we have a bluetooth beacon that can be used for this purpose. You will get more information and guidance about this later.

    The collar communicates through the mobile phone network - It sends you notifications, receives firmware-updates and changes you make on the nofence boundary or the flock. NB! Be aware that you will need mobile phone coverage where you will use the product.

    Background

    As a child, Oscar Hovde Berntsen, the inventor and founder of Nofence, envisioned a future without fences. He grew up on a small scale farm on the north-west coast of rural Norway with lots of animals. He loved to release the animals from their fences, so they could enjoy the fresh pastures in the hillsides. The idea of the possibility to drop fences was born. Some years after he graduated with an engineering degree in electronics, the available technology were starting to mature, and in 2007 - 10 years ago - he decided to start exploring the idea and make the first mock-ups for a collar that could make virtual fencing a reality. And it worked!
    Meet Oscar:

    Now, ten years later we are a small group of dedicated engineers and farmers who use this equipment on a daily basis.
    Meet Magnus from Nofence - He started a lucrative goat grazing service:

    A prototype has been in use for two years and has delivered real value to our 120 pilot customers and virtual fences to 1200 goats throughout Norway. With this valuable experience and acid test we are now moving one more step and are ready to start the very first sale - We are excited to invite you to join our journey

    Use of funds

    For delivery in 2018 we are going to produce a limited number of goat-collars.  This first round of sale will hopefully give us the necessary funding to start the early growth of our company. We will use these funds to hire the next key employees. 

    Team

    Meet the current employees:


    In addition we have a strong team of external advisors:

    Hardcore Hardware Designer: Leif Gunnar Ellingsen at PartnerPlast 
    Software Architect: Per Sandved Hustad  and the rest of the great Axbit-team
    Industrial Designers at Minoko Design

    Production and final assembly  is being done at SIMPRO , located just an hour drive away. 

    Important notice before you buy:

    Now we are offering Nofence collar that is designed, tested and documented specific for use on goats. Collars for cattle is our next priority and will be available in 2019 - Trials for sheep will start during 2018. 

    1. That means it can be used for GOATS ONLY
    2. .You need cell phone coverage at the grazing site to be able to use the system!
    3. We have proper scientific documentation that the product has no animal welfare issues. You will be responsible to make sure if there are any regulatory issues prohibiting use in your country.
    4. Remember that goats need companions. We recommend a minimum of 4 goats in one flock for optimal performance and animal welfare.

    5. Our general terms & conditions will apply - By placing an order through Indiegogo you have agreed to these. Please find these on our web page

    6. VAT is not included in the prices. For norwegian customers we will invoice VAT (Merverdiavgift) after delivery. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Maybe you are one of those who just like our idea and have no plans to start as a farmer? We are happy for all the support we can get - So please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Share the campaign site using the Indiegogo share tools!


    Questions?

    Find our FAQ here or ask us at  sales@nofence.no

     

     - All the best from the Nofence Team -
story_txt:
This is Nofence

The system consists of a solar-powered GPS collar and an app. If an animal crosses the nofence boundary and enters the warning zone, the collar starts vibrating and beeping to warn the animal that it might receive an electric shock. They are easily trained to  understand what the signals from the collar mean, and turn back to avoid the electric shock. This ensures that the animal stay within the defined boundary. Nofence safeguards animal welfare and promotes sustainable agriculture.
Features included

Nofence smartphone-app (Android og iOS) for daily administration of pastures and tracking of your collars. Draw new pastures or change existing pastures.
my.nofence.no - User portal for desktop computerLog in via your browser and access all data collected from the collars for a deeper analysis- Behaviour data is presented as heat maps and statistics. You can also activate or deactivate your pool of collars.
Firmware updates – Quick and easyWe push out new firmware updates to all your collars through the mobile network.
Free SupportCall us for help - Linda and her team will be ready to help. We will also supply all the material you need to learn about our technology and how to train your goats
ConnectivityAll collars comes with a SIM-card that enables data communication over your local mobile network- The subscription cost to the network provider is included in your price.

The user portal - https://my.nofence.no will give you valueable insights into status and statistics such as grazing habits - This is seen from our support console where we easily can look at your data if you need any help
Press

 

How it works
 
You need:
The Nofence system consists of the collars worn by the animals, as well as an app that works on tablets and smartphones (iOS & Android). Draw the grazing area
The app allows you to draw the virtual fence on a digital map. Keep in mind the natural behaviour of your goats and their ability to understand Nofence when drawing the virtual fence. If the area is too small, doesn’t have the variety of vegetation that the goats want or does not satisfy basic needs, they are less likely to respect the Nofence boundary. In addition, the grazing area shouldn’t have any sharp angles or excessively narrow corridors. Also remember that GPS works best if the collar has a clear line of sight in all directions.
Nofence allows you to create whatever grazing area you want, but obviously you should bear in mind the terrain and surroundings. Give the animals access to water by putting the boundary slightly into a tarn, lake or a river. Give access to rocky terrain, that the goat loves, but is difficult to fence. Manage your livestock to improve your land. Use this great tool and give yourself and your animals a better farm life!
Find more information here
The new design:
After the pilot we saw several areas for improvement which are now included in our new hardware design. Status as of January 15th is that all parts are now ordered, and our sub supplier in China is starting to construct the injection molds - We will update our backers with the progress
3D Model of the 2018 Nofence Goat Collar
 
The Product packages in this campaign (Perks)
The goat collars provided in this campaign comes in two types of product packages, each in a few different sizes that can be combined to the amount of collars you need:
1) PRE-PAID 12 month - 1, 4, 6 or 10 CollarsThe best deal - Buy the collars you need with 12 months of subscription cost included at a reduced price. Suitable for those grazing all the year. (Cost equivalent to approx. 7 months use of FLEX)
2) FLEX - 1, 4, 6 or 10 CollarsThe flexible deal - Buy the collars and pay the subscription cost monthly, starting when you receive the collars. Suitable if you want to reduce up-front cost and pay as you go. 
(The general terms & conditions that will apply, can be found on our website here)
Delivery time
We plan for delivery in some selected markets first. Norway, our home market, will be prioritized to get the first deliveries.

Norway Q3 2018 (estimated late june)
Europe Q3 2018 (estimated august)
Australia & New Zealand Q4 2018 (estimated october)
USA & Canada Q4 2018 (estimated december)
