story:
GARBACO’s mission is to provide Nigeria, and other regions of Africa, with truly more affordable and quicker housing options by utilizing innovative do-it-yourself PolyPanel technology, in-built solar power generation and water purification devices.

 

 
 

 

GARBACO will provide affordable solar powered homes initially in Nigeria, followed by other nations throughout Africa and the world, which will assist in eliminating the use of air-polluting diesel generators.

 

 

 

And in a nation where clean water is so scarce that locals forewarn others of the dangers of swallowing dirty shower water, providing water purification systems in-home is a key component for radically altering the common family’s lifestyle, and improving general health and sanitation.

 

 

 

 

 

Africa is a diverse continent, with roughly 1 billion people, 54 countries and thousands of languages, but many of its economies are facing similar challenges, such as a shortage of affordable housing. For example, Nigeria and Kenya have housing gaps of approximately 17 million and 2 million homes, respectively, while more than 12 million people in Egypt live in informal buildings. Although not specifically characterizing Africa alone, the high gross domestic product expansion, limited job creation, strong population growth and rapid urbanization are much more pronounced in this continent’s economies. And with 70% of homes being self-built, reducing the deficit is taking much longer than it should.

 

 

The sheer numbers alone illustrate the challenges of housing provision, and given that Africa already has the youngest population in the world, countries within the region are in for an extended period of demand for housing as graduates and young professionals contemplate getting married and starting families.

However, the demographic factors only partly explain the depth of the housing deficit in Africa. Another, and potentially more important, factor is the high level of urbanization, which is something that has put a tremendous amount of pressure on existing infrastructure and housing supply.

 

 

As of 2015, a third of sub-Saharan Africans living in towns and cities did not have access to electricity. The situation is particularly pressing in Nigeria, where 80% of the population uses kerosene, charcoal or wood for cooking, which tend to be expensive, inefficient and air-pollutant. It’s time that these unnecessary conditions stop negatively affecting the health and lives of Nigerians, and others around the world. All of GARBACO’s ‘green’ homes will produce its own clean, free solar power energy via high-quality solar panels, by partnering with the already established solar energy companies.

Incredibly high construction costs are the result of expensive building infrastructure and materials like cement, which is an astonishing 35% more expensive than Nigeria’s neighbouring countries. Overall, an increase in prices for building supplies has caused development costs to inflate by over 40%.

 

GARBACO’s more affordable, eco-friendly homes will end Nigeria’s current housing crisis by offering a low cost alternative, rapid construction and an energy efficient Industrialized Building System (IBS).

 

 

Any skillset is capable of stacking the lego-like PolyPanel walls and pieces together, meaning GARBACO will quickly become an employer of African jobseekers who wish to the learn the simple building process.

 

 

 

Since all GARBACO homes are Industrialized Building Systems, which are fully integrated systems, with pre-fabricated components to complete all aspects of the building at ease, including the foundation, walls, ceiling, roofing, columns and beams, they also possess the full flexibility to accommodate third party components. The fire retardant, fiber-reinforced PolyPanel walls will keep the home perfectly insulated so that harsh weather and the beating sun make no difference to its residents. And as if that’s not enough, GARBACO’s PolyPanel walls can also be constructed in any other shape you please, such as a modular room-sized fire safe pod for residents in high-risk zones. Since all pieces are constructed locally on a continuous production line, quality control and overall efficiency are well managed.

 

 

GARBACO’s  first pilot show home is planned to be built in Q4 2017 on an already purchased plot of land in Eleko Junction, Lagos, Nigeria. This is demonstrate the GARBACO PolyPanel technology, proofing our concept and to secure the first round of development  contracts for locals. We’re striving to build 5 million homes over the next decade, with 70% of the business being families.
 

 

GARBACO and Sterling Bank are in discussions to develop the GARBACO PolyPanel scheme, a small loan initiative for those with low income who wish own a GARBACO PolyPanel home. GARBACO will also be looking to build energy efficient ATM cash centres for the banking group where customers can conduct their banking services in a nicer cooler environment.

 

Adron is one of Nigeria’s largest property development and management companies, with over 10,000 developments in its portfolio. Adron looks towards the possibilities of working with GARBACO to develop and deliver a series of PolyPanel homes in 2018.

 

 

 

A serial entrepreneur with a Civil Engineering & Construction professional background, Lucky has founded and invested in a range of businesses from online tech, construction and renewable energy of all which set out to revolutionise the markets they operate in.

Lucky has years of experience in project management behind him gaining most of his skills from the construction industry. Holding a British degree in Civil Engineering Lucky has managed teams and executed engineering projects for some of the biggest engineering companies across Europe and Africa.

As the founder of GARBACO Lucky sets out to provide a more affordable  solution for the African residential housing sector by deploying its own Industrial building system called the PolyPanel, diminishing Africa's 50m housing deficit over the next 10 years.

 

Mark Cooper is the founder of the Mark Cooper Consulting Group, a specialist consulting firm focussing on Law, Finance, Strategy and Operations. With clients including 5 of the ‘top 20’ Fortune 500 companies. Mark across his career gained a number of awards including “Consultant of the Year” (6 Years Consecutive) and the Midas Touch Award.
 
Before devoting his work full time to consulting, Mark specialised in Operations and Company start-ups across Europe & Africa. To date Mark works with some of the largest brands in the world including; Marriott International, Hilton Worldwide, Emirates and Disney.

Mark has been working along side GARBACO developing strategic relationships with top global organisation with objective to create partnerships  focusing on housing development and home ownerships for developing communities and markets in Africa.

Mark is also heavily involved in the Alzheimer’s Charity, a Charity very close to his heart.

 


Manaf is qualified Structural & architectural engineer with extensive experience in design using various structural materials in the residential and commercial sector. Manaf leads design, testing and innovation with the PolyPanel product line ensuring continuous integrity of our industrial building system.

Manaf is lover of contemporary art and sailing.

 

Mati Witter has a professional background in accounting and finance and assist with GARBACO's financial administration, human resources and investor relations.

Mati also has personal interest in African art, history and fashion.

story:
Greenmajii by Imajii: the comprehensive, sustainable substitute for sphagnum peat moss.

 

At Imajii we have formulated, and continue to formulate and design processes which turn nature-friendly industrial and agricultural bio-waste into growing medium for plants in domestic, commercial and agricultural settings - worldwide. 

We have the passion  and a plan to save the planet's most effective carbon sinks - peat bogs - which now cover only 3% of the planet - from the diggers and excavators harvesting precious sphagnum moss for commercial gain as a popular growing medium

We would like your help to put wind under our wings and scale up to the next level - from laboratory to production.  Our needs in Phase 1 are modest: a hammermill, transport costs for bulk miscanthus supplies, and money for some of our special ingredients.  If you can help in non-financial ways with your own special talent, or by sharing our message, that would also be appreciated.

Peat Moss

Peat is an amazing product with unique qualities which is used as a growing medium by the nursery and horticulture industry. Unfortunately, the utilization of peat has tremendous downsides: the excavated peat releases enormous quantities of CO2 into the atmosphere.

Growing Medium

 

 

 

Excavated peat, a major climate sinner, will release 50 kgs of carbon per m3 of peat, which in turn translates to 180 kg of CO2. However, plants such as tomatoes, cucumbers, flowers, and rhododendrons are grown in peat which has several unique qualities which make it especially fit for this purpose. Peat is extremely absorbent and has antifungal and antimicrobial, and pH stable qualities.

Imajii's founder

 

Imajii is based at the Agro Business Park near Viborg in Denmark

 

Ejner Læssøe Madsen, a parkour fan, has a master’s degree in the natural sciences, specializing in innovative chemistry. It is this background that led him to start the company Imajii.            

 

Greenmajii

We have developed Greenmajii – it has the same amazing qualities as peat, but Greenmajii abides by the UN’s Global Sustainability Goals. Our goal is for the nursery, horticulture, and agricultural industries to switch to our sustainable growing medium for the sake of our climate.

 

When you buy a bag of peat (sphagnum moss)...

Every time you buy 1m3 peat from your local nursery or supermarket, at the rate of 1mm per year it will take nature 1000 years to replace what you have used. By robbing nature of this resource, we are also removing a natural carbon sink, which actually removes carbon from the atmosphere like a sponge.

 

Greenmajii is intended for sale to garden centres, horticultural industry and for agricultural use where there are topsoil and erosion issues.

Vanishing Peatlands

Thanks to our massive use of peat, 1 million m3 per year, only 1% of Denmark’s peatlands remain. At this tempo, there would be nothing left at all in Denmark within 5 years.

Greenmajii

 

Our newly developed growing medium, Greenmajii, is sustainably produced, and is carefully engineered with several ingredients to replicate the exceptional qualities of sphagnum peat moss in greenhouses, gardens, and horticulture.

Global Sustainability Goals

With the UN’s Global Sustainability Goals as our benchmark, Greenmajii will be produced and formulated according to local bio-waste resources in Europe, Asia and Africa and South America.

Examples are miscanthus, reeds, banana peels, ginger, hibiscus, and nutshells - not to mention some secret ingredients!

Natural Treasures

A product like Greenmajii will enable us to preserve and expand what remains of these delicate treasures: raised peat bogs and fens. Our climate will no longer be influenced by the emission of massive amounts of CO2 from the extensive use of sphagnum in gardens and horticultural industries.

Can you help?

 

Would you like to help us? Every little bit counts, and your help would be fantastic!

What we have: 

  • We have developed our basic formulas, in various attractive colours, and have been testing them for several months.
  • We are incredibly grateful to the Japanese company Shimadzu for our partnership and for their assistance in making available some of their cutting edge scientific analytical equipment.

What we need:

Crowdfunding phase 1 

  • Transport costs for larger amounts of miscanthus (in Denmark, for Denmark)
  • Our own hammer mill so we can increase production.
  • Purchase of the special ingredients to replicate sphagnum moss, and supply Greenmajii  blocks to local garden centres, for planting and fish ponds.

 

Crowdfunding phase 2. Scaling up in autumn

  • Staffing
  • Materials
You can also help us by sharing our story and this crowdfunding page

[i]

Starck, D. M. (Red.). (2008). Change, Peatlands and Climate. Wagenenin University and Research.

At Imajii we have formulated, and continue to formulate and design processes which turn nature-friendly industrial and agricultural bio-waste into growing medium for plants in domestic, commercial and agricultural settings - worldwide. 
We have the passion  and a plan to save the planet's most effective carbon sinks - peat bogs - which now cover only 3% of the planet - from the diggers and excavators harvesting precious sphagnum moss for commercial gain as a popular growing medium
We would like your help to put wind under our wings and scale up to the next level - from laboratory to production.  Our needs in Phase 1 are modest: a hammermill, transport costs for bulk miscanthus supplies, and money for some of our special ingredients.  If you can help in non-financial ways with your own special talent, or by sharing our message, that would also be appreciated.
Peat Moss

Peat is an amazing product with unique qualities which is used as a growing medium by the nursery and horticulture industry. Unfortunately, the utilization of peat has tremendous downsides: the excavated peat releases enormous quantities of CO2 into the atmosphere.
Growing Medium
 


 
 

Excavated peat, a major climate sinner, will release 50 kgs of carbon per m3 of peat, which in turn translates to 180 kg of CO2. However, plants such as tomatoes, cucumbers, flowers, and rhododendrons are grown in peat which has several unique qualities which make it especially fit for this purpose. Peat is extremely absorbent and has antifungal and antimicrobial, and pH stable qualities.
Imajii's founder
 

Imajii is based at the Agro Business Park near Viborg in Denmark
 
Ejner Læssøe Madsen, a parkour fan, has a master’s degree in the natural sciences, specializing in innovative chemistry. It is this background that led him to start the company Imajii.            

 
Greenmajii
We have developed Greenmajii – it has the same amazing qualities as peat, but Greenmajii abides by the UN’s Global Sustainability Goals. Our goal is for the nursery, horticulture, and agricultural industries to switch to our sustainable growing medium for the sake of our climate.

 
When you buy a bag of peat (sphagnum moss)...

Every time you buy 1m3 peat from your local nursery or supermarket, at the rate of 1mm per year it will take nature 1000 years to replace what you have used. By robbing nature of this resource, we are also removing a natural carbon sink, which actually removes carbon from the atmosphere like a sponge.
 

Greenmajii is intended for sale to garden centres, horticultural industry and for agricultural use where there are topsoil and erosion issues.
Vanishing Peatlands

Thanks to our massive use of peat, 1 million m3 per year, only 1% of Denmark’s peatlands remain. At this tempo, there would be nothing left at all in Denmark within 5 years.
Greenmajii
 

Our newly developed growing medium, Greenmajii, is sustainably produced, and is carefully engineered with several ingredients to replicate the exceptional qualities of sphagnum peat moss in greenhouses, gardens, and horticulture.
Global Sustainability Goals

With the UN’s Global Sustainability Goals as our benchmark, Greenmajii will be produced and formulated according to local bio-waste resources in Europe, Asia and Africa and South America.
Examples are miscanthus, reeds, banana peels, ginger, hibiscus, and nutshells - not to mention some secret ingredients!
Natural Treasures

A product like Greenmajii will enable us to preserve and expand what remains of these delicate treasures: raised peat bogs and fens. Our climate will no longer be influenced by the emission of massive amounts of CO2 from the extensive use of sphagnum in gardens and horticultural industries.
Can you help?

 
Would you like to help us? Every little bit counts, and your help would be fantastic!
What we have: 

We have developed our basic formulas, in various attractive colours, and have been testing them for several months.
We are incredibly grateful to the Japanese company Shimadzu for our partnership and for their assistance in making available some of their cutting edge scientific analytical equipment.

What we need:
Crowdfunding phase 1 

Transport costs for larger amounts of miscanthus (in Denmark, for Denmark)
Our own hammer mill so we can increase production.
Purchase of the special ingredients to replicate sphagnum moss, and supply Greenmajii  blocks to local garden centres, for planting and fish ponds.

 
Crowdfunding phase 2. Scaling up in autumn

Staffing
Materials


You can also help us by sharing our story and this crowdfunding page

[i]
Starck, D. M. (Red.). (2008). Change, Peatlands and Climate. Wagenenin University and Research.

story:
*************************************

January 16, 2015

Focused Sun Supporters:  Our campaign ends today and our donations have fallen far short of our goal. But do not despair; all is not lost.

Our goal was to get funding to commercialize our product. We are partnering with the Xiang Yang Institute of Hubei Province, China to develop the "Microgrid Module" (www.focused-sun.com/fs/products/microgrid ).  It is a variation of our FourFold module -- using the same mirrors and frame but with a high temperature absorber (www.focused-sun.com/fs/technology/hybrid_absorber). Its heat can be stored thermally for a day or more and then delivered to a turbo-generator that produces electricity day or night. Leftover heat from the turbo-generator, like the FourFold, can heat homes and their hot water.  See http://cleantechnica.com/2015/01/09/focused-sun-xiang-yang-institute-partnering-bring-solar-microgrids-china/?utm_source=feedburner&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+IM-cleantechnica+%28CleanTechnica%29

Response to our offer of setting up solar factories was strong.  Nearly a hundred groups from around the world want to start one.  Besides the US, counties include Indonesia, South Africa, Nigeria, India, Korea, Australia, Malaysia, France, UK, Cambodia, New Zealand, Mexico, Egypt and the  Philippines.  In addition,  we have had dozens of investment offers. 

Thank you for your support.  Focused Sun lives on!

     Shawn

*************************************

Summary

I'm Shawn Buckley, founder of Focused Sun and inventor of the FourFold solar module. I'm a former professor of Mechanical Engineering at MIT, specializing in solar energy.  I've written a best selling solar energy book, Sunup to Sundown (McGraw-Hill).  This isn't my first rodeo: I was a founder of Chevron's solar energy subsidiary, Hydro Sun, over 30 years ago. Since then I've founded 3 other Silicon Valley startups.

The FourFold solar panel collects four times more energy from the sun than a conventional photovoltaic (PV) panel.  It's called a "hybrid" because both heat and electricity are captured.

A quarter of its peak energy is electricity (500 W) and three quarters is heat (1500 W). With 2.8 square meters of collecting area, it delivers 2000 peak Watts of energy. List priced at $3000, that's $1.50 per peak Watt.  It's  light enough for roof mounting and its heat can be as valuable as its electricity, especially for water heating, home heating and water sterilization. 

Hybrids aren't new; several other companies make them.  What's new is that we've squeezed the cost and weight from our hybrid.  We make our panels using "sandwich fabrication", a modern way to make cheap, strong structures.  They cost about as much as a conventional panel of the same size, yet produce 4X more energy. 

Just as important, sandwich fabrication lets us make these panels in a small factory.  As few as 5 people could start a solar factory in a town as small as 5,000. The factory sells, makes, installs and maintains FourFold modules.  It brings jobs to the town and government tax rebates to the town's economy. 

We need your help to bring this innovation to volume production.  We have working prototypes and we've done pilot production, but we need to spend a year of testing, sourcing, training and certification before we have a product we can sell.  

Stopping our world from burning fossil fuels is the challenge of our century. These fuels pollute our air, distort our geopolitics and warm our climate. Some say solar energy is the answer.  But if a conventional PV panel is good, our hybrid is four times better.  If solar energy is one Princeton Wedge, ours is four Wedges. And four Wedges is half the global warming problem (http://cmi.princeton.edu/wedges/). 

Foundations, your donations can reduce global warming more than any other way. Dollar for dollar, a Focused Sun donation counts four times more than conventional solar.  Sponsor a FourFold module at a village clinic or school. Make an impact by contributing to a sustainable world.

Sounds like a good idea?  We think its the best solar solution there is.  We have the lowest cost way of making a solar panel – sandwich fabrication – and we capture 75% of the sun's heat.  This combination is as good as it gets in the most important issue of renewable energy: how economic is it? 

Still, a solar technology is only as good as how many people use it. Our small factories allow anyone, anywhere in the world, to manufacture these panels.  

What We Need

We've been working on the FourFold module for several years.  We're on our fourth prototype design, our third absorber design, our fifth plumbing design, our third electronics design and our seventh software version. We have worked very hard to get the costs down on electronics, gear motors and other high-tech components that Focused Sun will supply to local factories.

The other 80% of the module is made locally.  We seek local suppliers that can make our sheet metal and frame parts in higher volumes and at lower cost. Not only are its mirrors and frame locally made but so is its energy storage shed.  Plumbing, heat storage tank, insulation, fan, inverter, pumps and valving are assembled by the local factory. We've made modules in pilot production.  Now we must move toward volume production and commercialization.

To get to a commercial product we need testing, testing and more testing. We must install and test our module in various climates to find all the problems that could ever arise. It must be "bulletproof" before we can begin to sell it. We think a year is required to be sure that we have a thoroughly tested system – one that makes every buyer happy he owns one. 


Before a buyer can get tax rebates, our module must pass certification. Certification is where respected testing companies put the module through its paces. Is it safe? Does it produce as much energy as we claim? Would it last as long as we say? After our own in-house testing, we'll get the module certified. Normally it's a process that takes a month and can cost $100,000. For a hybrid it's twice that because both its electrical and heat performance must be evaluated.

We also need to train people to set up our factories and after that, build and install modules made in them.  Our pilot production used interns from our local university, New Mexico State University. Now we need to set up training programs for many more people.  Our advisor, Prof. Amir Abtahi has done this before. For over a decade he has trained his students at Florida Atlantic University to install solar panels. He is even certified by the state of Florida to train solar installer trainers.  Training is an important part of what your donation will fund. 

What You Get

Our most important donations are aimed at those that want to make the move into renewable energy.  Have you been considering solar energy?  Your donation reserves a future FourFold module.  Your home can turn into a free energy zone.  Sunlight instead of fossil fuels can run your TV and heat your shower.   

Better yet, donate to sponsor a solar factory. Help put one in your hometown.  Your donation  can train someone from your hometown.  Our training classes teach you how to set up a factory, how to work with suppliers to have parts made locally, how to use your factory to manufacture modules, how to sell solar and how to install modules on homes and businesses.  Want to set up your kid in a profitable local business? Donate to his training program.

Part of our goal will be reached simply by exposing this technology to the world. This is the first time it's been publicized. Is there a student in Nigeria that wants to help his village? Is there a woman in China that wants to make a thriving business? Are there European tradesmen that want to be free from ever rising fuel prices. Donate to get these people started in this new technology. 

Impact

Our team has done this before. Our founders have been designing, building and marketing solar energy panels for 40 years. They are entrepreneurs who have all started their own successful companies. The panel's inventor, Dr. Shawn Buckley, has three Silicon Valley startups and 26 patents to his credit. 

Ron Petrich made thousands of solar panels for the southern California market. Prof. Amir Abtahi installed some of the first PV solar energy systems in the world and heads two companies that install solar in Florida. The combined solar experience of these three is over a century.  


Since we first started, my brothers have helped me with the technology:  Fred (electronics and photovoltaics), Ed (development and manufacturing) and Jerry (production and service).  Others on our team are experts in other fields: Rene Francis (sourcing and marketing), Doug Turner (manufacturing), Frank Pope (finance), Tom Green (international), John Terry (software and electronics) and Mario Rosati (legal).  We aren't beginners. We are seasoned professionals that know how to get this job done.
Here's an opportunity for your donation to have an impact.  The energy from conventional PV solar panels finally cost about the same as utility power. Our FourFold module has a similar cost and also uses PV cells – but collects four times more energy. Why would you go to the trouble of installing solar and then throw away three fourths of the sun's energy that falls on it?    

Help us get into volume production.  Make your donation count four times more toward a better way to use the sun's energy. Fossil fuels pollute our world. Instead, donate toward a sustainable world, a world where each square meter of solar collector counts four times more than current solutions. 

We have the technology to help our children and grandchildren. Your donation can make the difference for your hometown, for developing countries and can be part of sustainable living.

Risks and Challenges

Our team has been in the business world for many years. We know there are many ways a company can fail; we hope we know most of them. Our next hurdle is one of the biggest: the Valley of Death. That's what venture capitalists call that perilous period when a company has proven its technology but still needs to commercialize its product. It costs money to commercialize.  

Why don't we just get venture capital (VC) financing, you might be wondering. We've tried, but VC don't like our approach of giving away our technology to build market share. Normally a venture capitalist wants its investment companies to have a "skim" pricing policy.  The company skims profits by pricing its product high. 

Instead we have chosen a "penetration" policy: keep prices low and give everybody a share. We charge 10% of revenues as a royalty. You tip your waitress more than that. Our exchanges will buy raw materials on the world market so our solar factories will have the lowest possible materials cost.  

We want our factories to deliver solar energy – both heat and electricity – at a rate that can compete with utility energy. Our factories provide jobs and government rebates to their local communities. Even the customers win: they can save 40% of their energy bills.

Instead of early profits, our business model is to penetrate the market. Our FourFold product fits into the American market.  We have a fast payback – as little as 2 years in some locations. In most of the U.S., your heating bill is as big as your electricity bill.  It would be a good product if we only sold it domestically. 

But our approach is particularly appropriate for the developing world,  Our module supplies heat and electricity, both in short supply in Africa, India, China and other developing countries.  The developing world needs heat for clean water and sterilization and electricity for refrigeration, pumping and lighting. 

NGOs, are you listening? America is only 5% of the world's population.  The other 95% of the world pays much more for energy than we do. The diesel generator common to most African villages costs 3 times more than we pay for electricity. Chinese heating coal cakes pollute their cities and the rest of the world. Why cut down trees when the sun could do the same job? 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word.  Friend us on FaceBook and Twitter. Tell others about this opportunity to help the world get off its oil addiction. This is as good as it gets: there is no better solar energy solution. We have the cheapest way to make solar panels and we capture almost all of the sun's energy.

Get your friends and neighbors to donate toward a FourFold module kit or toward factory training.  Does your Aunt Betty want solar water heating? Tax rebates apply to her module; with a 30% tax rebate she'll only be paying $2000 – $1/Watt– for a module that warms her and provides electricity. Put your Facebook and Twitter friends to use.
Join our "Help Your Hometown" program to start a solar factory in your hometown. We seek college students or recent graduates to be our publicists to promote our product in your hometown, anywhere in the world. Or donate a training program for someone to begin a factory in your hometown.

Short Summary

  • We have been working on Solar energy from 5 years
  • We want to build our products in such a way so every people shall use solar products.
  • Using Solar products can save the worlds energy.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We want everyone who can help us to come forward and help us so that we can expand our business and boost the solar products to every household in the world

story:
Brief description  

True Tesla Technologies is at the point of commercialization of its revolutionary Cascading Hydro Power Plant.  Tomislav Tesla (the great great nephew of Nikola Tesla) patented the first HPP process with WIPO and since then has developed and tested them.  Many new features and design characteristics have been incorporated into the latest versions.  Now we are ready to place them in the field in proper working environments.

Several different features have been incorporated that allow the cascades to harness energy from low land rivers and waterways.  Traditional hydro plants are unable to harness this energy due to environmental conditions.  Utilising Tesla’s HPP we are able to harness a tremendous resource and in addition, enhance the surrounding environments.  Improving the oxygen levels of waterways enhances the biosphere, adds a new energy to waterways, enhancing fish stocks.  Flora and fauna will flourish and farmers can return to their flooded lands.

 

Tesla’s HPP will balance the levels of the waterways, to prevent flooding along the river path. 

In addition waterways that are traditionally frozen, can be made operational all year round.  All plants are interconnected and centrally monitored, by local and global centres.  Live data is relayed to ensure optimum usage of the resources at our disposal, as well as local conditions.  A network of support is constantly monitoring and ensuring maximum up time of resources.

True Tesla Technologies is now at the pre-production prototype phase of its development. 

Main features and goals of our crowdfunding campaign

The purpose of the crowdfunding is to create the world’s first pre-production prototypes of this revolutionary technology. History has shown us how a single investor can influence the outcome of such an incredible innovation.  True Tesla Technologies has decided that the first machines shall be created in a new and decentralised way, and that is open source.

Once the technology has been commercially demonstrated (within 6-9 months of funding) in various working conditions and environments, we can begin to enter a much larger phase of expansion.  This will include the establishment of a unique Innovation Centre, that will be the base for other product developments. Simultaneously, the team will continue to promote the Tesla HPP through its activities across the world.

It is important that everyone has access to the Tesla technology, for that reason, it too, shall be open source.  Anyone will be able to have access to the designs and technical specification of the technology.  In return each party will have a royalty agreement that will be the way in which the creators of the technology are rewarded.  Tesla’s Blockchain will provide the transparency for the network serving as a key to commercial and industrial users of the technology. 

In addition funds will be used to rapidly develop the designs for use in tidal waters, which is an important development for the future.

Teams: Our skills and experience 

Tomislav Tesla and the team have been working on the project since 2014, preparing themselves and the technology for the world market.  During this time other important team members have been added to enhance the group.  Prototypes have been built and tested, and thousands of hours have been spent drawing and writing. 

Since 2017 we have become more focused on creating awareness of the Brand and the technology, about it’s impact on the world as we know it.  2018 has seen us rapidly bring awareness in higher circles of commerce and government.  We have presented technology to Russia, Lithuania, Turkey, Mauritius, Ecuador, Croatia, Serbia, Albania and many others.  We have also strengthened our team of engineers who will come on-line once we are funded.

The team works cohesively without corporate offices or facilities at our disposal. Our reasons for crowdfunding is to enable us to invest in our technology and  precious engineering resources. The team are currently located in Eastern Croatia, an we have identified partners whose resources we can engage, as well as suitable premises for future expansion.

We have focused on ensuring the elements necessary for the sustainability of the platform we are creating, and building strong partnerships with a dedicated group of committed team members.  We have been heavily involved in working with local communities, as these are the consumers who will benefit the most.  Not only the benefits of a decentralised means of energy, but also being able to “barter/Exchange” any excess energies.  Rural communities have a dire need for electricity, this is one solution that can be used.

It is anticipated that communities will be able to fund their own Tesla Hydro Power Plants through tokenisation, or through crowdfunding themselves.  This creates a new level of social entrepreneurship that disrupts the energy supply market at the heart.
story_txt:
Brief description  True Tesla Technologies is at the point of commercialization of its revolutionary Cascading Hydro Power Plant.  Tomislav Tesla (the great great nephew of Nikola Tesla) patented the first HPP process with WIPO and since then has developed and tested them.  Many new features and design characteristics have been incorporated into the latest versions.  Now we are ready to place them in the field in proper working environments.Several different features have been incorporated that allow the cascades to harness energy from low land rivers and waterways.  Traditional hydro plants are unable to harness this energy due to environmental conditions.  Utilising Tesla’s HPP we are able to harness a tremendous resource and in addition, enhance the surrounding environments.  Improving the oxygen levels of waterways enhances the biosphere, adds a new energy to waterways, enhancing fish stocks.  Flora and fauna will flourish and farmers can return to their flooded lands.
 
Tesla’s HPP will balance the levels of the waterways, to prevent flooding along the river path. 

In addition waterways that are traditionally frozen, can be made operational all year round.  All plants are interconnected and centrally monitored, by local and global centres.  Live data is relayed to ensure optimum usage of the resources at our disposal, as well as local conditions.  A network of support is constantly monitoring and ensuring maximum up time of resources.
True Tesla Technologies is now at the pre-production prototype phase of its development. Main features and goals of our crowdfunding campaignThe purpose of the crowdfunding is to create the world’s first pre-production prototypes of this revolutionary technology. History has shown us how a single investor can influence the outcome of such an incredible innovation.  True Tesla Technologies has decided that the first machines shall be created in a new and decentralised way, and that is open source.Once the technology has been commercially demonstrated (within 6-9 months of funding) in various working conditions and environments, we can begin to enter a much larger phase of expansion.  This will include the establishment of a unique Innovation Centre, that will be the base for other product developments. story:
The Eco-Designed Water Tracking Bottle That's Rebelling Against Disposable Devices

Thrivve is a smart bottle designed for healthy eco-conscious living with you and the planet in mind. It's the first device of its kind that's repairable by design to ensure zero waste to landfill. 

The cap's eco-friendly modular design and the durable, high-quality stainless steel bottle will keep you using it for many years to come. And with the mindful and intuitive light ring, you'll be free from the digital distractions of your phone making it easy for you to stay hydrated, no matter how busy your day gets. This smart water bottle will help you feel better, do better and live better!

Great Health Starts With Good Hydration

A Greener Planet Starts With Better Design. 

 

 

Electronic waste is the fastest growing waste stream. 

Each year we generate 50 million tons of e-waste. That's 175,000 jumbo jets worth. And 80% ends up in landfill.  Smart health devices have the power to change lives for the better, but many have short-life spans and on average are replaced every two years and end up polluting the planet.

Solution: Designed For The Planet

Better Design Can Stem The Growing Pile of E-Waste

We want to change the way smart devices are made and work towards zero waste to landfill. The Thrivve modular design, allows you to replace the Thrivve cap in segments over time, without having to replace the whole bottle. And it can be easily dismantled for repair and recycling. 

The Thrivve Cap Is Repairable, Upgradeable, Recyclable...Not Disposable.

 

Designed For You - Minimal Digital Distraction

Progress Snapshots Direct to the Cap.

A uniquely designed light ring for those times when you want to stay off your phone. It communicates your daily progress with a simple and easy to understand light sequence.

Using it is easy. Simply set up your profile in the Thrivve App, then put your phone to one side and get on with your day. No need to think, just drink.

Simply double-tap the cap and in seconds, the light ring shows a snapshot of your daily progress.

  • The cap represents how much you need to drink that day
  • The blue light is your real-time progress
  • The white flashing light is your real-time goal. This is what keeps you on track, so you don't fall behind
  • And, if you do fall behind the whole light ring will light up to remind you

 

Use Thrivve with or without the App to track your water goals.

For more in-depth analytics, setting your daily water goals, and your stats, you can use the Thrivve App on your Android or iOS device.

 

 


 

More information 

 
 

 

The Perks 

 

 

About Us

We believe in making thoughtful products, that inspire and influence people to think differently and do differently in a way that empowers healthier water drinking habits and more mindful use of tech.

Next Steps

Nearly two years and many prototypes later, we have a working prototype with a tracking cap that's repairable by design, functional, discreet, easy to use and stylish.  Manufacturing has been considered throughout the whole prototyping process to ensure a simple and cost-effective design without compromising on quality. The Thrivve cap has a modular design, with minimal and standardised parts for ease of manufacturing and to keep our environmental impact low. 

The first version of the Thrivve App is ready and will be available to iOS and Android users. 

Supporting our campaign will help bring the Thrivve bottle to the world. Hitting our funding raising goal means we can complete the design validation tests and begin pre-production where we get ready for the first production run. 

 

Sustainable Materials

THRIVVE is about helping you live a healthier life, and we want that to be on a healthy planet. That's why we're making every effort to use materials that have the lowest impact on people and planet,  as long as they don't compromise quality, performance and safety. We will always be open and honest about our journey towards being sustainable. 

 

Shipping

We’re shipping to United States, Canada, Australia and Countries in the European Union. We wish to say thank you to our early supporter so have discounted all shipping fees, and if you're in the UK, your shipping is free. 

 

Risks & Challenges

We've produced and tested many prototypes each one with manufacturing in mind. This process reduces the risk when moving from prototype to production. However, no project comes without risks and challenges. We promise to let you know straight away if any do arise and how it affects your order. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to support our project, but don't need a bottle, then please spread the word on Facebook, Twitter and email. We can't do it without you.

story:
If Clean, Emissions Free Energy is Your Choice!

Hi There,

My name is John. This is my public attempt to have some of the results of my personal Green Energy Research Project accepted. I am completely willing to discuss any aspect of this project and disclose the theory and design details to an appropriately interested party.

If there are other people out there in the world that believe as I do that time is rapidly running out for our global environment and that we must act now, this is your opportunity to choose a different future than the one filled with increasingly more devastating 'natural events'.

I believe that climate and ecological upheaval is a terrible and urgent problem. I have worked very hard for a long time in my research. I have a found a solution for some of the most urgent problems.

Following are three applications of one machine concept left behind by Nikola Tesla. My claim is that I understand how to build this machine using his empirical concepts of the electrical arts:

1) This apparatus will break down carbon dioxide molecules in a cheap and simple manner. This is great news for stopping the worldwide destruction we are causing by these emissions. This solution means hydrocarbon burning can continue as a source of supply for our energy needs.

2) A similar machine makes ozone from atmospheric oxygen, which is also great news for people where clean water and sanitation and waste treatment are problems. Water can be easily purified of pathogens.

3) This method also breaks apart atmospheric nitrogen for fertilizers and synthetic fuels. This would mean that in places where people do not have hydrocarbons they could burn nitrogen instead.

I would like to complete this work but I can not do this without your help. I did not give up this search years ago because of the skepticism I encountered towards finding a solution. I persevered because of my belief in the urgency and danger of extinction of and to so many lifeforms and what that means for human civilizations.

If you, as an individual want an alternative to what has already begun, I am offering this chance and choice to you. Simply cast your vote by making a donation to this cause. The result of a successful Fund Raising Appeal will be that with this money I will produce for you, a functioning apparatus of industrial utility to perform the operations as described. I will complete this within eight months of starting.

Please understand that you are now being offered an opportunity. This is unique in all the decades of this war against the causes of the pollution which is choking the life out of our planet. The advancement of this bypassed technology offers the first real hope that we can offer to those in power; a capability by which a meaningful stand on this shared responsibility may be assumed.

A viable alternative fuel source, in addition to CO2 remediation, creates an unbeatable combination with which to fight for our planet.

The contribution you are making is a vote for life, a vote for preserving a future for all generations to come. There is only one world. This where the ordinary people of the earth get a chance to show that we appreciate our natural world and desire to save it and with this technology, we will win.

I thank you for your attention, consideration and anticipated support.

Sincerely, William John Montague

story:
I am Phil Vaughan, a 54 year old electrical/mechanical engineer who in a career break between 2001 and 2006, undertook various courses on physical training and exercise.

I ran a gym through this time (L.I.P.S. Leap Into Perfect Shape) based in Stubbington Avenue, North End, Portsmouth, UK. A very popular private gymnasium.

It was at this point that my imagination was sparked to work on the possibility of transferring physical energy into electrical energy mainly due to the high electrical costs of running the place.

My gym days ceased in 2006 and I went back to my apprentice trained occupation but the thought never went away.

As time went by with running being my main physical exercise (many Great South Runs in Portsmouth, of course) a  medical fault occurred that would curtail my running and push me back into gym work to continue my life health.

The problem was a "first degree, heart block" which sounds severe and potentially could have been a heart attack, if I hadn't been as physically fit as I was, at the time!

My prognosis (according to the cardiologist) was to stay as cardio vascularly fit as you are now, for as long as you can otherwise they will need to install a pacemaker! Yikes.

So a plan formulated a few years ago to carry out the physical energy to electrical energy transfer by buying bits that were affordable and use my experience to produce a machine that will keep me fit and charge phones, ipads, computers, LEDs, charge batteries and put power back into the house.

I now have a product that works (prototype) but it can be made a lot better and more efficient with some financial and specialist assistance.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our GEN-Ergy project is in its infancy (stage 1-completed) where I have invested over £13,000 to get to the prototype stage whereby the system works and I train on it 5 days a week. We are extremely close to completing stage 2 to create a more mobile structure. If you are interested, follow our journey through our social channels:

 

Human GEN ergy on YouTube

HumanGENergy on Facebook

 

We need your help to take our HumanGENergy Project through the next 2 stages! Right now we are fundraising for £10,000 to take us to stage 3 to get specialist electronic help to make the system as efficient as we can to get even more electrical power output!

Stage 4 requires additional funding to use the technology we will have perfected with our air stepper and replicate it for other fitness apparatus such as cross trainers, bicycles and rowing machines. 

 

Return for your Investment

For every £ 100 raised I will give you a 30 minute training set on the GENergy machine, with me (the inventor) so you can have your "Frankenstein moment" where you can see your physical effort turn into useful electricity to power, operating iphones, ipads, battery chargers, light LEDs or charging power back into the house!

When we get the full money raised across each stage, anyone who has invested will get their money they have invested with us off of the full production GEN-ergy machine.

In return for your support, we have also teamed up with a few local businesses to give you discounts with more to come soon!

10% off at Reborn Rewild - 100% vegan eco-friendly bags

 

The Impact

At present in the UK there are approximately 20 million gym goers out of 70 million population, not including those who prefer a home gym workout, of which our machines are perfect for with regard to the current pandemic.

If a gym had 10 GENergy machines and 10 people used it for 1 hour each 7 days per week and they all produced 100 watts of energy in that hour.

10(machines) x 10(people) x 365(days) x 100(watts)

100 people x 100 watts= 10000 watts

In 1 year that would equate to 365 MW

That would equate to £ 547.50  (if it was charged at 15 p per kWh) payback per year.

Plus you would not need to power the machines from the grid, so there would be a saving there also!

Can you imagine if there were 100 or 1000 GENergy machines out there? The electrical saving from the power grid would be huge!

 

Risks & Challenges

We live with risk everyday.

Getting out of bed is risky!

Crossing the road is risky!

I believe in this project and have invested over £13,000. Join me and tap into a "niche conversion business" that links fitness and energy. Save money on your energy bills whilst staying fit and generating your own green energy! This is the future. 

We are already at Stage 1 and close to completing Stage 3 of making the machine more mobile. We are 2 stages away from production. How and when we get there is in your hands!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like the idea but can't afford to invest, don't worry, we still want you to take part, help us share our project!

If you recommend a friend or colleague and they invest, you can come with them when they workout on the GENergy kit (max 2 people) when government allows in light of the current pandemic.

We have got the inclination, all we need is YOU!

story:
Short Summary

LINA PAC’s essence is to obtain an alternative to Evaporation Air Coolers and conventional air conditioners with lower power consumption 34 W/hr, water consumption, better mobility options and environment friendly operation.
it doesn't need to cold water or ice like the swamp type air coolers, it only needs tape water.

With the guarantee of the German labs experimentation you can have the amazing cooling effect that can reduce the air temperature from 37°C to 18°C at a humidity level of 25% and from 33°C to 23°C at a humidity level of 80% at your hands with our units that are surprisingly very compact and mobile that you can take it with you wherever you go inside the house or even when travelling.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GXlhNPkZv6hmavaRAYPRi6Tgn7ypSE0z/view?usp=sharing

Being a simulation for nature as the air stream of the sea beach, LINA PAC is considered an Environment friendly alternative solution for conventional A/C as a personal air conditioner that does not use a refrigerant substance (Freon) that can harm the environment also it does not have any source of bacteria such as pads or water cartridges like in other Evaporative Air Coolers.

The secret behind the lower power consumption is spots the cooled air directly on the person not the environment surrounding him using centrifugal fan with high dynamic pressure delivering a conical airflow that strike the conical flow of the dry ice fog cooling effect which has particle size 3 micron which produce huge amount of cooling surface area between the air flow and the fog achieving efficient cooling through a range of 1.5 meter long.
The extremely small “3-micron” water droplet radius allows a full water consumption by the air stream therefor granting a superior and a much more efficient cooling effect.

Our Target

We ask for your support to reach to 300,000$ which cover the components and the following,
we've a one production line. this production line has the capacity 2000 Unit per day, which means 50,000 Unit per month. 
Our target, firstly, is to build two new production lines, which will reduce the selling price by increasing the products amount

Secondly, Our aim is to cover the whole world with Lina-PAC 2018-20 devices. We hope that every one to be able to own his/her personal air conditioner. At this point, We'll save 95% from the 49% of the total power consumption by the traditional air conditioner around the world. That will result reducing the CO2 emissions around the world and also our Lina-PAC product will enhance the healthy life for each person around the world by adding honey, lemon droplets and peppermint.

IF WE DIDN'T REACH OUR TARGET ...
We'll feed the money for increasing the productivity in our production line.

Product Features

1- Innovated Idea:
•Pending patent No.1294/2018 in Egypt. The product has been certified from the Arab academy for science technology &  maritime transport at the date of 11-10-2015 with registration number: SRD/346/2015.
•Spots the cooled air directly on the person not the environment surrounding him using centrifugal fan with high dynamic pressure delivering a conical airflow that strike the conical flow of the dry ice fog cooling effect which has particle size 3 micron which produce huge amount of cooling surface area between the air flow and the fog achieving efficient cooling through a range of 1.5 meter long.
•The extremely small “3-micron” water droplet radius allows a full water consumption by the air stream therefor granting a superior and a much more efficient cooling effect.

2- High performance:
•The first personal air conditioner & diffuser that reduces the air temperature even when the relative humidity reaches 80% without increasing humidity.
•Operates continuously for up to 8 hours using only 2 liters of water (less than 300ml/hr)
•No need for ice or cooled water to operate, only ordinary tap water.
 

3- Money saving & Power efficient:
•LINA-PAC does not use any filters or pads, so you do not need to waste your money on replacing it with a new one every few weeks as in other Evaporative Air Coolers.
•Long lifetime because it is DC components based (50,000 working hours.with 3 years guarantee).
•Extreme power conservation as it has a power rating that is lower than half of a regular fan (34Wh).

4- Healthy:
•The first air conditioner & diffuser that enhances your healthy life by adding honey, mint oil, lemon and other natural oils. (Perfumes or synthetic oils NOT ALLOWED)
•Goodbye to eye and nose dryness and welcome to a healthy full night sleep. 
•Eliminating bacteria sources such as air filters, evaporative coils and pads so it is a bacteria free option.
 

5- Safe:
•No air filters, evaporative coils, water cartridge or pads so it doesn’t have any kind of bacteria sources like in the other types of air conditioners.
•Does not have any sharp blades that can harm children.
 

6- Compact and portable:
•Optimized to guarantee a very high level of mobility and simplicity in usage. the dimensions are 34 x 27 x 15 cm and the weight is 2 Kg
 

7- Affordable price:
•Very fair price compared with the other types of air conditioners. the price is 55$ without shipping cost.

We had Lina-PAC 2016, it was for testing market in Egypt. It was very good sound which pushed us to develop it to Lina-PAC 2018-20, which became personal air conditioner & diffuser.

Risks & Challenges

In 2016, we had some problems in the first generation of Lina-PAC 2016, like, that the face which carry the fan was fixed not movable and we modified it into a movable face to be suitable for short or tall persons during sleeping or sitting also we had a problem with the hand of the water tank, and we developed it and now the problem is solved. the push buttons in Lina-PAC 2016 was press buttons, now it became touch buttons. the ceramic diaphragm pump and the PCB were with no heat sink, but now the two devices has been manufactured with heat sink. the dynamic pressure of Lina-PAC 2016 was lower than Lina-PAC 2018-20 so Lina-PAC 2018-20 can reach to lower temperature even the relative humidity reach to 80% and can cool 2 persons on the bed, but Lina-PAC 2016 was assigned to cool only 1 person.

 

If you can't finance us, you can support us by sharing our Indiegogo link to your friends and others.

story: Based on Italian folklore but set in the mystic and atmospheric old Scandinavia, we aim to tell a beautiful story about finding out what really matters in life and in death. Help us turn this vision into reality!

story:
Do you hate wasting food? So do we!

The average American family wastes up to $2,200 worth of food per year in the US. This is not an epidemic confined to North America, it is global and has global consequences. I realized how much food was going to waste in my own home and thought: there has to be a better way, a tool to help us be more efficient with the food we bring into our homes. That is how the WasteNot App was born.

If we are all more efficient at home we can help make a positive impact by reducing our contribution to food waste. Food wasted in our homes is the worst kind of waste: this is quality product that has made its way through the supply chain and arrived at its final destination, ready to nourish. 

I got together with award-winning software development company Art + Logic to design an easy to use mobile app that would reduce food waste at home and help users' impact on the environment and their finances. We have come up with the design and flow of the app, now we just need your help to make WasteNot a reality.

Help us create the WasteNot App, 

Join the #NoFoodWaste Revolution and become a WasteWarrior.

 

How WasteNot Works

See this video further describing the App's functionality.

We have partnered with awesome crowdfunding campaigns from around the web to bring you great rewards that will help us get The WasteNot App off the ground and into your kitchen.

We've created interesting partner rewards just for you! Our partners have given us exclusive discounts so that we can use the savings and your investment proceeds to complete the app. Check out the rewards below and choose how you'd like to help reduce YOUR food waste impact on your budget and the planet!

 

Other Ways To Help

Just because you can't contribute doesn't mean you can't help. Copy and paste these messages onto your social media channels and help us spread the word among your friends and other like-minded individuals.

TWITTER

Join the #NoFoodWaste revolution and support the @wastenotapp_ launch on #Indiegogo. Check out deals from our partners @WineSquirrel @GoSunStove #Bionicraft http://igg.me/at/wastenotapp

FACEBOOK

Hate #Foodwaste? So do I! Follow and support @WasteWarriorHQ. The WasteNot App is an easy way to manage your food inventory at home. Help them reach their goal to create the App. Save your wine 5X longer with @WineSquirrel, start composting with @Bionicraft Alphatop + Biovessel and cook with solar power on the go with @GoSun Go. http://igg.me/at/wastenotapp

INSTAGRAM

Hate #Foodwaste? So do I! Follow and support @WasteWarriorHQ. The WasteNot App is an easy way to manage your food inventory at home. Help them reach their goal to create the App. Keep your opened wine 5X longer with @WineSquirrel, start composting with @Bionicraft Alphatop + Biovessel and cook with solar power anywhere with @GoSun Go. http://igg.me/at/wastenotapp

Risks & Challenges

We already have the design and functionality of the App designed as demonstrated above and throughout this campaign. We need to raise the remaining funds for the completion and delivery of the App as well as for marketing and expanded partnerships. We are committed to delivering the App in January 2019 if we are able to raise the funds for the App. We are a fixed funded campaign and need to raise at least $50K to deliver partner awards and $80K to successfully develop and deliver the WasteNot App by January 2019. Please help us make this happen!

story:
Take your smart speaker everywhere

 
In 2018 the idea of the Grabbatt portable battery was born when the use of Google Home Mini in a fixed place in the home was unworkable. Listening to music, playing games or using the assistant is now possible, everywhere in and around the home with the Grabbatt battery. 


Short after, we formed our team of experts. We know each other for years and all have our own company with different disciplines in industrial design, mechanical engineering and electrical engineering. 

 

Prototypes

We made multiple prototypes by 3D printing for the housing and installed all the electronics inside to make a workable product. After this we had a lot of meetings with different producers to get a good view on how to produce the Grabbatt and what the production cost will be. We wanted to know all these facts before introducing the Grabbatt on Indiegogo to have a project that will be achievable.

 

Grabbatt in de Media!

Last year we shared our story on the world wide web. A lot of sites posted the Grabbatt news.

 

What are smart speakers

Smart speakers are getting more and more popular and are increasingly used in households around the world. A smart speaker like the Google Home Mini and the Amazon's Echo Dot (2nd gen.) can assist the user by voice control. Just ask what you want to know and the smart speaker will answer your question. Or command to play some music on Spotify, play a game or listen to your favorite audiobook. It is your new personal assistant.

Also a lot of 'internet of things' products can be connected to the smart speakers and can be controlled with your voice, like your smart lights, thermostat or smart tv.

 

Make your smart speaker portable

Both smart speakers do not have a battery and are not mobile. By adding the specially designed portable battery Grabbatt, the smart speaker becomes portable.

The Grabbatt is suitable for the Google Home Mini smart speakers in the first place. When the fund amount is exceeded, we are also able to make the Grabbatt suitable for the Amazon's Echo Dot (2nd gen.). See below the extra features that we will include when we achieve the different funding amounts. 

With the Grabbatt battery your smart speaker becomes portable so that you can use it everywhere in and around your home when in reach of your WIFI network. And when connected to the hotspot of your mobile phone, you can use the smart speaker everywhere in the world where mobile internet is available. 

You can now easily use your smart speaker in the garden, bathroom, bedroom, garage or anywhere else without unplugging and reconnecting.

The Grabbatt battery will be first available in WHITE and later maybe also in DARK GREY. 

- The contents of the perks are very extensive but a smart speaker is not included - 

 

The Grabbatt is available for just € 29.00* 

The Grabbatt retail price is € 56.- Only on Indiegogo we offer it for
€ 29.- (48% discount)
€ 39,- (30% discount) 
€ 49.- (12% discount) 
Be the first one to get the Grabbatt for its lowest price of € 29.- and even after this incredible offer you can still purchase Grabbatt for discounted prices of € 39.- and € 49.-!
Below are how many Grabbatt's per perk are available. 

 

Connect the smart speaker

Connect your Google Home Mini or Amazon's Echo Dot (2nd gen.) with the micro USB-connector on top of the Grabbatt. Click the speaker in the Grabbatt and you are good to go!

 

Active time & standby time

With a fully charged battery, the Grabbatt will run your smart speaker for around 10 hours. Play your favorite music or games with your assistant together with your family and friends for hours. The standby time is up to 48 hours. 

 

Easy check the battery status

At any time you can check the battery status of the Grabbatt. By clicking the button, the LEDs will show you the status. One LED means 25%, two LEDs 50%, three LEDs 75% and four LEDs 100% power is available.

 

Features Grabbatt to improve the smart speaker

We believe that all these features are a big advantage in the market and a big step forward in enabling artificial intelligence portable. With your support, we can make this a competitive product that is excellent in design and features that will make your smart speaker even easier to use

 

Extra features at exceeding funding amount

In this project our first goal is to produce a great product with already a lot of nice features, but to produce an even greater product we can engineer it with more nice features when we reach a greater funding amount. See below at which funding the extra features will be included.

At a funding of €56,000.- All these great features are included in the Grabbatt Premium:

At a funding of €70,000.- The below features will also be added to the Grabbatt Plus:

  • Extra accessory to fit the Amazon Echo Dot in the Grabbatt.
  • Passage for extended audio cable (for Echo Dot use only).
  • Extended audio cable (for Echo Dot use only).

At a funding of €115,000.- Below features will be added on top at the Grabbatt Pro:

  • Qi wireless charging system.
  • Low power warning.
  • The Dark grey Grabbatt will then also be available.

 

Timeline development and production

Step by step process for making Grabbatt possible.

 

Risk and Challenges 

Indiegogo (so that means YOU!) is an important part of our project. We believe one of the biggest challenges is to deliver a stable product with a good look and feel as quickly as possible. We also believe that quality is a must and always comes first. That is why we have done a lot of work and development before going live on Indiegogo to keep risks low. 

We have done a lot of 3D printing of prototypes to find the ideal shape for a perfect fit of the smart speakers. So your smart speaker can assist you anywhere and looks beautiful at the same time. 

We spoke with multiple businesses with more than 30 years of experience who have guided other successful Indiegogo projects. We took their experience, advice and knowledge and put all that in The Grabbatt.

 

Help us spread the word

Help us spread the word and let Grabbatt go all over the world! Follow, like and share our story on all of our social media channels. Thank you all!

story:
BUSINESS SUMMARY

El Huerto Hidropónico – Lima , es una propuesta que consiste en la producción de verduras y hortalizas en la ciudad de Lima.

Escogimos esta ciudad ya que actualmente las verduras que consumimos son contaminadas y ello afecta a la salud de toda la población, en especial la más vulnerable como niños y ancianos.

Somos aproximadamente 10 millones de peruanos que consumimos verduras regadas con agua de desagüe.

 

Nos apoyaremos en una técnica milenaria llamada Hidroponía, la cual consiste en producir vegetales en sistema flotantes con nutrientes.

Este sistema permite ahorrar el 90% de uso de agua, no interviene el uso de insecticidas y fertilizantes.

 

Actualmente acceder a cultivos hidropónicos es muy caro y poco difundido, por tanto, queremos iniciar la producción y masificación que permita que muchas más personas puedan consumir productos de calidad

 

WHY ARE YOU THE RIGHT TEAM TO RUN THE PROJECT?

 

Somos un equipo de profesionales que cree que es posible cambiar la forma insalubre de alimentación que tienen los limeños.

 

Utilizaremos nuestra experiencia en área administrativa, financiera, atención al cliente y habilidades que complementan para lograr que este proyecto llegue a ser una realidad.

 

 

CUSTOMER PROBLEM

 

Comer verduras saludables en Lima es un lujo,  10 millones de personas vivimos en un desierto y durante décadas se ha usado agua no potable para regar las plantaciones.

 

En la actualidad el 63.3% de la muestra de lechugas tomadas en los puntos de ventas de los mercados peruanos presentaron contaminación con larvas de Strongyloides. En comparación en otros países muestran un elevado porcentaje de detección comparado con los estudios realizados en mercados populares de Venezuela, en Maracaibo (40 %); en el Estado de Bolívar (15,7 %); mientras que, en los mercados de Corrientes, Argentina, se reporta un nivel sumamente bajo (2 %) de lechugas contaminadas por larvas de Strongyloides.

La mayor parte contaminación de este vegetal obedece a que son regadas con aguas servidas o aguas contaminadas con restos fecales. A ello también contribuye el hecho que, muchas veces, los campos de cultivo son abonados con estiércol y materia orgánica de origen fecal (compost y restos de heces de ganado).

 

 

THE SOLUTION

El Huerto Hidropónico – Lima se encargará de la producción de verduras, desde la siembra hasta la cosecha, asegurando la calidad e higiene.

Todos nuestros procesos serán supervisados por especialistas de Hidroponía que garantizarán la inocuidad de todas las cosechas.

 

 

 

 

 

 

BUSINESS MODEL: HOW YOU MAKE MONEY?

Enviaremos todas nuestras cosechas a los restaurantes afiliados, supermercados y puntos de venta ( bodegas).

Nuestro trabajo de concientización e información debe llegar a todo nuestro mercado objetivo, luego debemos hacer llegar nuestros productos a todas las zonas mediante distribuidores autorizados.

 

 

 

 

MARKET & COMPETITORS

El mercado que atenderemos es a personas que deseen empezar una alimentación sana.

 

 

 

MAJOR IDENTIFIED RISKS

Riesgos:

Aperturas de restaurantes que realicen ventas de lechugas hidropónicas

No llegar a nuestra rentabilidad deseada.

No contar con el apoyo de las entidades de Salud en Lima.

Solución:

Contar con un personal calificado en la elaboración de agricultura hidropónicas

Publicaciones de boletines informativos a nuestro público objetivo.

Contar con un área postventa del servicio que ofrecemos.

Alimentos libres de contaminación cruzada.

 

 

FOUNDED

Abril 2016

 

TEAM MEMBERS

5 miembros

 

STATUS

El Huerto Hidropónico – Lima   está en proyecto por el momento, necesitamos el capital suficiente para poder armar los primeros sistemas o unidades de producción.

Ya se realizaron las pruebas pertinentes con la finalidad de hacer nuestro proyecto realidad.

 

 

SECTOR Vegetables

 

KIND OF SOLUTION:

Atender a las personas que desean empezar una vida saludable, con la confianza de que no existirá ninguna contaminación cruzada en las verduras.

Henry Sahua                   20%

Cesar García                    20%

 

 

MAIN MILESTONES & MARKET TRACTION

 

FUNDING ALREADY RAISED (RANGE 0 $)

Por el momento se ha logrado una colaboración de USD $00.00 dólares americanos.

 

 

VALUATION LAST ROUND

La valuación de nuestra idea de negocio se realizó mediante tres métodos: Se efectuara reuniones con socios estratégicos en el distrito de Surco , la cual ayudaron a brindar mayor información de nuestro proyecto , en segunda instancia hicimos la campaña en Facebook tuvimos 324 likes en la FanPage, se hizo dos publicaciones las cuales tuvimos un alcance de 173 personas y 35 interacciones.

 

 

 

 

 

 

SHORT-TERM FUNDING NEEDS

How much money do you need?

El equipo de HidroHuerto – Lima considera necesaria una inversión inicial de USD10,000.00, los cuales servirán para realizar la compra de materiales y mano de obra de las unidades de producción.

 

Cada unidad de producción puede producir 100 hortalizas mensuales y la duración de los equipos es de 4 años.
story_txt:
BUSINESS SUMMARY
El Huerto Hidropónico – Lima , es una propuesta que consiste en la producción de verduras y hortalizas en la ciudad de Lima.
Escogimos esta ciudad ya que actualmente las verduras que consumimos son contaminadas y ello afecta a la salud de toda la población, en especial la más vulnerable como niños y ancianos.
Somos aproximadamente 10 millones de peruanos que consumimos verduras regadas con agua de desagüe.
 
Nos apoyaremos en una técnica milenaria llamada Hidroponía, la cual consiste en producir vegetales en sistema flotantes con nutrientes.
Este sistema permite ahorrar el 90% de uso de agua, no interviene el uso de insecticidas y fertilizantes.
 
Actualmente acceder a cultivos hidropónicos es muy caro y poco difundido, por tanto, queremos iniciar la producción y masificación que permita que muchas más personas puedan consumir productos de calidad
 
WHY ARE YOU THE RIGHT TEAM TO RUN THE PROJECT?
 
Somos un equipo de profesionales que cree que es posible cambiar la forma insalubre de alimentación que tienen los limeños.
 
Utilizaremos nuestra experiencia en área administrativa, financiera, atención al cliente y habilidades que complementan para lograr que este proyecto llegue a ser una realidad.
 
 
CUSTOMER PROBLEM
 
Comer verduras saludables en Lima es un lujo,  10 millones de personas vivimos en un desierto y durante décadas se ha usado agua no potable para regar las plantaciones.
 
En la actualidad el 63.3% de la muestra de lechugas tomadas en los puntos de ventas de los mercados peruanos presentaron contaminación con larvas de Strongyloides. En comparación en otros países muestran un elevado porcentaje de detección comparado con los estudios realizados en mercados populares de Venezuela, en Maracaibo (40 %); en el Estado de Bolívar (15,7 %); mientras que, en los mercados de Corrientes, Argentina, se reporta un nivel sumamente bajo (2 %) de lechugas contaminadas por larvas de Strongyloides.
La mayor parte contaminación de este vegetal obedece a que son regadas con aguas servidas o aguas contaminadas con restos fecales. A ello también contribuye el hecho que, muchas veces, los campos de cultivo son abonados con estiércol y materia orgánica de origen fecal (compost y restos de heces de ganado).
 
 
THE SOLUTION
El Huerto Hidropónico – Lima se encargará de la producción de verduras, desde la siembra hasta la cosecha, asegurando la calidad e higiene.
Todos nuestros procesos serán supervisados por especialistas de Hidroponía que garantizarán la inocuidad de todas las cosechas.
 
 
 
 
 
 
BUSINESS MODEL: HOW YOU MAKE MONEY?
Enviaremos todas nuestras cosechas a los restaurantes afiliados, supermercados y puntos de venta ( bodegas).
Nuestro trabajo de concientización e información debe llegar a todo nuestro mercado objetivo, luego debemos hacer llegar nuestros productos a todas las zonas mediante distribuidores autorizados.
 
 
 
 
MARKET & COMPETITORS
El mercado que atenderemos es a personas que deseen empezar una alimentación sana.
 
 
 
MAJOR IDENTIFIED RISKS
Riesgos:
Aperturas de restaurantes que realicen ventas de lechugas hidropónicas
No llegar a nuestra rentabilidad deseada.
No contar con el apoyo de las entidades de Salud en Lima.
Solución:
Contar con un personal calificado en la elaboración de agricultura hidropónicas
Publicaciones de boletines informativos a nuestro público objetivo.
Contar con un área postventa del servicio que ofrecemos.
Alimentos libres de contaminación cruzada.
