story:
Brief of history

Concentrations of CO2 in the atmosphere were as high as 4,000 parts per million (ppm) during the Cambrian period when planet was hot which is then bought down by large forest flourished across the planet.These vegetation took this carbon along with them under ground when they got buried and turned in to coal and crude oil. It is this carbon that we are putting back in the atmosphere when burn the fossil fuel. No wonder earth is warming and climate is changing.

Need of an hour

We need to move away from fossil fuel as soon as possible, if we don’t want to get back to Cambrian period.

Doing away with fossil fuel won’t be easy as it contributes about 80% of our total energy demand. It means we need to ramp-up the renewable energy by 400 %.

Most people now know that excessive energy consumption is one of the causes of global warming and climate change, but Real catastrophe will be end of fossil fuels. Scientists say that: "After the end of fossil fuels, there will only be enough food for 20% of the world’s population." We do not know how much time we have, but if we do not start to solve this problem today, it will be too late.

Solution

Wind and solar are two of the main renewable energy generation systems available at current situation. But winds are uncertain and for solar, its dark when we need electricity the most.

Ocean waves are big source energy(1700 TWh/yr) how? Imagine the energy needed to make an ocean size wave pool with waves bigger than that of wave pool in an amusement park. We just need to reverse engineer it to capture that energy.

1/3 of the total population resides within 60 miles of coastline and wave energy has the potential to supply their electricity demand.

People around the world are trying to capture the ocean wave energy and there are multiple examples of wave energy conversion devices. We closely observed most of them and thought of making more efficient device.

Wavemill: Inspired by nature

We have all observed the sea shore where sea wave breaks. This flowing water of wave has mass and velocity thus the kinetic energy.

 

We observed sea shores, studied wave breaking behavior and found that wave breaking mechanism has the highest possibility of energy transfer by waves. Different angles of ramp slope breaks waves differently. You need optimum angle of slope to break the wave so that it can transfer most of momentum to turbine blades.

We present Wavemill its an ingenious design which uses both ocean waves and wind to rotate turbine.

Our journey

We performed simulations to understand the wave interaction with ramp.

 

We studied the role of ramp angle on wave breaking.Now we want to test it in real world with models in the wave labs.

Your pledge money will be utilize in

  • Model designing for its structural strength and buoyancy
  • Model fabrication
  • Model testing and performance analysis in the wave lab
  • Design of turbine
  • Design of generator
  • Design of electricity conditioning mechanism.

Risks & Challenges

Real challenges are making a sea worthy model which is efficient and produce the cheap electricity. To address these challenges we need to perform rigours test for its survivability.

Support the cause

We need all possible renewable energy resources to generate 4 times the current renewable energy production to eliminate the usage of fossil fuel.

We are committed to find the solution and working on it. Your support will help this project to accelerate and achieve the goal faster.

We may not have lucrative perks to give you short term pleasures, but we have solution to give cleaner environment for generations to come.

Please hit the pledge button and donate generously if you want to see this project perform well.

Other ways of help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help us get the word out about this campaign by using the sharing buttons on this page
  • Send this page to a friend who you think is willing contribute to this project.

Thanks a lot

PEACE
